query_title_en: Seeking for the advice! What should I do?
query_title_zh: 求解啊  这怎么弄啊0 0
query_content_en: It's been a month and a half, and the swelling hasn't gone down. It was a fall, and the wound was particularly deep, about half a centimeter. The area around the wound is red and swollen. When pressed, it forms a small pit that takes a long time to go back, looking like edema. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 一个半月了，不消肿 ，是摔得，伤口特别深，有半厘米左右，伤口的周围红肿，一按有小坑，而且半天不回去，跟水肿了似得，怎么办啊？

responses.content_en: Delayed wound healing and surrounding redness and swelling of the area around the wound is suspicious for infection. Recommend evaluation in urgent care for antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 伤口迟迟未能愈合、伤口周边有红肿，很可能是感染。建议到紧急护理诊所拿取抗生素服用。

query_title_en: This wound is from the car accideent today. It is on my feet, can I shower
query_title_zh: 这个伤、今天出的车祸、在脚上、这伤能洗澡了?

responses.content_en: You are able to shower. Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 您可以淋浴。继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: My friend's hand got burned
query_title_zh: 一朋友手被烫伤了
query_content_en: I got burned last night and applied toothpaste a few times, but it's still quite painful. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 昨天晚上被烫伤的，涂了几次牙膏，现在还是比较痛，怎么破

responses.content_en: Apply burn cream daily and take anti-inflammation medicine for the pain. Seek evaluation if blistering or infection is a concern.
responses.content_zh: 涂抹烧伤药膏和吃抗炎药来缓解疼痛。如果起水泡或感染是个问题，请去评估。

query_title_en: [Help] My foot is very swollen from an injury caused by kicking. Is it serious?
query_title_zh: 【求助】脚背踢伤，肿的很高，严不严重？
query_content_en: Right leg (Injury). Left leg (non-injury)
query_content_zh: 右脚（受伤） 左脚（正常）

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation in ER for XRay to evaluate for fracture.
responses.content_zh: 建议在急诊室进行X光评估以排除骨折。

query_title_en: Got a 2 cm facial wound from a metal object. It’s deep but neat, so no stitches were done.
query_title_zh: l脸被金属硬物划伤2CM的伤口 伤口很深 伤口比较整齐 所以没缝针…
query_content_en: Got a 2 cm facial cut from a metal object. The wound is deep but neat, so no stitches were done. Will it scar? How long will it take to heal?
query_content_zh: l脸被金属硬物划伤2CM的伤口 伤口很深 伤口比较整齐 所以没缝针 会留疤吗？ 伤口要好久会好？

responses.content_en: It can take up to 6-8 weeks for healing. It is difficult to say if it will scar as it depends on how the body heals itself.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要6到8周。很难说是否会留下疤痕，因为这取决于身体如何自我愈合。

query_title_en: What should I do about an injured toenail?
query_title_zh: 脚趾甲伤了怎么办？

responses.content_en: I would recommend going to the nearest Urgent Care if you are interested in getting an x-ray to rule out a fracture. Otherwise no further intervention is needed at this time. It may take up to 6 months for healing.
responses.content_zh: 如果您有意愿通过 X 光排除骨折的可能，我建议您去最近的急诊诊所。否则，目前不需要进一步干预。愈合可能需要长达 6 个月的时间。

query_title_en: There's a hole on the sole of my foot.
query_title_zh: 【求助】脚心上有个洞
query_content_en: It was previously scratched open and healed, but it started hurting again, so I scratched it off, leaving a small hole. I'm really scared and it hurts a lot. Any suggestions on how to heal this? It's caused by the friction from walking.
query_content_zh: 是以前抠破的，又长起来了，但是扎的脚疼，就又抠下来了，就成了个小洞，好害怕啊，有什么方法能好起来，真的好疼。是走路磨的

responses.content_en: This is a corn or callus. You can try over the counter products such as salicylic acid, soaking in warm water and using a pumice stone as well as the duct tape method. Replace your shoes if worn out. See a Podiatry specialist for further treatment if no improvement with the above recommendations.
responses.content_zh: 这是鸡眼或老茧。您可以尝试使用含水杨酸的非处方产品，泡温水并使用浮石去角质，或者采用胶带法。如果鞋子已经磨损，建议更换。如果按照这些建议没有改善，建议去看足病专科医生进行进一步治疗。

responses.content_en: Difficult to visualize however given description, possibly a plantar wart.  Over-the-counter treatment for plantar wart may be successful however if it is exceedingly bothersome, may require podiatry evaluation for possible excision.
responses.content_zh: 难以清楚观察，但根据描述，可能是足底疣。非处方治疗可能有效，但如果症状严重，可能需要足病科评估并考虑切除。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say based on the image provided, I would recommend covering the area with a dressing to reduce friction from walking. Based on this image, it does not appear to be infected however it is hard to say whether there is an underlying foreign body and this is a prior puncture wound. I would recommend being seen by a provider in person to evaluate further.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难说，我建议用包扎敷料覆盖该区域，以减少行走时的摩擦。 根据这张图片，这是之前已造成的穿刺伤口、它似乎没有感染，但很难说表面下有否异物。我建议由医护人员亲自作进一步评估。

query_title_en: The injury has been recovered for a year, but always look like this. Can I get some help?
query_title_zh: 伤愈一年了，就一直这个样子，求助。
query_content_en: I am a 22 years old male. At around July, 2012. I injured right below the knee, then it had form a scar and the scar was peeling. Whenever I squat, the scar would peel off. It took a while to recover, and it has been looking like this and itching eversince. I have check it checked out at two facilities.
query_content_zh: 本人男，22岁，2012年7月份左右，膝盖下一点摔坏了，之后结痂，又撕开，没办法一蹲下就撕开，后来过了好久愈合了，之后就一直这样，发痒，去看过两家

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see Dermatology or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去看皮肤科或整形外科专家，讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: The wound is continuing to heal appropriately. I would recommend reducing sunlight exposure and applying SPF to reduce the likelihood of scarring. I would also recommend applying topical to reduce the itching.
responses.content_zh: 伤口继续在正常愈合中。我建议减少阳光照射，涂抹防晒霜以减少疤痕生长的可能性。我还建议涂抹外用药膏以减轻瘙痒。

query_title_en: Is there a problem with this wound?
query_title_zh: 这个伤口有问题吗？
query_content_en: After appendicitis surgery, I had an infection and was hospitalized for 27 days. They inserted a drainage tube on the seventh day, removed it on the sixteenth, stopped the IV on the nineteenth, and I was discharged on the twenty-seventh day. Today is the 34th day after surgery. The wound doesn’t hurt or itch, but the site where that drain was inserted doesn’t seem to have closed yet. Can any fellow patients help me think about this?
query_content_zh: 阑尾炎术后感染，住院27天，第七天插的引流管，第十六天拔掉引流管，滴十九天不打针了，第27天出的院，今天是术后34天，伤口不疼不痒，可是那个插引流管的孔貌似还没有合上啊？？？求各位病友帮我分析下

responses.content_en: The wound is healing well and there is granulation at the site of the drain. It may take some more time for the area to fully heal so continue local wound care as you are currently performing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口中央有少量增生的肉芽组织（愈合组织），但没有周围的红肿表示感染。伤口可能会在两周内从底部逐渐填满。

query_title_en: Please take a look at my hand, experts!!!
query_title_zh: 帮我看看我的手吧大神！！！
query_content_en: Yesterday, I hit the wall with my hand out of excitement. It swelled a lot yesterday, reduced a bit today, but still hurts a lot. I can move my fingers but they're not flexible. How long will it take to heal?
query_content_zh: 昨天激动用手捶墙 昨天就肿的很大 今天消了一点肿 但是剧痛 手指都可以动 但是不灵活 多长时间才能好啊啊

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care to have imaging performed to rule out an x-ray. Depending on the typ e of injury it may take 4-8 weeks to heal.
responses.content_zh: 建议您去最近的急救中心做影像检查并用X 光排除。根据受伤类型，可能需要4到8周才能愈合。

query_title_en: Experts, please take a look. Is this inflammation?
query_title_zh: 大神们进来看看吧  是不是发炎了

responses.content_en: This does not appear to be inflamed. Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 这看起来并没有发炎。继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Please look at my wound. It's been more than 20 days and it hasn't healed. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 大家看我的伤口怎么办?20多天还没有愈合怎么办?

responses.content_en: It can take up to 8 weeks for healing. Continue performing wound care by washing the area with soap and water and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要长达8周的时间。继续进行伤口护理，使用肥皂和清水清洗伤口并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Experts, how should I treat this wound?
query_title_zh: 请问大神，这个伤口怎么处理
query_content_en: My grandmother has a brain hemorrhage. There's a slightly protruding bone above her hip that has been rubbing against the bed, creating a wound. What should we do?
query_content_zh: 我奶奶的一个伤口，现在脑出血，奶奶臀部上面有一块骨头突出来了，在床上磨成这样了，应该怎么办才行

responses.content_en: The patient is bedbound and should be turned frequent to prevent pressure ulcers. The pressure on the wound should be offloaded and cleaned to remove exudate.
responses.content_zh: 患者卧床不起，应经常更换体位以防止压疮。应减轻对伤口的压力并清理以去除渗出液。

query_title_en: Please take a look, I'm worried.
query_title_zh: 求看看担心啊
query_content_en: Could a doctor please take a look and see if this wound is infected? The white substance inside the wound is making me very concerned.
query_content_zh: 请医生帮忙看看是不是感染了，伤口里面白色的物质看着我直发麻。

responses.content_en: There is no sign of infection at this time. The white material is likely  skin debris from the edge of the wound. Wash the area with soap and water and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 目前没有感染迹象。白色物质可能是伤口边缘的皮肤碎屑。用肥皂和清水清洗该区域并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: 【Seeking Help】Knee skin scraped from a bike accident 4 days ago.
query_title_zh: 【求助】4天前摔车膝盖磨破皮。
query_content_en: Four nights ago, I was riding my bike home after a late-night snack. I didn't notice which vehicle it was, but there was oil all over the ground, and I fell. My knee got scraped. I cleaned it with hydrogen peroxide and applied gauze, but it started oozing pus. So, I used "BB powder" mixed with water.
query_content_zh: 四天前晚上吃夜宵骑车回家、不知道是哪辆车弄的地上都是油、就摔车了 膝盖磨破皮了、我用双氧水擦然后贴纱布、发现流脓太多、然后我就用“BB粉”泡水

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily and covering with gauze and a bandage. Consult a doctor if you continue to have pus-like discharge or develop additional symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding.
responses.content_zh: 继续伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并用纱布和绷带覆盖。如果您继续有脓样分泌物，或出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Fell off my bike a few days ago. Bought ointment and applied it myself.
query_title_zh: 前几天骑车摔伤。自己买了药膏涂。
query_content_en: Not sure what to do. Should I wrap it in gauze? I've heard it heals slower with gauze. Also, what medication should I apply?
query_content_zh: 不知道要怎么办。要不要包纱布？听说包纱布好得慢。还有，需要涂什么药？

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully appreciate the extent or size of the injury on the included picture however appears to be significant abrasion with exposed dermis.  No surrounding erythema or significant drainage/bleeding on the included picture.  Does not appear to be amenable for suture repair.  Would recommend local wound care including thorough cleaning with warm soapy water, application of topical antibiotic ointment and coverage with nonadherent dressing.  Dressing should be changed daily and during dressing changes gently cleanse the wound with warm soapy water.  Avoid any drying agents such as hydrogen peroxide, alcohol, or iodine to open skin.
responses.content_zh: 从图片上很难识别受伤的程度和大小。但是很像有相当严重的磨损和外露的皮层。图片显示周边没有红斑和严重的沁血／沁液。似乎不适合缝合修复。建议在受伤部位进行护理，包括用温和的皂水彻底清洁，和涂上外敷抗生素药膏、之后用非粘附性包扎物包扎好。包扎物应每曰更换；更换时应用温和皂水轻洗伤口。避免在外露的皮肤使用例如二氧化氢、酒精、或是碘等干燥剂。

query_title_en: Can someone tell me if this condition comes with inflammation.
query_title_zh: 请教我这种情况有炎症吗
query_content_en: The treated wound has already form a scar. But I dont know what is at the boarder of the wound.
query_content_zh: 伤口处理过已经结巴了，但边上不知道是什么

responses.content_en: There is dead skin built up along the border of the wound. No further intervention is needed at this time as it will slough off on its own over time. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 伤口边缘有死皮堆积。目前不需要进一步干预，它会随着时间的推移自行脱落。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Need additional clinical context as to the initial injury however appears to be deep ulceration with granulation tissue at the wound margins.  No overt evidence of secondary infection.  Would avoid any drying agents such as iodine, alcohol, or hydrogen peroxide and instead use topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎很深，在伤口边缘有肉芽组织生长 。 需要额外的临床医疗资料来了解最初的损伤情况。没有明显的继发感染。避免使用酒精、二氧化氢或碘等干燥剂。涂上外敷抗生素药膏和用非粘附性包扎物包好。

query_title_en: Asking for advice!
query_title_zh: 求助
query_content_en: My finger got smashed in the door and now it looks like this. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 手指被门夹了成这样了怎么办

responses.content_en: Perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. A tetanus vaccine is also recommended if you have not received it in the past 5 years.  If you are concerned about an infection or have other symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding, consult a doctor and have this evaluated in-person.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，建议接种。如果您担心感染或出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血等症状，请咨询医生并进行面对面的检查。

responses.content_en: Unable to visualize based on picture quality.  Cannot provide any information at this time.
responses.content_zh: 由于图片品质不良，无法清楚查看伤口，目前无法提供相关信息。

responses.content_en: Based on the image, it is difficult to say whether there is underlying nailbed damage. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether you have a underlying fracture and further management of this trauma to your finger.
responses.content_zh: 根据图像，很难说下层的指甲床有否受损。我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定是否下面有骨折，并进一步治疗手指的创伤。

query_title_en: I got a cut from being hit. How can I treat it to avoid scarring?
query_title_zh: 被打出一道口子，怎么处理不会留疤。
query_content_en: Looking for answers.
query_content_zh: 求大神！！

responses.content_en: One cannot control the cosmetic appearance of the scar. Scars can take two years to soften and fade. Recommend dermatology consultation if cosmesis is a concern.
responses.content_zh: 无法控制疤痕的外观。疤痕可能需要两年时间软化和淡化。如果担心美容效果，建议咨询皮肤科医生。

query_title_en: A piece of skin on my leg fell off for no reason.
query_title_zh: 腿上莫名就掉了块皮
query_content_en: The peeled area and the surrounding skin have small spots that are oozing blood. This morning, I woke up with a lot of wierd pain, and when I checked, I saw a thing that seems like a black, crushed bug next to the wound being wiped off. Did something bit me?
query_content_zh: 掉皮的地方以及周围的范围内都有小点点在往外渗血，就是早上睡醒以后就感觉莫名的特别疼，一看吓一跳，旁边还有类似被碾碎的黑色虫子的尸体被擦掉了一些，是不是什么东西咬的？？

responses.content_en: It may be due to an insect bite if you saw the insect. Wash the area with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop symptoms of infection such as fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, swelling, pain, persistent bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 如果你看到了昆虫，可能是昆虫叮咬引起的。用肥皂和清水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带包扎。如果出现感染症状，如发烧、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、疼痛、持续出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Injury
query_title_zh: 伤了
query_content_en: How long will this take to heal?
query_content_zh: 怎么办？

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. Clean with soap and water daily and apply a dry dressing. It may take 2 skin for the skin to completely cover the wound.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请每天用肥皂和水清洗，并涂抹干燥的敷料。皮肤可能需要2周才能完全覆盖伤口。

query_title_en: Got hit on the side of the fibula, how should I handle this?
query_title_zh: 腓骨侧面被撞，来看看怎么处理
query_content_en: When I was playing soccer, someone’s knee hit the side of my fibula, and that night, it swelled up like a carrot. I went to the hospital the next day for an X-ray, and there was no bone damage, so they told me to rest at home. Now it's the fourth day. The impact area has turned purple, it doesn't hurt much, but there's a lot of blood and swelling below my ankle, and there are blue bruises. When the impacted area bears weight, the parallel area to the above fibula will hurt. My biggest concern is that after lying flat for a long time or elevating my leg, when I stand up, even without putting weight on the injured leg, I will have a sudden stabbing pain and a throbbing sensation as if blood or some fluid is pooling in the leg and can’t flow properly. What’s injured here? How should I treat it?
query_content_zh:
踢球的时候对方膝盖撞了我的的腓骨侧面一下，当晚就肿成萝卜了。第二天去医院拍片，骨头没有问题让我回家休养，现在第四天了。
撞击点发紫，不太痛，脚腕下方有大量积血和浮肿，有青色血斑，撞击点上方沿着腓骨平行的一条线会在伤腿承重时疼痛。
然后是最让我担心的问题，长时间躺卧或者垫高腿后，直立起来的时候，哪怕伤腿不承重，也会突然刺痛，还有涌涨感，好像血液或者别的什么液体突然集中在腿上流不开一样
这是伤到哪儿了？应该怎么治疗呢？

responses.content_en: You may have a hematoma, which is when the swelling and bleeding gets pulled downwards  from the site of the injury by gravity. Continue resting, elevating the leg, applying ice packs and take anti-inflammation medicine as needed to help the pain. Use crutches to ambulate if needed.
responses.content_zh: 你可能有血肿，这是由于受伤部位的肿胀和出血被重力作用下拉造成的。继续休息、抬高腿部、使用冰袋，并根据需要服用消炎药来缓解疼痛。如果需要，可以使用拐杖行走。

query_title_en: Seeking help.
query_title_zh: 求助
query_content_en: I accidentally squeezed my finger two days ago, went to a clinic for cleaning, disinfecting, and bandaging. Yesterday, when I changed the dressing, it was still bleeding, and we did the cleaning, disinfecting, and bandaging again. Today, the dressing was changed again, and there was no bleeding. The doctor applied some amoxicillin after dressing change and told me to avoid further bleeding. However, it started to bleed again tonight, so I decided to poured iodine on it from the outside of the bandage. Is this a serious issue? Can I wait until tomorrow morning to see a doctor?
query_content_zh: 前天不小心把手指头挤破了 到诊所清洗消毒包扎 昨天去换药有出血 还是清洗消毒包扎 今天换药没有出血 大夫给清洗消毒后 倒上了一些阿莫西林 包扎 交代不能出血 不过晚上又出血了 自作主张 直接从包扎的外面浇上了 碘伏 请问有没有大问题 能不能熬到明天早上去看医生

responses.content_en: The bleeding is likely caused by a blood vessel at the site that has not yet clotted. Apply a pressure dressing with gauze and tape but you can wait until tomorrow to see a doctor unless you have symptoms such as continuous bleeding not controlled by the dressing.
responses.content_zh: 出血可能是由伤口处尚未凝固的血管引起的。使用纱布和胶带进行加压包扎，但除非出现持续出血且包扎无法控制的情况，否则你可以等到明天再去看医生。

query_title_en: I fell off my bike, and now it seems a bit infected. It's so troublesome. Can someone take a look at it?
query_title_zh: 我骑车摔了一下现在有点感染了好麻烦，谁懂得帮我看一下
query_content_en: I fell off my bike a few days ago. The cut isn’t very deep, but after disinfecting it, it started oozing on the third day. The surrounding area has small bumps with water and pus inside.
query_content_zh: 前几天骑自行车摔了一下不是很深然后消消毒出水了第3天外面一圈发了一个个小点里面还有水还有脓

responses.content_en: The abrasion appears swollen with yellow crusting suggesting infection. Recommend evaluation in urgent care for cleansing of wound and antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 擦伤看起来肿胀，并伴有黄色结痂，可能存在感染。建议去急诊寻求评估，清理伤口并使用抗生素。

query_title_en: Got hit by a patch a few days ago.
query_title_zh: 上几天给贴片打到了

responses.content_en: Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 请继续进行局部伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: I fell. Can someone take a look if it will be infected?
query_title_zh: 摔伤了，麻烦大家帮忙看下，会不会感染
query_content_en: I have been using iodine to disinfect each day. I also put on bactroban ointment.
query_content_zh: 最近天天用碘酒消毒，摸了百多邦

responses.content_en: This is an abrasion that does not appear to be infected. Apply a dry bandage daily to protect the wound. Seek evaluation if signs of infection: spreading redness or pus extruding from the wound.
responses.content_zh: 这是擦伤，看起来没有感染。每天应用干燥的绷带保护伤口。如果出现感染迹象，例如红肿扩散或有脓液渗出，请寻求评估。

query_title_en: What should I do to make it heal quicker? As shwon in the image, I used hydrogen peroxide to disinfect.
query_title_zh: 怎样才能更快的好起来？如图，有用双氧水消毒

responses.content_en: Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: My finger got injured here. What should I do? Will I get paronychia? Paronychia is so scary.
query_title_zh: 手指头这里受伤了该怎么办 会不会得甲沟炎啊 甲沟炎好可怕

responses.content_en: You can soak the finger in warm water mixed with Epsom salt or chlorhexidine. Apply antibiotic ointment 3 times a day and cover with a bandage. Go to the nearest Urgent Care if it does not improve or you develop worsening pain, redness, swelling, warmth, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 您可以将手指泡在已混合泻盐或氯己定的温水中。每天涂抹抗生素软膏3次，并用绷带覆盖。如果没有改善或出现持续疼痛、红肿、肿胀、温热、出血或脓性排出，请去最近的急救中心。

query_title_en: It's been two days since the stitches were removed, and I still can't make a tight fist.
query_title_zh: 缝完针拆线两天，手还是不敢握紧拳头
query_content_en: Will the wound split open if I make a fist?
query_content_zh: 用力握拳伤口会裂开吗

responses.content_en: The tightness is likely due to scar tissue. There is a possibility that the wound may open if there is too much pressure applied to the site. You can perform gentle range of motion exercises and the scar tissue will likely gradually soften over time.
responses.content_zh: 紧绷感可能是由疤痕组织引起的。如果对该部位施加过大压力，伤口可能会裂开。您可以进行轻柔的关节活动练习，疤痕组织可能会随着时间的推移逐渐软化。

responses.content_en: There appears to be some scabbing and scarring present.  Wound will need more time for healing.  You should do range of motion exercises to prevent contracture of the skin.  Given that it is on an extensor surface and sutures were recently removed, there is some possibility of wound dehiscence.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine.  You may apply topical moisturizers or topical antibiotic ointment to keep the skin moist which will increase pliability of the skin.
responses.content_zh: 伤口上有一些结痂和疤痕，仍需更多时间愈合。你应做关节活动练习以防止皮肤挛缩。由于伤口位于伸肌表面，且缝线刚被拆除，有可能造成伤口裂开。避免使用干燥物质，如酒精、过氧化氢或碘。你可以涂抹保湿剂或抗生素软膏，保持皮肤湿润，提升皮肤的柔韧。

responses.content_en: I would start by making small hand movements rather than immediately moving to a fist, start by flexing and extending your palm and as your mobility starts to increase with time with your hand then I would move toward making a fist. It is important that you do exercises to promote wound healing in this area or it may completely scar over and reduce your long-term mobility.
responses.content_zh: 我会从轻微的手部活动开始；开始时从弯曲和伸展手掌，而不是立即握拳。随着时间的进展，手的活动能力开始增强，然后我会进而握拳。重要的是，你要做运动来促进这个部位的伤口愈合，否则它可能会完全结疤、那会降低你的长期活动能力。

query_title_en: What is happening? Could any experts tell me what oinments should I use to make it better.
query_title_zh: 这是怎么回事，抹什么药会好，求大神支招

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation. The wound is infected and may need to be opened to let the pus out. Additionally antibiotics will need to be started to combat the infection.
responses.content_zh: 建议去最近的医院进行评估。伤口感染了并且可能需要划开来移除脓液。另外，需要开始抗生素来抵抗感染。

query_title_en: Is there a physician here?
query_title_zh: 有大夫在吗
query_content_en: How many days will it take for this kind of wound to heal?
query_content_zh: 像这种伤口几天会好

responses.content_en: It depends on how the injury occurred. But based on your photo, it may take weeks-months.
responses.content_zh: 这取决于受伤的方式，但根据您的照片，可能需要几周到几个月的时间。

responses.content_en: Difficult to visualize the wound, unclear as to the inciting event or etiology of the wound.  Unclear as to the location on the body.  Appears to be on a flexor surface, likely a pressure injury.  Would recommend applying bacitracin/Xeroform with antibiotic ointment and covering with a dry dressing, changing daily.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, 100 peroxide, or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口不易观察，无法确定伤口的原因或部位。似乎位于屈侧表面，可能是压疮。建议使用百多邦/Xeroform和抗生素软膏覆盖干敷料，每日更换。避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。

responses.content_en: This type of wound may take weeks to completely heal and it is possible that it may scar.  I would recommend avoiding sunlight and applying SPF as needed.
responses.content_zh: 这种类型的伤口可能需要数周才能完全愈合，并且可能会留下疤痕。我建议避免阳光照射，并根据需要涂抹防晒霜。

query_title_en: After the scab falls off... what is this situation? Seeking guidance.
query_title_zh: 疤掉了后……求教这样是什么情况

responses.content_en: This is a healing abrasion. It will take 2 weeks for the skin to grow back. In the mean time cleanse with soap and water and air dry.
responses.content_zh: 这是一个愈合中的擦伤，皮肤需要大约2周时间重新长回。在此期间，用肥皂和水清洗并自然风干。

query_title_en: Does this cut need stitches?
query_title_zh: 这种口子要缝针么

responses.content_en: If the wound is continuing to bleed and it has been within 24 hours since the injury occurred, you would benefit from having stitches to help with healing. You can go to the nearest Urgent Care for further treatment. Otherwise, continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口持续出血且受伤发生在24小时内，缝合可能有助于愈合。您可以前往最近的急诊诊所进行进一步治疗。否则，继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: In regards to the question of does this wound needs stitches, it appears to be a gapping wound that would heal quicker with better cosmetic effect if it did have stitches.  It is also on a surface that is subject to significant flexion and extension which will likely delay healing without sutures.  The wound should be thoroughly cleaned and if the your tetanus shot is not up-to-date it should be updated
responses.content_zh: 有关缝合复的问题，缝合对较大的伤口会愈合快一些，和美容效果好一些。如果伤口在一个需要弯曲和伸展的表面上，没有缝合修复会延迟愈合的时间。伤口应该彻底清理。如果破伤风注射己過期，亦要重新注射疫苗。

query_title_en: Experts, please come quickly!
query_title_zh: 大神们快来！
query_content_en: Fell off my bike a few weeks ago. After scabbing, it got infected. Now the scab is off, and it looks like this. What should I do? Urgent! Waiting for response!
query_content_zh: 前几个星期骑车摔了，结痂了之后化脓，痂撕了就这样了，该怎么办！！急！在线等！

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing with granulation tissue with some violation of the dermis with exposure of subcutaneous fat.  No overt evidence of secondary infection.  Would recommend gentle cleansing of the wound with warm soapy water daily as well as application of topical antibiotic ointment and covering with nonadherent gauze.  Would recommend changing dressing daily and monitoring for any signs of infection including increasing redness, swelling, drainage, pain to the area, or systemic signs of infection such as fever or chills.  Would recommend updating tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 伤口生长了肉芽组织，似乎正在愈合；真皮层亦受到一些侵损，皮下脂肪暴露。没有明显的继发感染。建议用温和肥皂水轻洗，涂上外敷抗生素药膏和用非粘附性纱布包扎好。每日更换包扎并留意有没有感染迹象、包括发红、肿胀、流液、在有关部位疼痛、或系统性的感染，例如发烧和发冷。如果破伤风注射己過期，亦要重新注射疫苗。

query_title_en: My lower leg got injured today. Can any experts please give me some advice?
query_title_zh: 今天小腿受伤了   求大神指条明路
query_content_en: The physician only gave me a bottle of iodine. Is there any way to make the wound heal faster?
query_content_zh: 医生就给了了瓶碘酒 有什么办法让伤口快点好啊！

responses.content_en: Unfortunately there are no treatments to speed up the healing process. Continue performing wound care by washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 不幸的是，暂无能够加速愈合过程的治疗方法。继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: I would recommend keeping the area clean and dry, applying a non-adhesive dressing to the wound as well as bacitracin ointment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议保持该部位清洁干燥，在伤口上涂抹非粘附性包扎料和杆菌肽软膏。

query_title_en: Asking for help from experts.
query_title_zh: 求大神看看
query_content_en: Can I peel this off? It's really itchy. Will it leave a scar if I do?
query_content_zh: 请问一下这个能揭开吗？好痒，揭开会留疤吗

responses.content_en: I would not recommend peeling the scab off. Allow it to fall off on its own. If you do peel it off, it will likely delay healing and may leave a scar.
responses.content_zh: 我不建议撕掉结痂。应该让其自然脱落。如果撕掉结痂，可能会延迟愈合并留下疤痕

query_title_en: Scraped my leg. Can someone tell me what's going on?
query_title_zh: 腿摔破皮了   求给看看怎么回事
query_content_en: I missed a step going downstairs, disinfected with hydrogen peroxide and Iodophor, and applied some Methylrosanilinium Chloride Solution. It's still oozing clear fluid. Is it infected?
query_content_zh: 下楼梯踩空了 用双氧水和碘伏消毒了 抹了点紫药水 但是老是渗出透明的液体 是不是发炎了？

responses.content_en: This is an abrasion to the knee that does not appear infected. Clear serous fluid drainage is to be expected and should resolve in a week. Wound resolution may take 2-4 weeks.
responses.content_zh: 这是膝盖的擦伤，似乎并未感染。清液性排出是可预见的，应该会在一周内解决。伤口愈合可能需要2到4周。

query_title_en: Wound
query_title_zh: 外伤
query_content_en: I got a small wound from something crumping, and it's red around the wound. I'm a bit worried, but it feels like overreacting to go to the hospital. What do you think?
query_content_zh: 被东西碰了！就一个小洞！怎么周边都是红的啊？有点担心！又觉得去医院有点小题大做？请教下！

responses.content_en: Continue to clean with soap and water and cover with dry dressing. Wound is almost healed and does not need further evaluation
responses.content_zh: 继续用肥皂和水清洗并覆盖干燥的敷料。伤口几乎愈合，不需要进一步评估。

query_title_en: Injury from a fall hasn’t healed after a month.
query_title_zh: 摔伤，一个月了还没好
query_content_en: Went to the hospital, but I didn't ask for stitches. Initially, the doctor used ointment and now powder for dressing, but it hasn’t healed after a month. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 去医院没要求缝针，医生开始的时候用软膏包，现在用药粉包，但是一个月了还没好，请问下这样该怎么处理啊

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily and covering with a bandage. It may take up to 8 weeks for healing.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并用绷带覆盖。愈合可能需要长达8周。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing, I would recommend gently cleaning the area with warm soapy, water, and applying a non-adhesive dressing to the wound with bacitracin ointment. This will take some time to heal. ￼
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正在愈合中。我建议用温肥皂水轻轻清洁该区域，并用杆菌肽软膏在伤口上涂抹非粘附性敷料。这需要一些时间才能痊愈。

query_title_en: Seeking help from experts.
query_title_zh: 求助大神
query_content_en: The scab got infected, after cleaning with alcohol and iodophor, it got infected again after two days. Any solutions?
query_content_zh: 结痂后化脓了，揭开后酒精清洗擦了碘伏，两天后又感染了，求解决办法

responses.content_en: This is an avulsion of a prior healing abrasion reavealing healthy granulation tissue. It does not current look infected. Continue daily dry dressing changes. Seek evaluation if there is spreading readness or pus.
responses.content_zh: 这是之前愈合中的擦伤再次撕裂，显露出健康的肉芽组织。目前看起来没有感染。继续每天更换干燥的敷料。如果出现红肿扩散或有脓液渗出，请寻求评估。

query_title_en: Seeking help.
query_title_zh: 求助
query_content_en: Cleaned it up, but how to treat it? It's suppurating
query_content_zh: 清理干净了，怎么治疗？化脓了

responses.content_en: There is redness around the wound.  I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as this may be a sign of an infection. You may also need to see a Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss reconstructive procedures such as a skin graft or flap to assist with the healing process.
responses.content_zh: 伤口周围有发红的现象。我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心接受进一步评估，因为这可能是感染的迹象。您可能还需要看整形外科专家，讨论皮肤移植或皮瓣等重建手术，以加速愈合过程。

responses.content_en: Unclear mechanism but appears to have signs of secondary infection with surrounding erythema.  Likely needs topical and oral antibiotics as well as thoroguh wound care.
responses.content_zh: 机制不明，但出现了继发感染的迹象，伴有周围红斑。可能需要局部和口服抗生素，并进行彻底的伤口护理。

responses.content_en: There is some granulation tissue over the wound which suggests that the wound is attempting to heal. However, the wound appears to have surrounding erythema (redness) which is concerning for an underlying infection. Given the location, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to evaluate the area and see if further drainage is warranted, the depth of the infection, and/or if antibiotics are warranted.
responses.content_zh: 伤口上有一些肉芽组织，显示伤口正在试图愈合中。然而，伤口周围似乎有红斑（发红），伤口可能已受到感染。鉴於受伤位置，我建议你亲自去看医生，评估受伤部位，看看是否需要进一步引流、评估感染深度、和/或是否需要使用抗生素。

query_title_en: Trauma.
query_title_zh: 外伤
query_content_en: The scar has been there for two months, and the stitches haven't been removed yet. Will the scar fall off on its own?
query_content_zh: 结疤两个月线还没拆，疤会自动掉吗？

responses.content_en: The scar will likely fall off on its own but may take more time, possibly weeks-months.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕可能会自行脱落，但可能需要更多时间，可能是几周到几个月。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person as those stitches should've been removed earlier. This wound does not appear to come together appropriately, and there is concern for possible necrosis of this wound.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生，因为那些缝线应该早点拆除。这个伤口似乎没有正常地愈合，我担心这个伤口可能会坏死。

query_title_en: Can I get help from doctors?
query_title_zh: 请教各位医生大人
query_content_en: My hand was injured by a hand held cutting machine for twenty days ago. It is still swollen. It is not straight when I stand, and unable to exert force. The doctor said the muscle had a deep injury, and might take a long time to heal.
query_content_zh: 我因为被手提切割机切伤已经20天了可是还肿着，站立的时候不能直，不得劲、当时医生说已经就伤到肌肉了医生说挺深的，估计还要多长时间好

responses.content_en: It may take up to 8 weeks for healing. You can take over the counter anti-inflammation medicine, elevate the leg and/or apply an ACE wrap to help reduce the swelling. If your leg functioning does not continue to improve, I would recommend that you see a Orthopedic Surgery or Physical Therapy specialist for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要长达8周的时间。您可以服用非处方抗炎药物，抬高腿部或使用弹性绷带来帮助减轻肿胀。如果您的腿部功能没有继续改善，我建议您去看骨科或物理治疗专家进行进一步检查。

responses.content_en: If the you are unable to fully range the affected extremity there is concern for injury to the underlying muscle, tendon/ligaments and should be evaluated by a specialist.  No overt evidence of secondary infection on the included pictures.
responses.content_zh: 如果你受影响的手部不能全面地活动，伤口下面的肌肉有可能己受损。需要由专科医生评估有关的肌腱和韧带。照片上没有显注的感染迹象。

query_title_en: It's been a month since the suture were removed, and it's still like this.
query_title_zh: 拆线一个月了还这样

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a General Surgery or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss further treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去看普通外科或整形外科专家，讨论进一步的治疗方案。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the images provided, I recommend being seen by a position in person given possibility of necrosis of a tip of your finger.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难确定。考虑到指尖可能坏死，我建议亲自去看医生。

query_title_en: Seeking help, please don't delete.
query_title_zh: 求助，勿删

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥的绷带敷好。

query_title_en: I need some help with my surgical wound
query_title_zh: 外伤恢复求助   勿删
query_content_en: I am a 34 years old male. 3 months ago, I had a right great toe gangrene from Thromboangiitis obliterans. I had a Venous arterialization surgery at Wuhan Xiehe hospital. Now the blood flow had been restored. However, my right feet wound is healing very slowly. Can i get some help?
query_content_zh: 本人男 34岁 3个月前因脉管炎动脉栓塞导致右脚大拇指坏死溃烂 2个月前在武汉协和医院做了静脉动脉化手术 现血供已恢复 但是右脚伤口还是恢复很慢 求助

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss reconstructive procedures such as a skin graft or flap to assist with the healing process.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看整形外科专家，讨论皮肤移植或皮瓣等重建手术，以帮助加速愈合过程。

query_title_en: How should this wound be treated?
query_title_zh: 这个伤要怎么治啊
query_content_en: It is from being smashed by things.
query_content_zh: 是被东西砸到的

responses.content_en: There appears to be a hematoma under the finger nail. Given there is no infection the nail does not need to be removed. It may take 4-6 months for the nail to grow back. Consider obtaining an Xray of the finger to assess for possible fracture.
responses.content_zh: 指甲下似乎有血肿。由于没有感染，指甲无需移除。指甲可能需要4-6个月才能长回来。建议拍X光片以评估手指是否有可能骨折。

query_title_en: What should I do?
query_title_zh: 怎么办？
query_content_en: Half of my nail was cut off along with the skin, and the doctor removed the other half. I want to ask, why has the nail bed turned black? Will the nail grow back?
query_content_zh: 被削了连带指甲一半，医生把另一半也拔了， 我想问， 为毛甲床变黑？ 以后指甲会长出来吗？

responses.content_en: The black area may be due to dead tissue. If the nail bed is still alive, the nail will grow back but may take up to 6 months. I would recommend that you see a surgeon to disuss treatment option such as debridement.
responses.content_zh: 黑色区域可能是死去的组织。如果指甲床仍然活着，指甲会重新生长，但可能需要长达6个月。我建议您咨询外科医生以讨论治疗方案，如清创。

query_title_en: Is this fine for me? Would a bandit work?
query_title_zh: 我这个不要紧吧，贴个创可贴就行了吧
query_content_en: It is from squeezing
query_content_zh: 挤的

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Avoid soaking the toe for another week. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。避免在接下来的一周内泡脚。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided, it is unclear as to how much skin has been removed. I would recommend it being seen by a provider in person. I would recommend in the meantime, soaking your hand in warm soapy water to help with healing and cleaning. I would also recommend placing a xeroform gauze dressing over it.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难说，目前尚不清楚去除了多少皮肤。我建议由医护人员亲自查看。在此期间，我建议将手浸泡在温肥皂水中，以帮助愈合和清洁。我还建议在它上面包上XEROFORM纱布。

query_title_en: Help, I fell from a bike resulting in a wound like this. It has been two days, does it need stitches
query_title_zh: 求帮助，骑车摔了这样一个伤口，两天了，需要缝合吗？
query_content_en: There was pus formation on the side. The wound is approximately 3-4mm deep. There was occasional bleeding for the past two days. Does it need stitches? If it does not need stitches, will it have hypertrophic scar after the wound heals?
query_content_zh: 旁边化脓了，伤口深大概3-4毫米，这两天偶尔还会流血，需不需要缝合？如果不需要，伤口好了过后会不会长肉凸起？

responses.content_en: Closing the wound at this time risks infection. Continue to cleanse with soap and water and apply dry dressing. Hypertrophic scar formation cannot be predicted at this time but you have a higher chance of developing hypertorphic scar if you have developed them in the past.
responses.content_zh: 目前关闭伤口有感染的风险。继续使用肥皂和清水清洁伤口，并使用干敷料。现在无法预测是否会形成增生性疤痕，但如果您过去有过增生性疤痕的情况，形成增生性疤痕的可能性较高。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be abrasion with exposed dermis.  Does not appear to be a laceration amenable to suture repair.  If the wound is greater than 24 hours old is not appropriate for suture repair.  To promote wound healing, clean the wound thoroughly with warm soapy water.  You may apply topical antibiotic ointment and cover with a nonadherent dressing.  Dressing may be changed once daily and during dressing changes wound may be cleaned gently with warm soapy water.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine to open skin.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Once the wound is healed, to minimize scar formation avoid UV exposure and use of scar minimization creams such as Mederma
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎有磨损，真皮外露。似乎不是适合缝合修复的撕裂伤。如果伤口超过24小时，则不适合缝合修复。如想促进伤口愈合，可用温肥皂水彻底清洁伤口。你可以使用外用抗生素软膏，并用非粘附性包扎物包好。伤口包扎可以每日更换。更换时可用温肥皂水清洗。避免在外露皮肤使用酒精、二氧化氢和碘等干燥剂。如果破伤风疫笛注射免疫期己过，应注射破伤风疫苗。当伤口愈合时，避免紫外光外露和使用Mederma等疤痕减免面霜。

query_title_en: Slipped last night, toe got cracked and bled a lot. Does it need stitches?
query_title_zh: 昨晚滑倒，脚趾撞裂了 流了蛮多血，这状态需要缝针吗？
query_content_en: How should this wound be treated? — From Nokia Windows Phone
query_content_zh: 伤口还需要怎么处理啊？ ——来自 诺基亚 Windows Phone

responses.content_en: If it continues to bleed, you may need to go to the nearest Urgent Care for stitches. Otherwise, perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with gauze and a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 如果出血持续，您可能需要前往最近的急诊护理中心进行缝合。或是继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用纱布和绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Difficult to appreciate tissue injury from picture.  If tissue does not gap significantly or if wound is not very deep could likely avoid stitches and do buddy taping with adjacent toe with topical antibiotic ointment.
responses.content_zh: 从图片中难以判断组织损伤情况。如果组织没有明显裂开或伤口不深，可能可以避免缝合，使用邻近脚趾的指带固定法，并涂抹抗生素软膏。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen in person by a physician to determine the depth of the injury as it is difficult to say based on this one picture. You will likely need some sutures to encourage the skin to stay together if it is more than just superficial. If you have not received a tetanus shot in the last 10 years you would need a tdap vaccine as well.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定受伤的深度。因为根据这张照片很难确定。如果受损的皮肤不仅仅是表面的，你可能需要缝线来助长皮肤连在一起。如果你在过去10年里没有接种破伤风疫苗，你也需要接种TDAP(破伤风、白喉和无细胞性百日咳)疫苗。

query_title_en: My fingernail got caught in a desk.
query_title_zh: 手指甲被桌子夹了。。。
query_content_en: My finger is okay, but it feels like the middle of my nail is empty. Can I still play basketball? Will it get better?
query_content_zh: 指头还好，就感觉现在手指甲中间是空的，我还能不能打篮球，还有会不会好。。。

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care to get imaging to rule out a fracture in order to provide advice about activities such as basketball. It should heal after a few weeks.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊诊所进行影像检查，以排除骨折的可能，以便就篮球等活动提供建议。它应该在几周后愈合。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based off of the image provided, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether there is blood or a hematoma underneath your nail, which would require intervention.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难说。我建议亲自去看医生，以确定指甲下是否有血液或血肿，这需要医护人员协助。

query_title_en: Wound
query_title_zh: 伤口
query_content_en: Can someone take a look at my leg wound? I don't know how it happen. Perhaps it was bitten by something?
query_content_zh: 大家帮我看看腿上的伤痕，不知道怎么弄的～不会被咬的吧

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say what caused this wound without taking a closer look in-person. Perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 在不亲自检查的情况下，很难判断是什么导致了这个伤口。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓液分泌等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be fairly shallow ulcer with no surrounding signs of infection.  Would recommend local wound care with gentle cleaning 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water.  Would additionally recommend topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来是较浅的溃疡，没有感染的迹象。建议局部伤口护理，每天1至3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗。同时建议使用局部抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料。避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say what causes based on the type of wound and location. It could potentially be a bite versus a friction injury.
responses.content_zh: 根据伤口的类型和位置，很难说是什么原因造成的。这可能是咬伤、或是摩擦伤。

query_title_en: Can anyone take a look to see how to treat this wound.
query_title_zh: 求朋友帮我看看怎么处理这伤口
query_content_en: I have been hospitalized for 22 days. I am planning to go home for self care. Can someone help me to take a look on how to treat, and what medication to use for this wound? Any other considerations? Thank you.
query_content_zh: 已经住院22天了，现在准备回家自己修养，朋友们，帮我看看应该怎么处理 用什么药能加快愈合 另外要注意些什么 谢谢啦

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you follow along with the home care treatment plan the hospital team will provide you. Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment  and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您遵循医院团队给的在家护理治疗计划。继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Please help, it's urgent!
query_title_zh: 求大神，急急！
query_content_en: On the 27th, around 11 a.m., my finger was crushed by a machine, and there was a lot of blood. I went to the hospital for an X-ray and waited for the results. At around 2 p.m., I got a tetanus shot, and the doctor did surgery to stitch the wound, which bleed a lot. The wound is deep, and they did six stitches. At around 6 p.m., I started to have whole body cold sweat, difficulty breathing at the subway. My injured hand became numb and cramped. It lasted about 3 minutes before getting better. Could this be tetanus?
query_content_zh: 27号上午11点左右，手指被机器压破，流很多血，去医院拍片，等结果，下午2点左右打得破伤风，然后医生手术逢针流很多血，伤口深逢6针。下午6点左右在地铁全身出冷汗，呼吸困难，手术那只手麻痹，抽筋，3分钟左右好转，请问会是破伤风吗。

responses.content_en: The symptoms you described are not consistent with tetanus. Symptoms of tetanus include fever, chills, stiff muscles including locking of the jaw, increased heart rate and tachycardia.
responses.content_zh: 你描述的症状与破伤风不符。破伤风的症状包括发烧、寒战、肌肉僵硬（包括下颌紧锁）、心跳加快和心动过速。

responses.content_en: Picture quality is very poor and it is difficult to fully appreciate the injury.  Description of the injury includes a crush injury with sutures.  Unclear if there was an underlying fracture and difficult to tell if this picture is before or after receiving sutures.  In regards to the clinical question, given the temporal nature of the injury, the fact that the your tetanus shot got updated, overall very low suspicion for acute tetanus infection as your symptoms did improve.
responses.content_zh: 图片质量较差，难以清晰观察伤情。描述中提到有挤压伤并已缝合，但不清楚是否存在骨折，也不确定图片是拍摄于缝合前还是缝合后。针对临床问题，由于伤情时间较短且破伤风疫苗已更新，急性破伤风感染的可能性较低，因为症状已有改善。

responses.content_en: Unclear as to what caused the whole body sensation and shortness of breath, it is possible that this was a vasovagal reaction however I would recommend being seen by a physician in person for further workup if the symptoms persist. There is low likelihood however that this is due to tetanus as this would not act this quickly.
responses.content_zh: 不清楚为何全身受到影响和呼吸急促。这可能是血管迷走神经反应。如果症状持续，我建议亲自去看医生来造进一步检查。然而，这是由于破伤风引起的可能性很小，因为这种情况不会如此迅速地发生。

query_title_en: What should I do with this injury
query_title_zh: 我这个外伤 应该怎么办
query_content_en: The imaging shows the bone is fine. It was shove by an electric bike. The Remin Hospital did some washout of the wound, and the dressing was changed every three days. I have been about four months. It has not recovered yet. What should I do. Can someone give me a suggestion? I can walk fine, but
query_content_zh: 骨头拍片没事 是让电瓶车挤压伤 在人民医院做了下清创处理 就每三天换下药 已经有差不多快四个月了吧 还是有好 怎么办 请教下 能够自由行走但稍微有点

responses.content_en: This is a full thickness injury of the lower leg that does not appear to be infected. There is healthy granulation tissue in the wound bed and may take two to four months before if is covered with skin. Continue applying a dry bandage daily to protect the wound. Seek evaluation if signs of infection: spreading redness or pus extruding from the wound.
responses.content_zh: 这是小腿的全层损伤，虽然没有感染迹象，但伤口床上有健康的肉芽组织，可能需要两到四个月才能被皮肤覆盖。继续每天使用干燥的绷带保护伤口。如果出现感染迹象，例如红肿扩散或有脓液渗出，请寻求评估。

query_title_en: Injured my hand while acting bravely.
query_title_zh: 见义勇为手被割坏
query_content_en: After five days, my hand hurts terribly! Sleepless nights!! Numbness and swelling.
query_content_zh: 五天了手疼的厉害！彻夜难眠！！麻木肿胀

responses.content_en: You can take anti-inflammatory medicine to help with the pain and swelling. The numbness is may be from the swelling or possible nerve damage. If that does not improve over time, I would recommend that you see a Neurology or Hand Surgery specialist for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 您可以服用抗炎药物来帮助缓解疼痛和肿胀。麻痹感可能是由于肿胀或可能的神经损伤造成的。如果这种情况没有随着时间的推移而改善，那我建议您咨询神经科或手外科专家进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: How many times should a minor wound be dressed?
query_title_zh: 请问一下，微型小伤口需要换几次
query_content_en: How many times should a minor wound have its dressing changed?  It’s a small area that scabbed over but got injured again. Today, the dressing stuck to it, and the clinic told me to change it again in two days. Should I keep changing it? Please help.
query_content_zh: 请问一下，微型小伤口需要换几次药，就是一小块面积结痂后再次创伤，今天换药都跟药布粘一块了，诊所还让我两天后再换一次，到底还该换吗，请大家帮帮

responses.content_en: Dressing changes can be performed one to two times per day.
responses.content_zh: 敷料可以每天更换一到两次。

responses.content_en: There is no included picture of the actual wound.  Typically, dressings can be changed once a day.  To help with dressings that are stuck to the wound, you may apply water to the dressing to help loosen it.
responses.content_zh: 这里没有显示伤口的照片。通常伤口包扎物要每日更换。如果包扎物粘附到伤口时，你可以用水来把它松开。

query_content_en: It has been three days. I can have small movements but it hurts when I bend.  There is slight swelling for the glass cut wound. If I don't move, then it does not hurt.
query_content_zh: 三天。能微动弯曲疼痛。是玻璃割伤微有肿胀。不动不痛

responses.content_en: The pain is likely due to the inflammation as it is still healing. It should resolve with time but may take up to 4 weeks. Continue performing gentle range of motion exercises with the finger a few times a day to prevent muscle stiffness.
responses.content_zh: 疼痛可能是由于炎症引起的，因为它仍在愈合过程中。随着时间的推移，疼痛应该会消失，但可能需要多达4周。继续每天轻柔地进行几次手指的活动范围练习，以防止肌肉僵硬。

query_title_en: Here is the two blister from this afternoon
query_title_zh: 【求助】今天下午新磨出来的两个血泡
query_content_en: It popped itself
query_content_zh: 已经自己破了

responses.content_en: Keep area clean with soap and water and cover with a dry dressing. It may take 2-4 weeks to cover with new skin
responses.content_zh: 保持区域清洁，用肥皂和水清洗，并覆盖干燥的绷带。可能需要2到4周才能长出新皮肤。

query_title_en: I just fell and noticed the layer underneath is white. Is this the subcutaneous tissue?
query_title_zh: 刚才摔了一跤，才知道欺负下面一层是白色的，这一层是皮下组织吗？

responses.content_en: Yes, this is the subcutaneous layer called the dermis.
responses.content_zh: 是的，这是称为真皮的皮下层。

responses.content_en: Laceration/abrasion with violation of the epidermis and exposed dermis.  Unable to fully visualize if there is violation of the dermis.  Depending on the size and depth of the wound may benefit from suture repair.  Would recommend initial thorough cleaning with warm soapy water.  Should have tetanus shot updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 伤口有撕裂/擦伤，表皮己受侵损和真皮己外露。未能完全看到真皮层是否己受侵损。根据伤口的大小和深度，可能需要缝合修复。建议用温和肥皂水彻底清洗。如果破伤风注射己過期，亦要重新注射疫苗。

query_title_en: Got it while treating a corn; it will take a long time to heal. Will it leave a pit? Can someone kindly explain?
query_title_zh: 打鸡眼的时候打到的，要好久才能长起来，回有坑吗，求好心人讲解。
query_content_en: How is the wound healing? Thanks.
query_content_zh: 伤口长的怎么样，谢谢

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并涂抹干燥的绷带。

query_title_en: Can any surgical doctor take at look? Thank you.
query_title_zh: 求外科大夫看下，谢谢啦
query_content_en: I kicked myself coming down the stairs. The skin on the great toe was injured. I did not cleaned the wound at the time besides soaking it in baijiu alcohol. Should I do a cleansing now? Will it heal if I do so?
query_content_zh: 下楼梯时踢到的，大脚趾皮肤损伤，当时没有清理伤口只是白酒泡了一下，现在要重新清理吗？这样能长好吗？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation as there may be an infection. In the meantime, perform local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的医院进行进一步评估，因为可能存在感染。在此期间，请进行局部伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: Can an expert help me decide if I need to go to the hospital?
query_title_zh: 求大神帮忙看下 这要不要去医院
query_content_en: This injury happened exactly a week ago. That night, after getting hurt, I immediately rinsed it with frozen Yibao. The next day, I applied red solution and disinfected it. However, the wound is on my knee, and in the past week, I’ve gone running five times. After running, yellow pus appears. I haven't let it get wet during showers, but the blood has kept coagulating, and now it has become a large piece of clotted blood. Should I continue using the red solution? I've applied it three times (yellow fluid). Should I keep using the medicine, and how long will it take to heal?
query_content_zh: 这是刚好一个礼拜前的伤了 那天晚上伤了以后我立刻用冰冻的怡宝冲 第二天用红药水 然后去消了毒 可是伤口位于膝盖 这一个礼拜我有5天在跑步 跑完步后会出黄色的浓 洗澡没有碰过水 但是血液一直凝固 现在变成了一大块凝固的血液 我还要不要继续用红药水 还有 我用这个药水涂了三次（黄色液体） 还要继续用这个药水吗 几时能好

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation as there may be an infection if there is pus.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的医院咨询医生，因为伤口周围的发红可能表明有感染。

responses.content_en: I am not sure what the red solution is; however, I would recommend applying a bacitracin ointment and a form gauze dressing to the wound as it heals. I would recommend washing the area with warm soapy, water gently to keep it clean. ￼
responses.content_zh: 我不确定红色的溶液是什么；然而，我建议在伤口愈合时使用杆菌肽软膏和纱布包扎。我建议用温肥皂水轻轻清洗该部位，以保持清洁。

query_title_en: My heel is cut, how should I treat it?
query_title_zh: 脚后跟已经被划伤求告知如何处理
query_content_en: Should I cut it off?
query_content_zh: 要不要把它剪掉

responses.content_en: You can use a pair of sterilized scissors to trim the dead skin off. Perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 你可以使用一把消毒过的剪刀修剪掉死皮。进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素药膏并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: The skin appears to have come off. You may cut the skin off depending how deep the wound is, however I would recommend doing this as sterile as possible if you are to do this at home. I would recommend then, placing a xeroform dressing and bacitracin ointment if the skin is still healing.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤似乎已经脱落了。你可以根据伤口的深度把皮肤切掉。但是，如果你在家做这件事，我建议尽可能无菌地进行。如果皮肤仍在愈合，我建议使用XEROFORM敷料和杆菌肽软膏。

query_title_en: My wound hasn't healed after more than a month. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 我的伤一个多月没好呢？怎么办

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as it appears that you may have an infection.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的急救中心进行进一步评估，因为您可能有感染的迹象。

query_title_en: I can't tell if it's healing.
query_title_zh: 不知道活了没
query_content_en: I cut it off. I applied a bandage... That wound is a bit red. Not sure if it's healing.
query_content_zh: 切掉了。有贴上的。。那块肉有点红。不知道活了没

responses.content_en: The wound is healing as expected. Continue local wound care.
responses.content_zh: 伤口的愈合进展正常。请继续进行局部伤口护理。

query_title_en: Need help.
query_title_zh: 求帮助
query_content_en: Three days ago, I scraped my ankle on a stone while helping someone move things. It bled a bit and I ignored it. Should I get a tetanus shot? Any advice?
query_content_zh: 三天前 帮人搬东西 脚踝不小心蹭到石头 蹭破皮 流了点血 当时没有在意 后来想想是不是要打破伤风啊！？ 大神在吗？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you get a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the last 5 years. Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with gauze and a bandage.  Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种。继续每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用纱布和绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Avoid iodine. Does not appear to need stiches.  If tetanus not up to date would recommend updating.  Can treat with local wound care, keep clean with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 避免使用碘，不需要缝合。如果破伤风疫苗未更新，建议补接种。可以进行局部伤口护理，保持清洁，并用干敷料包扎。

responses.content_en: The wound itself appears to have stopped bleeding and healed appropriately but there is a surrounding area of green/brown dried discharge which may have been dried blood/dirt. I would recommend cleaning the area with saline and dressing it. If you had your tetanus shot recently (last 5 years) then you do not need another vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口本身似乎已经止血并正常地愈合。但周围有绿色/棕色的已干燥的分泌物，可能是已干燥的血液/污垢。我建议用生理盐水清洁该部位和包扎好。如果你最近（过去5年）接种了破伤风疫苗，那么你就不需要再接种疫苗了。

query_title_en: Accidentally scratched.
query_title_zh: 不小心蹭到的
query_content_en: It has been two days. I only put bandits to it. How should I treat it?
query_content_zh: 两天了 只贴了创可贴 要怎么处理

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素药膏并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: I would recommend cleaning the area with warm soapy, water, and applying bacitracin ointment as well as a xeroform dressing.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水清洁该部位，并涂抹杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料。

query_title_en: Help, do I need to use gauze in this case?
query_title_zh: 求帮助，请问这个情况还要不要用纱布
query_content_en: It has been two to three days. I had changed the gauze for few times. Now I used hydrogen peroxide to disinfect the site. Is it possible to leave the gauze off.
query_content_zh: 两三天了，之前换过几次纱布，现在用双氧水消了下毒，可不可以不裹纱布了

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage but can leave bandage off if scab forms. If pus drains, seek evaluation in urgent care.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥的绷带敷好，但如果结痂，就不需要包扎。如果有脓液流出，请在急救中心寻求评估。

query_title_en: Hello everyone, should I pull off the skin after my ankle gets scraped, or just let it heal as it is?
query_title_zh: 大家好，请问脚腕擦破皮后是把皮揪下来还是就那么长着好
query_content_en: It's a bit dirty, haha.
query_content_zh: 有点脏，呵呵

responses.content_en: You can trim off the excess skin with sterilized scissors or leave it alone and it will likely fall off over time.
responses.content_zh: 您可以用消毒过的剪刀剪掉多余的皮肤，或让其自行脱落，这通常会随时间脱落的。

query_title_en: I didn't know how I got this wound sometime back but it ddin't get better. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 前一段时间不知道怎么搞的出来个伤口，一直不见好转，应该怎么办
query_content_en: Here’s a picture of the wound. It doesn’t scab over at all, and once when it finally did, it started oozing pus.
query_content_zh: 上图，根本不结壳，有一次好不容易结了结果流脓

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be fairly deep ulcer although unclear as to what part of the body or what the initial mechanism of injury was.  Needs additional clinical information to provide further recommendations.  On the singular attached picture there does not appear to be secondary signs of infection.  Will likely need long-term wound care including wet-to-dry dressing changes.
responses.content_zh: 不大清楚伤口是在身体那一部位和受损机制，不过似乎很深。需要多一些临床资料来决定治疗建议。从这一张照片，看不到有感染的次要症状。可能需要用包括湿敷转换干敷等的长期的伤口护理。

query_title_en: Can an expert help me take a look? Thanks
query_title_zh: 求神医帮我看下。谢谢^ω^
query_content_en: Cut by a bottle. How many days until the stitches can be removed?
query_content_zh: 被酒瓶割的。。几天能拆线。。

responses.content_en: The stitches along the wrist can be removed after 7 days. The stitches along the finger can be removed after 10-14 days.
responses.content_zh: 手腕上的缝线可以在7天后拆除，手指上的缝线可以在10-14天后拆除。

responses.content_en: Regarding the clinical question, sutures to the upper extremity can typically be removed in 7 to 14 days.  No overt evidence of secondary infection.
responses.content_zh: 有关临床医学问题：在上肢的缝线一般在７至１４曰内可以除去。没有明显的继发感染。

query_title_en: Picture of the wound
query_title_zh: 伤口有图
query_content_en: A few days ago, it seems I got bitten by something while sleeping. It was swollen for 2-3 days and slightly painful to touch. Since it was on my back, I didn't pay much attention to it. After the swelling went down, my family pointed it out, and I checked it in the mirror. Could anyone take a look at it?
query_content_zh: 前几天睡觉好像被什么东西咬了，肿了2-3天，碰到就微痛，因为在背后没在意，肿胀消了后，家人提醒我，我照镜子看到伤口，万能的吧友给看看

responses.content_en: Resolving skin irritation. No need for further wound care.
responses.content_zh: 愈合期間的皮肤刺激。无需进一步的伤口护理。

query_title_en: The abrasion wound have not improve for two weeks. Can someone give me a suggestion? Thank you.
query_title_zh: 擦伤伤口 二周不见好转 各位大神支支招吧 谢谢了

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage. It may take 2-4 weeks to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并涂抹干燥的绷带。伤口可能需要2到4周完全愈合。

query_title_en: My finger was hit by the electric fan, and the tissue was everted out
query_title_zh: 手指被电扇打到，肉都翻出来了。。。
query_content_en: I did some compression to push the tissue back inside. The outter layer had grown back together, but a lump had formed, and it is changing color. What should I do, is it infected. Pleas help.
query_content_zh: 我给摁回去了，现在外面一圈基本长上了，但是开始鼓包，还变色了。。。怎么办是不是感染了啊。。。求助大家。。。

responses.content_en: This is a subcutaneous hematoma and does not appear to be infected. Continue to wash area with soap and water and apply a dry dressing daily. Monitor for signs and symptoms of infection like redness or discharge.
responses.content_zh: 这是皮下血肿，目前没有感染的迹象。继续使用肥皂和清水清洗该区域，并每天使用干敷料。注意观察感染的迹象和症状，如发红或分泌物。

responses.content_en: If there is significant redness, warmth, and pain there could be an infection called a felon developing in the finger. It is difficult to fully tell on the included singular picture however if it is not painful, red, or fluctuant then the likelihood of infection is lower.
responses.content_zh: 如果有显注变红、发温和疼痛，手指内可能己出现一种叫重罪犯的感染。从单一的照片上很难掌握全面的情况。可是如果没有疼痛、发红或其它变动的话，感染的可能性会降低。

query_title_en: Is this wound serious? Fell off a motorcycle.
query_title_zh: 这个伤口严重嘛？摩托车摔的
query_content_en: It’s been ten days, and the scab on the not so serious knee has already fallen off (I actually pulled it off myself, but it didn’t bleed). But why is it so purple? On the other knee, I’ve applied iodine and ointment, but it’s not getting better. Can someone with the knowledge take a look to see if it is serious? Do I need to go to the hospital?
query_content_zh: 已经10天了吧。一边膝盖没有这么严重已经结痂脱落了（其实是被我扯掉的，但是没流血），但是为什么会这么紫。另外一边，我什么碘酒啊，药膏啊都涂过就是不见好。请懂的人看一下这个严重吗，要去医院吗？

responses.content_en: The intense color is due to granulation tissue, which is normal. For the scab, no need to apply further products. Allow it to be left open to air. Consult a doctor if you develop signs of infection such as fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, swelling, pain, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 这些深颜色是由肉芽组织引起的、是正常的。己结痂的地方便不再需要用药物了。不用覆盖，让它接触空气。如果有受了感染的病徵，例如发烧、发冷，作闷、作呕、发红、发肿、疼痛、持续出血或流脓便要去看医生。

query_title_en: For those who understand please take a look, is this pus discharge caused by the dressing
query_title_zh: 请懂的人帮忙看下，这是不是敷料的作用导致的流脓
query_content_en: My mother scraped off the skin when she fell. It did not recovere after 10ish day painting the wound with betadine. I took her to the hospital. The doctor said they would need to remove the scar. The facility doctor from our reigion said they are unable to treat the wound, and direct us the the faclity at this WeChat.
query_content_zh: 我妈本来是摔破皮，擦碘伏擦了十几天还没好，我就带她去医院看，医生说要挖掉结痂皮，我们这里小地方的医院的医生说没办法处理，就叫我们去微信里这个

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a General Surgery or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您看普通外科或整形外科的专家，讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be relatively large soft tissue injury with delayed healing.  The wound may heal over time by secondary intention with granulation and significant scarring.  Does not appear to be overt evidence of secondary infection at this time.  For chronic wound care, you should keep the wound clean, monitor for signs of infection, and cover with Xeroform/Adaptic and topical antibiotic ointment.  May require surgical revision for scar removal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是较大的软组织损伤，愈合延迟。伤口可能通过开放性愈合形成肉芽组织，并伴有明显的瘢痕。目前无明显的继发感染迹象。对于慢性伤口护理，你应保持伤口清洁，监测感染迹象，并用Xeroform/Adaptic和局部抗生素软膏。如需去除瘢痕，可能需要手术。

responses.content_en: Unclear if the color is due to the betadine use, would recommend debridement to evaluate the wound further as this may not heal spontaneously.
responses.content_zh: 不清楚颜色是否是由于使用聚维酮碘造成的。建议清理伤口、以进一步评估。伤口可能不可以自然愈合。

query_title_en: Is this almost healed?
query_title_zh: 请问这是快要好了吗？

responses.content_en: It may take another few months for full healing.
responses.content_zh: 完全愈合可能还需要几个月的时间。

responses.content_en: The wound is partially healed, there is granulation tissue forming. This may take a few weeks to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已部分愈合，肉芽组织形成。这可能需要几周的时间才能完全愈合。

query_title_en: What should I do. Do i need to get stitches
query_title_zh: 这怎么办呐，用不用缝针

responses.content_en: The wound already appears to be closed. No need for stitches.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎已经闭上。不需要缝合。

query_title_en: After removing stitches, why is the area around the wound peeling?
query_title_zh: 伤口拆线后 伤口附近怎么起皮啊

responses.content_en: This can be part of the normal healing process due to new tissue and skin growing underneath.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是愈合过程的一部分，由于新的组织和皮肤在下面生长。

responses.content_en: I would recommend applying a topical emollient to the area to reduce the dryness as it heals.
responses.content_zh: 我建议在该部位涂抹外用润肤剂，以减少愈合过程中的变得太干。

query_title_en: Can I walk in this condition?
query_title_zh: 这个刚能走路吗
query_content_en: Stitches removed two days ago, had three stitches. Can I walk now in this condition?
query_content_zh: 刚拆线两天，缝了三针，现在这个情况能走路了吗？

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing well and you should be able to walk as long as it does not cause you pain.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合良好，只要不会引起疼痛，您应该可以行走。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing well after suture removal.  There is a small chance of wound dehiscence with extreme range of motion and care should be taken with ambulation.  Would recommend using topical antibiotic ointment and avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, iodine, or hydrogen peroxide.
responses.content_zh: 拆线后伤口愈合良好，但在进行大范围动作时有轻微的伤口裂开风险，行走时需小心。建议使用局部抗生素软膏，并避免酒精、碘或双氧水等干燥剂。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to have come together, I would recommend applying dressing to the wound, however I think you can start to walk. Limit friction to the area and/or scrubbing the area aggressively.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎已经愈合，我建议给伤口敷上包扎料。但我认为你可以开始走路了。减少该部位发生摩擦、和/或减少用力擦洗该区域。

query_title_en: It's urgent. I'm waiting for the advice.
query_title_zh: 急急急，在线等
query_content_en: Yesterday morning, I fell off my bike. The physician used rivanol to dress the wound and gave me a tetanus shot along with some anti-inflammatory drips. However, I can't go to the hospital today due to some issues. I plan to treat the wound myself. Can such a wound be managed this way?
query_content_zh: 昨天上午骑车摔了，然后昨天医生用利凡诺帮我敷了，还打了破伤风，挂了消炎药水，但是今天有事去不了医院，打算自己再来处理伤口，不知道这样的伤口能

responses.content_en: This abrasion can be cleaned with soap and water daily and a dry dressing applied.
responses.content_zh: 该擦伤可以每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: My finger was injured and half of the finger tip was numb
query_title_zh: 手指受伤，指尖一半麻木
query_content_en: The first joint of the index finger was accidently scratched. The wound was quiet deep. It has been two days. Now the index finger tip proximal to the wound site is still very numb. Anyone know whats happening in this?
query_content_zh: 食指第一关节处不小心划伤了，伤口挺深的，两天了，现在食指指尖离伤口比较近的地方依然特别麻木，请问什么情况

responses.content_en: Clean wound daily with soap and water and apply a dry dressing. The numbness is likely due to trauma of one of the nerves that run to the tip of the finger along the edges of the finger. It will likely take months for the numbness to resolve but may not completely return to normal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并使用干燥敷料。麻木可能是由于指尖边缘的神经受到创伤引起的。麻木恢复可能需要数月时间，但可能无法完全恢复正常。

query_title_en: Will this leave a scar?
query_title_zh: 这个会不会留疤急
query_content_en: This is from today riding a vehicle, I fell on my knee
query_content_zh: 今天骑车子摔的，摔了膝盖

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if a scar will occur as it depends on how the body heals itself.
responses.content_zh: 很难说是否会留下疤痕，因为这取决于身体如何自我愈合。

query_title_en: Just started working and accidentally hurt my leg, should I go to the hospital for stitches?
query_title_zh: 刚上班不小心伤到腿了，哪位朋友进来看看是不是要去医院缝针？

responses.content_en: No stitches necessary as the dermis is intact. Consider tetanus shot if it has been 5 years since your last one.
responses.content_zh: 因为真皮还是完好， 所以不需要缝针。 如果您在过去5年以外接种过破伤风疫苗，则考虑重新接种。

query_title_en: Just a question, what should I do to get this wound heal quicker?
query_title_zh: 请问一下，这个伤口怎么样能愈合快些

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation in urgent care. If there is an infection or foreign material in the wound it will delay wound healing.
responses.content_zh: 建议在急救中心进行评估。如果有感染或异物， 伤口可能会延迟修复。

query_title_en: How long will this take to heal? Just scraped it this morning.
query_title_zh: 多久能好？今早刚刚擦伤的

responses.content_en: It can take up to 4-8 weeks for healing.
responses.content_zh: 愈合时间可能需要4到8周。

responses.content_en: Very poor image quality and unable to fully visualize the wound.  Unclear if the surrounding discoloration is due to the initial injury.  There appears to be a central area of abrasion/ulceration.  Needed additional clinical context and higher quality images to give additional recommendation.
responses.content_zh: 图像的质量很差，未能覌察到伤口。不大清楚周边的褪色是否由初期受伤导致。似乎存在有一个磨损/溃疡的中心区域。需要更多临床医疗资料和质素好一些的图像以提供进一步的建议。

query_title_en: I got six shots of anti-biotics on my butt since I was fallen from the scooter, and I have to take medicine everyday.
query_title_zh: 骑车摔伤打了6次屁股消炎针。天天吃消炎药。
query_content_en: What should I do? It has been forteen days but no heal.
query_content_zh: 14天了还是这样子。该怎么办。

responses.content_en: It may take up to 8 weeks for healing but there is no sign of infection at this time. Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口可能需要长达8周才能愈合，但目前没有感染迹象。请继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并用绷带包扎。

responses.content_en: No overt signs of secondary infection.  Wound appears to be ulcerated with some granulation tissue present.  Given that it appears to be on the foot it would likely require a lengthy period of time for healing.  To promote healing, avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  Keep the area covered with a nonadherent dressing and apply topical antibiotic ointment to the wound.  You may change the dressing daily.
responses.content_zh: 无明显的继发感染迹象。伤口表现为溃疡，并有部分肉芽组织。由于伤口位于足部，预计愈合时间较长。为促进愈合，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。保持伤口覆盖无粘连敷料，并在伤口上涂抹抗生素软膏，可每日更换敷料。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be healing well at this time, this will take some time to heal. I would recommend soaking the area in warm soapy water to help prevent infection.  I would dress the wound with bacitracin ointment and xeroform dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口现在似乎痊愈得很好，这需要一些时间才能完在愈合。我建议将伤口浸泡在温肥皂水中，以帮助预防感染。我会用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料包扎伤口。

query_title_en: I bumped my knee and the scar that formed is now red, swollen and draining pus, what should I do?
query_title_zh: 膝盖嗑伤后结痂流脓红肿 怎么办

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation as your symptoms may indicate an infection.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的医院进行进一步检查，因为您的症状可能表明有感染。

responses.content_en: If the wound is draining pus, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person for a incision and drainage. You can also soften up the scab by soaking your hand in warm soapy, water to encourage further drainage.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口正在流脓，我建议你亲自去看医生、进行切口和引流。你也可以把手浸在温肥皂水里软化结痂，以帮助进一步排液。

query_title_en: Injured by glass.
query_title_zh: 玻璃弄得
query_content_en: Disinfect with saline, apply Yunnan Baiyao powder, and bandage. Is that okay?
query_content_zh: 用盐水消毒，再涂云南白药粉，包扎，可以么

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation in urgent care for stitches to close lacerations.
responses.content_zh: 建议到紧急护理诊所缝针、以把撕裂部份缝合。

query_content_en: Why is that spot turning yellow? It wasn't like this a few days ago.
query_content_zh: 那块有一点发黄是怎么回事？前几天还没有

responses.content_en: The yellow area is due to bruising, which can be normal due to the trauma.
responses.content_zh: 黄色区域是由于淤血，这可能是由于外伤造成的正常现象。

query_title_en: It has been ten days since my finger tips was cut
query_title_zh: 指头切伤10天了
query_content_en: What should I do if I feel pus inside
query_content_zh: 感觉里边有脓水怎么办

responses.content_en: If there is pus within the wound, I recommend that you go into the hospital to have the wound re-opened as the pus needs to be washed out and antibiotics given.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口内有脓，我建议您去医院将伤口重新打开，因为脓需要清洗并且需要使用抗生素。

responses.content_en: Unable to give specific recommendations given the poor quality of the pictures however it appears that there is a laceration to the finger pad.  If the you are feeling significant pain, pressure, and fluctuance, there is likely a developing felon which will need incision and drainage as well as oral antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 由于图片质量较差，无法提供具体建议，但似乎有指腹的撕裂伤。如果你感到明显的疼痛、压力和波动感，可能是正在形成的指端脓肿，需进行切开引流并使用口服抗生素。

responses.content_en: I would recommend soaking your finger in warm soapy water several times a day to help with the drainage from the wound. You would also likely benefit from incision and drainage of the wound.If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你每天用温肥皂水浸泡手指几次，以帮助伤口引流。切开伤口和引流对你可能有帮助。如果你的破伤风疫苗已過期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Please help take a look.
query_title_zh: 求大家帮忙看下
query_content_en: After using medication for over a month, my leg has healed to this state. Suddenly, it's started to sting, and it hurts when I step down. Does anyone know what’s going on?
query_content_zh: 用了一个多月的药，现在腿修复成这样，这两天突然开始刺痛，脚掌踩下去也痛？谁知道怎么回事？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation given these new symptoms.
responses.content_zh: 鉴于这些新症状，我建议您去最近的急救中心进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: Need help
query_title_zh: 求解阿，
query_content_en: I applied erythromycin ointment. How long will this kind of wound take to heal? It's been three days since I fell.
query_content_zh: 我抹的红霉素软膏，像这样的创伤多久能好阿，摔完过了三天了。

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. It may take up to 6-8 weeks for healing. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。愈合可能需要6至8周。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be secondarily infected but would recommend cleaning wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing dressing.  Tetanus should be updated if not up to date.  Will take multiple weeks to heal and there will likely be scarring.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有继发感染，但建议每天用温肥皂水清洗三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。愈合可能需要数周，并且可能会留下疤痕。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be infected, and topical erythromycin may not be sufficient. Please see a physician in person to determine whether the wound would benefit from incision and drainage, if there is infection in the joint space, and if oral antibiotics are warranted.
responses.content_zh: 这个伤口似乎已受感染了。外敷使用红霉素可能不足够了。请亲自去看医生，以确定伤口是否需要切口和引流、关节间隙是否有感染，以及是否需要口服抗生素。

query_title_en: Need help...
query_title_zh: 求解…
query_content_en: I've had a scrape below my knee for over a month. Whenever the wound dries and I accidentally broke it, pus comes out. It’s not healing, even though I’ve been using hydrogen peroxide and iodine to disinfect it every day and has been taking anti-inflammatory medicine. Why isn’t it healing? The white powder is sulfa.
query_content_zh: 我膝盖下面伤口擦伤已经一个多月了 伤口一干 不注意的时候弄破就会有脓水流出来 迟迟不能愈合 我每天都有用双氧水和碘伏消毒伤口 还有吃一些消炎药 为什么迟迟不能愈合？白色的粉末是磺胺

responses.content_en: The abrasion may be infected. There is yellow crusting around the edge of the wound. Recommend evaluation in urgent care
responses.content_zh: 擦伤部位可能已被感染。环绕在伤口周边已有黄色结壳/痂。建议到紧急护理诊所造一个评估。

query_title_en: Could any experts tak a look at it?
query_title_zh: 求大神看看
query_content_en: I got cut by a knife two days ago. I disinfected it with alcohol and applied Yunnan Baiyao powder. Why isn't it scabbing over? Why isn't it healing?
query_content_zh: 我前天被刀划伤了 用酒精消毒了 会用云南白药药粉涂了 为什么不结疤呢。怎么好不了我

responses.content_en: The wound is healing slowly and a scab can take 1-2 weeks to form. Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily  and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口在缓慢的愈合，可能需要1-2周才能结痂。继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Bleeding under the nail
query_title_zh: 指甲内出血
query_content_en: My thumb nail was smashed, and it was bleeding under the nail. It has been a day, now the blood has became black. Will this nail fall off?
query_content_zh: 大拇指指甲被砸，指甲内出血，一天过去了，现在血变黑了，就问这指甲会不会脱落

responses.content_en: If there was no damage such as a cut to the nail itself, the nail will not likely fall off.
responses.content_zh: 如果指甲本身没有受到损伤，例如没有被割伤，指甲不太可能脱落。

query_title_en: Asking for advice
query_title_zh: 求解答
query_content_en: What's happening? What treatment options are there? I moved house a couple of days ago and have been walking a lot. The swelling has gotten worse, and now it’s extremely painful.
query_content_zh: 这个是啥毛病，想问问有啥治疗方法，我前两天搬家，跑路比较多，就越来越肿了，现在简直太疼了

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as you may need treatment with incision and drainage as well as antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心接受进一步检查，您可能需要接受切开引流治疗以及使用抗生素。

responses.content_en: Given the swelling to the toe as well as the redness, there is concern for development of a paronychia which is an infection of the toenail which typically requires incision and drainage.  You may try conservative management with soaking the affected digit in warm soapy water 3-5 times a day for 10 to 15 minutes at a time which may soften the cuticle and allow for spontaneous drainage.  However, if symptoms are getting worse, you likely need incision and drainage.
responses.content_zh: 由于脚趾的肿胀和发红，需留意甲沟炎的发生，这是一种指甲感染，通常需要切开引流。你可尝试保守治疗，将患趾浸泡在温肥皂水中，每天3-5次，每次10至15分钟，以软化甲缘并促进自发引流。然而，如果症状加重，可能需要切开引流。
