responses.content_en: This appears to be paronychia to your nail that may benefit from incision and drainage to the area. You should soak the finger in warm soapy water to help with wound drainage and prevent infection.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是指甲的甲沟炎，伤口切开和引流可能对此有帮助。你应该把手指浸在温肥皂水中，以帮助伤口引流、防止感染

query_title_en: I fell off my bike last night and just applied some disinfectant.
query_title_zh: 昨晚骑车摔倒，就弄了点消毒之内的。
query_content_en: Now I'm worried about scarring. I've already had my front tooth pulled out, so that's no longer an issue. I don't want any more regrets.
query_content_zh: 现在就担心会留疤，门牙已经拔掉了，已经无所谓了，我不想再留下太多遗憾。

responses.content_en: There is no way to prevent scarring or hypertrophic scar. Scar remodeling takes approximately one year and will soften and fade over time. Clean wounds with soap and water daily. If you experience spreading redness or pus seek eavluation in urgent care.
responses.content_zh: 无法预防疤痕或增生性疤痕。疤痕重塑大约需要一年，并会随时间流逝逐渐软化和淡化。每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口。如果出现红肿扩散或有脓液，请寻求急诊评估。

query_title_en: Is it normal for a wound to become black?
query_title_zh: 伤口发黑正常吗

responses.content_en: This can be normal and is likely due to the blood collecting under the skin, called a hematoma. But consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是正常的，并且有可能是由皮肤下血液聚集造成的，这也称为血肿。但如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: How should I treat this?
query_title_zh: 怎么处理

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation in urgent care for cleansing of wound and stitches.
responses.content_zh: 建议在急救中心评估后清洗伤口和缝合。

query_title_en: The wound healed two months ago but is still red. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 伤口好了两个月了，还是红红的怎么办

responses.content_en: You can try over the counter scar treatment gels and patches but I would recommend that you see a Dermatology specialist to discuss further treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 您可以尝试使用非处方的疤痕治疗凝胶和贴片，但我建议您咨询皮肤科专家，讨论进一步的治疗方案。

query_title_en: How should I treat this kind of wound?
query_title_zh: 这种伤要怎么处理？
query_content_en: How should I treat this kind of wound?
query_content_zh: 这种伤要怎么处理？

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation in urgent care for cleansing of wound and stitches.
responses.content_zh: 建议在急救中心评估后清洗伤口和缝合。

query_title_en: Urgent help needed
query_title_zh: 急求方法
query_content_en: Are there any ideal topical medication for hands like this, that have skin tear from repetitive labor
query_content_zh: 像这样的手经常在干活导致的破皮裂开有什么好的药涂吗？

responses.content_en: Apply moisturizing ointment or cream as much as possible on the hands. You can try over the counter hydrocortisone 1% cream 2 times a day for 1 week to help speed up the healing.
responses.content_zh: 尽可能在手上涂抹保湿软膏或乳霜。您可以尝试使用1%的氢化可的松乳膏，每天2次，持续1周，以帮助加快愈合。

query_title_en: Can someone take a look to see if this require treatment?
query_title_zh: 各位大神看看这个需要处理不
query_content_en: I got crash onto an advertisement board that has a metal lining. Do I need suture or special treatment? How likely will it leave a scar
query_content_zh: 被一个铁边的广告牌撞的，需要缝针或者特别处理吗，以后留疤的几率大不大

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar. Since it is located on the face, sutures may help decrease this possibility. I would recommend a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the past 5 years. Use sunscreen or wear a hat when outdoors to minimize sun exposure to the area.
responses.content_zh: 很难判断是否会留下疤痕。由于伤口位于面部，缝合可能有助于降低留下疤痕的可能性。如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种。外出时使用防晒霜或戴帽子，以尽量减少该区域的日晒暴露。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully appreciate if there is any underlying laceration or just an abrasion present.  If there is a laceration with tissue gapping, would recommend suture repair for scar minimization.  Otherwise local wound care with topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing is likely sufficient.  Gentle cleaning of the wound with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily is recommended.  For scar minimization, avoid UV exposure for up to 1 year.
responses.content_zh: 目前无法明确判断是撕裂伤还是仅为擦伤。如果是有组织受损的撕裂伤，建议缝合以减少瘢痕形成。否则局部伤口护理、使用抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料可能就足够了。建议每天1至3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗伤口。为减少瘢痕形成，建议在一年内避免紫外线照射。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say based on the image provided, based on the depth of the injury you may either need sutures or a adhesive glue to bring the edges of the wound together. It may leave a scar, I would recommend avoiding sunlight to the area and applying appropriate sunscreen to reduce the likelihood of scarring.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难说。根据受伤的深度，你可能需要缝合或使用粘合剂将伤口边缘粘在一起。它可能会留下疤痕，我建议避免阳光照射到该区域，并涂抹适当的防晒霜以减少疤痕的可能性

query_title_en: Could any experts take a look at what's happening?
query_title_zh: 请专业人士帮忙看看这怎么回事
query_content_en: The scar was healing well, so I didn't pay much attention to it. But today, I noticed that something inside the wound is bulging out.
query_content_zh: 之前疤愈合的挺好的，一直就没在意，今天不经意间一看，伤口里面鼓出来了。

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation at the hospital. There is a possible foreign body in the wound that may impair wound healing.
responses.content_zh: 建议去医院进行评估。有一个异物在伤口里面，伤口有可能会延迟康复

query_content_en: There is pus formation inside this wound. I don't want to go to the hospital, how should I treat it?
query_content_zh: 这个有伤口里边化脓了，我不想医院，怎么么处理

responses.content_en: If there is pus within the wound, I recommend that you go into the hospital to have the wound re-opened as the pus needs to be washed out and antibiotics given.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口内有脓，我建议您去医院重新打开伤口，因为脓需要清洗并且需要使用抗生素。

responses.content_en: Need more clinical context given the appearance of this wound.  Appears to be surgical in nature and if there is a recent operation and if noting pus formation, there would be concern for deeper infection.  Additional clinical questions that would be important include: is there any swelling present, systemic signs of infection including fever, chills, and what is the range of motion at the joint as well as what the underlying surgical procedure was.
responses.content_zh: 根据伤口的外观，需要更多的临床背景信息。伤口看起来像是手术造成的，如果近期接受了手术并注意到有脓液形成，则需警惕更深层的感染。需要进一步了解的临床问题包括：是否存在肿胀、是否有系统性感染症状（如发热、寒战）、关节的活动范围，以及具体的手术情况。

responses.content_en: If you do not want to go to the hospital and the wound is spontaneously draining, I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water several times a day to help with softening the skin to improve wound drainage.
responses.content_zh: 如果你不想去医院和伤口可以自行排液，我建议每天用温肥皂水浸泡几次，以帮助软化皮肤，改善伤口排液。

query_content_en: The skin on my hand got scraped, and now the wound looks like this. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 手上擦破皮后伤口变这样了，怎么办？

responses.content_en: The wound looks like there may be some pus.  I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as this may be a sign of an infection.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来可能有一些脓液。我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心接受进一步评估，因为这可能是感染的迹象。

responses.content_en: Appears to be a post traumatic callus.  Keep the area moisturised and do rang of motion exercises to prevent it from getting stiff.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是创伤后形成的胼胝。保持局部湿润，并进行关节活动练习以防止僵硬。

responses.content_en: There appears to be an area of infection in the finger, that would benefit from drainage and potentially antibiotics. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether the infection has spread to the area in the joint given the infection is over the joint.
responses.content_zh: 手指似乎有一部份已受感染。进行引流和服用抗生素对你可能有帮助。因为感染是在关节上，我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定感染是否已经扩散到关节部位。

query_title_en: Friends, please advise! Will my fingernail grow back?
query_title_zh: 各位神医求指教！！我的指甲还能长出来吗？
query_content_en: Two of my nails got crushed two months ago. One came off, and a small piece of flesh is sticking out. The nail hasn't grown back yet, but part of the nail bed has. Will they grow back? How long will it take? Will they be deformed?
query_content_zh: 两个指甲被夹了，两个月了，一个已经被弄掉，有一小块肉凸出来，指甲也没重新长出来，两个指甲根部都出来了。还会长吗？要多久？会畸形吗？

responses.content_en: The nail will likely grow back but can take up to 6 months. It is a good sign that the nail bed is growing back. It is difficult to say if there will be a deformity but no further intervention is recommended at this time.
responses.content_zh: 指甲很可能会重新长出来，但可能需要长达6个月时间。指甲床正在生长是一个好的迹象。目前难以判断是否会有变形，但暂时不需要进一步的介入。

query_title_en: Wound won't heal after the metal plate removal surgery.
query_title_zh: 取钢板手术后伤口不愈合

responses.content_en: It will heal on its own but may take up to 8 weeks. Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 它会自行愈合，但可能需要长达8周。请继续进行局部伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: My leg got burned, and the wound started suppurating.
query_title_zh: 我的腿被烫伤了，现在伤口化脓了
query_content_en: My leg got burned, and the wound started suppurating.
query_content_zh: 我的腿被烫伤了，现在伤口化脓了！眼看要过年了怎么办好啊？可以把炎可宁片磨成粉抹在上边吗？

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation at the hospital for antibiotics and cleansing of wound.
responses.content_zh: 建议在医院评估并取抗生素和伤口清洗。

query_title_en: Injury after waking up
query_title_zh: 睡醒后受的伤

responses.content_en: Continue performing local wound care with washing area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 你要继续用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抗生素药膏和用绑带缠好

query_title_en: How should this be treated? Urgently need help!
query_title_zh: 这种应该怎么处理，急求帮助啊啊啊啊
query_content_en: A piece of flesh was cut off my foot. The gauze stuck to the wound, and I used iodophor to wet and remove it. What should I do now? I have Yunnan Baiyao.
query_content_zh: 脚被削了块肉，之前纱布和伤口粘一起了，我用碘伏蘸湿搞下来了，现在应该怎么做啊，，我现在有云南

responses.content_en: Continue to clean with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 继续用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并覆盖干燥的绷带。

query_title_en: Friends, can you take a look at my wound and see if it's serious?
query_title_zh: 朋友们帮我看看我这个伤口问题大吗
query_content_en: Friends, can you help me check if my wound is serious? I fell off a unicycle on Thursday and got a scrape. At first, I thought it was no big deal, but yesterday morning, I went to the hospital to have it thoroughly cleaned, and now I notice there's still some white inside the wound. Is this a serious? Thank you.
query_content_zh: 朋友们帮我看看我这个伤口问题大吗，周四骑独轮车摔的，脱皮了，本来以为没事了，昨天上午去医院让医生给彻底清洗了，现在看见里边还有点白，问题大吗？谢谢

responses.content_en: The white inside the wound is normal healing tissue. No concerns at this time. Continue washing the area with soap and water regularly.
responses.content_zh: 伤口内的白色部分是正常的愈合组织。目前没有问题。请继续定期用肥皂和清水清洗该区域。

query_title_en: Can this raised scar be smoothed?
query_title_zh: 这个凸出的伤疤还能消平吗？
query_content_en: This scar has been here for two months, and sometimes it itches a lot.
query_content_zh: 这个伤疤都两个月了，现在有时候伤疤处很痒。

responses.content_en: Hypertrophic scar will decrease in size and smooth within 1-1.5 years. If cosemesis is still a concern recommend evaluation by plastic surgery.
responses.content_zh: 增生性瘢痕会在一到一年半内缩小和软化。如果外观是个问题，请咨询整形外科进行瘢痕修复。

query_title_en: Injury just below the knee, can someone knowledgeable take a look?
query_title_zh: 膝盖下边一点受伤，请懂这个的帮忙看一下
query_content_en: On the night of March 30, 2016, I drank too much and fell. My knee hurt but not serious. I was not concerned because it did not bleed and it was just a little swollen. The next day, I could walk and climb stairs just fine, so I didn’t go to the hospital. On the night of April 22, 2016, I went running with friends, and my knee started hurting. Can someone knowledgeable give me some advice?
query_content_zh: 2016.3.30 晚上喝多了摔倒了，当时膝盖有点疼但不严重，没出血有点肿没当回事， 第二天走路上楼梯没有影响一直没去医院看病，2016.4.22 晚上和朋友跑步，感觉膝盖疼，请贴吧里懂的看一下？

responses.content_en: You may have injured a ligament or tendon. You can provide external support with an ACE wrap or knee brace but consult a doctor if your symptoms worsen or persist.
responses.content_zh: 你可能伤到了韧带或肌腱。你可以使用弹性绷带或护膝提供外部支撑，但如果症状加重或持续，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: What should I do to heal a scraped knee quickly?
query_title_zh: 膝盖擦伤怎么快速愈合
query_content_en: A 12-year-old child went out to play and didn't see the step, accidentally fell, and scraped the skin on the left knee. Is there any way to make the wound heal faster?
query_content_zh: 12岁小孩出去玩，没看到坎，不小心摔倒了，左膝盖磨破了皮，怎么快速痊愈。

responses.content_en: This is a superficial abrasion. Clean with soap and water daily and air dry. The wound should heal in 1-2 weeks.
responses.content_zh: 这是一个浅的擦伤。每天用肥皂和水清洗，并自然晾干。伤口应在1到2周内愈合。

query_title_en: It is my first time posting here. Can anyone please take a look?
query_title_zh: 第一次在这里发帖 都进来看看嘛
query_content_en: I fell from riding a vehicle. For this type of injury, do I need to go to the hospital for bandaging? Truthly speaking, it hurts so bad that I cannot sleep
query_content_zh: 骑车摔倒了 像这样的需要去医院包扎吗？说实话真的好痛 痛的都睡不着

responses.content_en: If your pain cannot be controlled with over the counter medication, feel free to go to the hospital. Otherwise, continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 如果您的疼痛无法通过非处方药物控制，请前往医院。否则，继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓液分泌等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Appear to be multiple injuries to arm and palm with abrasions to skin.  Given mechanism of injury, you would likely benefit from evaluation for underlying fracture.  Wounds do not appear to be amenable to suture repair however local wound care, cleaning, and dressing with topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.  Would recommend updating tetanus shot if not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 手臂和手掌处有多处伤口，伴有皮肤擦伤。考虑到受伤机制，建议接受评估是否存在骨折。伤口不适合缝合，但可局部伤口护理、清洁，并使用局部抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料包扎。如破伤风疫苗未更新，建议补接种。

responses.content_en: I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water to promote drainage from the wound. I would recommend also dressing the wound with bacitracin ointment and xeroform dressing. If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend receiving a tetanus vaccination. It may be beneficial to go to the hospital for in person education and management of the wound.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水浸泡伤口，以促进伤口引流。我还建议用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料包扎伤口。如果你的破伤风疫苗已逾期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。亲自去医院、接受有关伤口的知织和护理会对你有帮助。

query_title_en: Seeking treatment methods.
query_title_zh: 求治疗方法
query_content_en: Hello, everyone. I fell off my bike and have been injured for 8 days. Every day for twice a day, I disinfect with hydrogen peroxide, then iodine, and finally apply red ointment. But it’s not getting better, which is making it more urgent. Should I continue changing the dressing and treating it twice a day, or should I leave it to heal on its own and scab over? I need advice. Thank you.
query_content_zh: 大神们好，我是骑车摔伤的，有8天了，每天用双氧水消毒，然后碘伏消毒，最后涂红药水，每天两次，但是就是不见好，所以比计急…请问大神们，我还需要继续每天两次换药治疗吗，还是放任不管，自己会结疤就好…求支招…谢谢了

responses.content_en: Wound is not infected. Clean with soap and water daily and apply clean dressing. Wound will take 2-4 months to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口未受感染。用肥皂清洗。

query_title_en: Should I get a tetanus shot for my wound?
query_title_zh: 大家看我的伤口用打破伤风吗？

responses.content_en: Puncture wound of the sole of the foot. Recommend obtaining tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 脚底刺伤。建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Please help me, what should I do about this?
query_title_zh: 求吧友看看，这该怎么办
query_content_en: Cut my hand on a tile, why is it turning black?
query_content_zh: 手划到瓷砖上了，为什么会发黑

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage. The wound is covered by the lacerated skin and will heal in 2-4 weeks.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥的绷带敷好。伤口由撕裂的皮肤覆盖，预计在2到4周内愈合。

query_title_en: Injured, waiting for an response.
query_title_zh: 受伤了，在线等回复
query_content_en: While working a part-time job, a heavy block crashed on my hand. Can someone tell me how serious this is? It happened at 11 a.m., and now my finger is swollen. I can move the joint a little, but I can’t make a fist. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 我在做兼职时被配重石块砸到了手，看看问题大不大，上午11点砸的，现在手指很肿，关节可以轻微活动，不能握拳，给点意见怎么办

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation as you need imaging to rule out a fracture.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的急诊诊所接受进一步治疗，可能需要进行影像检查。

query_title_en: Is this a serious issue?
query_title_zh: 问题大不大
query_content_en: Finger got crushed by a rock, can't make a fist. How should I treat it?
query_content_zh: 手指被石块砸了，不能握拳，怎么处理

responses.content_en: Seek evaluation in ER for hand Xray to evaluate for fracture given cannot make a fist.
responses.content_zh: 手部无法握拳 要到急诊室Ｘ光造影手部以确定是否有骨折。

query_title_en: What’s really going on?
query_title_zh: 真怎么回事
query_content_en: Cut my hand a few days ago, just below the thumb. Why has it turned purple?
query_content_zh: 手前两天割伤了，就在大拇指下方，可是这为什么会发紫

responses.content_en: This is likely due to the blood under the skin changing color, which can be normal. There is no infection at this time. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由于皮肤下的血液变色造成的，这是正常现象。目前没有感染。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: This situation isn't serious, right? I applied some Mupirocin.
query_title_zh: 这种情况不严重吧，摸了百多邦
query_content_en: This situation isn't serious, right? I applied some Mupirocin.
query_content_zh: 这种情况不严重吧，摸了百多邦

responses.content_en: The abrasion to the knee has viable granulation tissue in the wound bed but there is fibrinous exudate around the wound concerning for possible infection. Clean daily with soap and water. Recommend evaluation in urgent care to assess for infection.
responses.content_zh: 膝盖擦伤的伤口床上有健康的肉芽组织，但伤口周围有纤维渗出物，可能存在感染的风险。每天用肥皂和水清洗。建议去急诊寻求评估，检查是否有感染。

query_title_en: Fell on the cement while playing ball, the wound is quite deep.
query_title_zh: 水泥地上打球摔了一下 伤口挺深
query_content_en: At first, the wound was white, but now, after a week of changing bandages at the school clinic, it feels like every time the bandage is removed, the edges of the scab that had started to form are ripped off again. It’s really frustrating. Should I keep going to change the bandage? This is how it looked at the beginning and how it looks now.
query_content_zh: 刚摔的时候都是白色的 现在一个礼拜了 每天去学校医务室换纱布 感觉每次都是把边缘部分刚结好的痂给撕了 很苦恼 该不该再去换纱布了？ 一开始的 现在的

responses.content_en: If there is no further drainage, I would recommend that you leave it open to air to allow the wound to dry and scab.
responses.content_zh: 如果没有进一步的分泌物，我建议你让伤口暴露在空气中，使其干燥并结痂。

responses.content_en: Instead of applying bandages, I would recommend applying a non-adhesive dressing like a xeroform gauze to stop ripping off the newly scabbing over skin. I would also recommend dressing the wound with a bacitracin ointment.￼
responses.content_zh: 我建议使用非粘附性敷料，如XEROFORM纱布、而不是绷带，以防止皮肤的新结痂因绷带而剥落。我还建议用杆菌肽软膏包扎伤口。

query_title_en: Is this infected?
query_title_zh: 请问这是感染了嘛？

responses.content_en: There is no surrounding redness or pus in the wound to suggest an infection.
responses.content_zh: 伤口周围没有红肿或脓液，未见感染迹象。

query_title_en: What medicine can I use?
query_title_zh: 这可以用什么药？
query_content_en: This is urgent,  anyone please tell me. Thank you.
query_content_zh: 大家快告诉我一下好急，谢谢谢谢谢谢

responses.content_en: Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: What's wrong with my wound?
query_title_zh: 我这怎么了
query_content_en: Why hasn't it scabbed after several days?
query_content_zh: 怎么好几天都不结痂

responses.content_en: Not all injuries scab. Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. If you are concerned about an infection or have other symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding, consult a doctor and have this evaluated in-person.
responses.content_zh: 并非所有伤口都会结痂。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果您担心感染或出现其他症状，如发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血，请咨询医生并进行面对面的检查。

responses.content_en: Difficult to visualize the wound however appears to be a small avulsion/ulceration on the dorsal surface of the thumb.  Would recommend avoiding any drying agents such as iodine, hydrogen peroxide, or alcohol as this will impede healing.  You may use topical antibiotic ointments and nonadherent dressing.  Please clean the wound with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily.
responses.content_zh: 图片质量有限，伤口难以清晰辨认，但似乎是拇指背部的小撕脱伤或溃疡。建议避免使用碘、过氧化氢或酒精等干燥剂，以免影响愈合。你可以使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料，每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口1至3次。

responses.content_en: There appears to be some mild discoloration to this wound, unclear if this is due to a cleaning ointment you have applied. Given that it is an area that is highly mobile, this will take additional time to heal and will not easily scab over.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎有轻微的色变；不清楚这是否是由于你涂了清洁软膏。鉴于这部位活动频繁，这将需要额外的时间来愈合，并且不容易结痂。

query_title_en: Is this okay? It feels like my skin hasn’t healed properly.
query_title_zh: 这样没事么，总感觉皮肤没有愈合好

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing well. It may take up to 6-8 weeks for full recovery.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合良好，完全康复可能需要6至8周的时间。

responses.content_en: Appears to be some discoloration from suture repair and healing process.  Can do tissue massage and use scar cream to help with healing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口在缝合和愈合过程中出现了一些颜色变化。可以按摩组织并使用疤痕修复霜来帮助愈合。

responses.content_en: Your laceration appears to be healing very well. This is what typical wound progression would appear like, we would recommend continuiung to keep the area clean and away from sunlight.
responses.content_zh: 你的伤口似乎愈合得很好。这就是典型的伤口进展情况，我们建议继续保持该部位清洁，和远离日照。

query_title_en: help, can my nail still grow?
query_title_zh: 求助这个还能长指甲吗？

responses.content_en: Your nail will likely grow back but may take up to 6 months.
responses.content_zh: 您的指甲很可能会重新长出来，但可能需要长达6个月的时间。

responses.content_en: Significant nail injury with possible injury to the nailbed.  Would likely recommend removal of the remaining part of the nail and stenting of the nailbed to encourage proper nail regrowth.  If there is injury to the germinal matrix at the nailbed, the fingernail may not regrow.  Would recommend keeping covered with antibiotic ointment and a nonadherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 指甲受伤严重，可能涉及甲床损伤。建议移除剩余部分指甲，并支撑甲床以促进指甲再生。如果甲床的生长基质受损，指甲可能无法重新生长。建议使用抗生素软膏并用无粘连敷料覆盖。

responses.content_en: There appears to be an underlying hematoma underneath your nail, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to have the nail completely removed to promote further healing of the wound. Depending on where the damaged the nail bed occurred, it is possible that the nail may not grow back.
responses.content_zh: 你的指甲下面似乎有一个表面下的血肿。我建议你亲自去看医生，把指甲完全拔掉，以促进伤口的进一步愈合。根据甲床受损的位置，指甲可能不会长回来。

query_title_en: Will it still grow nail
query_title_zh: 还会长指甲吗？
query_content_en: I was slammed by the door pretty hard. There was bruises in the bottom half immediatly. The bruising expanded to everywhere the second and third day. The third day was very distended, and I let out some of the blood myself for three times. It then no longer appeared distended. It has been 10ish days, and it no longer hurt. However, the nail does not grow any more, and the nail is sticking to the blood underneath it, and then the nail had separate from the skin around it. I have clipped the top part of the nail that was separating from the skin. The nail on the side and on the back seems intact with the skin. My nail typically grows very quick, but this have been ten days without growth. Will it stop growing? What should I do.
query_content_zh: 被门挤了下，挤的比较重，当时就指下面那半瘀血了，第二天到第三天就全部瘀血了，第三天特别涨，然后自己放血，放了三次，不涨了，现在已经十多天了，不疼了，但是一直不长指甲，指甲和里面的瘀血紧紧的粘在一起，然后指甲前面和肉分离了，我把前面分离的指甲都剪掉了。指甲两侧和后面都没有分离的迹象。我指甲是长得特别快的，但是这个十天左右了，一直不长，会不会不长了，应该怎么办

responses.content_en: The nail will grow back but it may take up to 6 months.
responses.content_zh: 指甲会长回来，但可能需要长达6个月的时间。

responses.content_en: There appears to be a underlying hematoma underneath your nail. I would recommend being seen by a physician to have your nail removed and to prevent or inflammation to your nail
responses.content_zh: 你的指甲下面似乎有一个血肿。我建议你去看医生，把指甲拔掉，防止指甲发炎。

query_title_en: A wound on my leg that's been there for years feels worse recently.
query_title_zh: 腿上多年的伤口最近感觉更加严重了
query_content_en: Please let me know if there are any good methods to resolve this.
query_content_zh: 求告知有没有什么好方法能解决

responses.content_en: This is likely a non-healing chronic venous stasis ulcer. Recommend evaluation with vascular surgery to evaluate lower leg veins.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是一种未有治愈的慢性静脉淤滞性溃疡。建议由血管手术专科来评估小腿静脉情况。

query_title_en: It has been about half month since the suture removal. The area where the needle used to be is still red.
query_title_zh: 拆线已经半个多月了  针眼还是红
query_content_en: It has been about half month since the suture removal.  Why are there redness at the needle insertion site?
query_content_zh: 拆线已经半个多月了，针眼一直红是怎么回事？

responses.content_en: Wound is healed. There are small scar from the sutures and likely some residual iritation from the sutures themselves. This will fade over time.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已愈合。缝线留下的小疤痕和缝线本身引起的轻微刺激可能会存在，但这些情况会随时间流逝逐渐消退。

query_title_en: The wound is not scabbing for a while.
query_title_zh: 好几天了一直不结痂
query_content_en: A few days ago, I accidentally scraped myself and didn't pay attention to it. Now it's inflamed and not scabbing. Will it heal on its own, or do I need to use something specific?
query_content_zh: 前几天不小心蹭伤了，没注意发炎了，现在成这个样子，也不结痂，不管自己能长好么，还是需要用什么

responses.content_en: It will heal on its own. Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 它会自行愈合。请继续进行局部伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: It's been 5-6 days since the stitches were removed. Will the wound heal properly?
query_title_zh: 这个  拆线五六天了   能长住吗
query_content_en: It feels like the scab formed because the stitches split after they were removed. Is it really healing?
query_content_zh: 感觉结甲子那里是拆线后 裂开才结的 是不是真的长住了 ？？？

responses.content_en: The wound is healing but may take longer due to the scab.
responses.content_zh: 伤口正在愈合，但由于结痂可能需要更长时间。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to have come together well. I would recommend keeping the area clean and dry as it heals and avoiding sunlight exposure to reduce scarring. ￼
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合得很好。我建议在愈合过程中保持该部位清洁干燥，避免阳光照射以减少疤痕。

query_title_en: After the wound is healed, will the lump resolve?
query_title_zh: 伤口好后有肉凸起会消吗？
query_content_en: After the wound is healed, will the lump resolve?
query_content_zh: 伤口好后有肉凸起会消吗？

responses.content_en: The lump usually will flatten and eventually go away over time but there is a possibility that it remains. If this occurs, you can see a Dermatology or Plastic Surgery specialist for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 肿块通常会逐渐平坦并最终消失，但也有可能会保留下来。如果出现这种情况，您可以去找皮肤科或整形外科专家进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: What should I do with this hole-shaped wound?
query_title_zh: 这种洞型伤口怎么办

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Need additional clinical context as to the initial injury although this appears to be a fairly deep wound with possible exposed muscle/subcutaneous fat.  Has the appearance of a chronic nonhealing wound given the wound margins.  Will likely need long-term wound care including wet-to-dry dressing changes or wound revision surgery.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎相当深 ， 肌肉和皮下脂肪可能己外露。 需要额外的临床医疗资料来了解最初的损伤情况。伤口边缘的状态显示有长期难愈合的伤损。需要长期的伤口护理、包括湿敷到干敷的包扎护理，和手术修复。

query_title_en: For this wound, will it heal faster if it's bandaged or unbandaged?
query_title_zh: 我这个伤口，包扎好的快还是不包扎好的快
query_content_en: It’s been bandaged for four days now, but it feels like it’s healing very slowly.
query_content_zh: 已经包扎四天了，感觉好慢啊

responses.content_en: This is a deep cut down to subcutaneous tissue. Healing may take up to four weeks. Wash daily with soap and water and apply a dry bandage to cover the wound. The bandage does not make if heal faster but will protect the wound.
responses.content_zh: 这是一个深切伤，直达皮下组织。愈合可能需要长达四周。请每天用肥皂和水清洗，并涂抹干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。绷带不会使它加快愈合，但会保护伤口。

query_title_en: When will my poor child get well better?
query_title_zh: 我可怜的娃什么时候能好
query_content_en: The night before yesterday, I fell off a scooter. I cleaned the wound and got a tetanus shot. Now I'm using Mercurochrome, but my eye is more swollen than it was yesterday.
query_content_zh: 前晚从车上摔下来 消毒打了破伤风 现在擦红药水 眼睛比昨天肿了

responses.content_en: Recommend emergency room evaluation given swelling around the eye to rule out facial fracture.
responses.content_zh: 鉴于眼睛周围肿胀，建议急诊室评估以排除面部骨折。

query_title_en: Need help.
query_title_zh: 求帮忙
query_content_en: I scraped my knee, it healed but got infected and now there's a big blister with pus. How should I treat it?
query_content_zh: 膝盖擦伤，伤口好了后受感染，起了一个大泡，里面有浓，请问大家我该怎么处理。

responses.content_en: If there is pus within the wound, I recommend that you go into the hospital to have the wound re-opened as the pus needs to be washed out and antibiotics given.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口内有脓，我建议你去医院让伤口重新打开，因为脓需要清理出来并给予抗生素治疗。

responses.content_en: If there is pus training from the wound, I would recommend being seen by a physician to determine whether you need a incision or drainage from the wound.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口有脓液，我建议你去看医生，以确定你是否需要切口或伤口引流。

query_title_en: Fell down.
query_title_zh: 摔了一跤

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care by washing the area with soap and water and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗该区域，并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Need help.
query_title_zh: 【帮帮忙】
query_content_en: My son fell a week ago, and after scabbing on his elbow, he picked it off. Now it's like this. I applied Mupirocin, but it keeps oozing. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 我儿子一周前摔倒，肘部结疤后被他扣掉成这样了。擦的百多邦一直流水，怎么办？

responses.content_en: I would recommend you seek evaluation in urgent care for in person evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去急诊进行面对面的检查。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully evaluate the wound on the included picture.  For soft tissue injuries that are not amenable to suture repair, to promote wound healing, gently cleanse the wound 1-3 times a day with warm soapy water, avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine.  After cleansing wound apply topical antibiotic ointment and cover with a nonadherent dressing.  Tetanus shot should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 从照片上很难衡量伤口的情况。对于不适合缝合修复的软组织损伤，可以用温和的肥皂水每日清洗１－３次以促进愈合。避免使用如酒精、二氧化氢和碘等干燥剂。清诜伤口后涂上抗生素药膏、用非粘附性包扎物包好。如果破伤风疫笛注射免疫期己过，应注射破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: It has already scabbed over, but the surrounding area is red and swollen. Is it infected?
query_title_zh: 已经结痂了，周围红肿是不是感染
query_content_en: It has already scabbed over, but the surrounding area is red and swollen. Is it infected?
query_content_zh: 已经结痂了，周围红肿是不是感染了

responses.content_en: If the redness and swelling is new, that may be a sign of an infection. I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 如果红肿是新发生的，那可能是感染的迹象。我建议您去最近的急救中心进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: I bumped myself on the table corner, and almost lacerated the skin
query_title_zh: 磕到桌子棱角了，差一点破了

responses.content_en: Apply ice packs to the area for 20-30 minutes 2-3 times a day. Go to the hospital if you develop symptoms such as headache, dizziness, lightheadedness, nausea, vomiting, confusion, lethargy, feeling faint or actually pass out.
responses.content_zh: 每天将冰袋敷在患处20-30分钟，2-3次。如果出现头痛、头晕、昏厥感、恶心、呕吐、意识混乱、嗜睡、虚弱或晕倒等症状，请立即去医院。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be a laceration present however there does appear to be a hematoma.  Recommend conservative treatment with ice as needed.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 似乎没有撕裂伤，但存在血肿。建议保守治疗，需要時冰敷。避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。

responses.content_en: This appears to be a superficial hematoma, which should heal on its own, would likely benefit from warm compresses. This could be due to an underlying injury, I would recommend being evaluated if you are having any additional symptoms.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是浅层血肿，应该会自行愈合，热敷可能有帮助。这可能是由于下面有伤损。如果你有任何其他症状，我建议你由医护人员来进行评估。

query_title_en: #MyTiebaStory# Injury
query_title_zh: #我的贴吧故事#磕伤
query_content_en: Got hit while biking at six in the morning. My knee hurt so much I couldn't move it, but after a while, it went numb, so I thought it was fine and biked home. I applied Iodophor and Yunnan Baiyao powder, and then bandaged it, but now my knee is swollen with a big lump that feels like it has blood inside. I can't move my leg and it hurts a lot. Is this serious? The picture shows the injury right after it happened.
query_content_zh: 六点骑车被撞摔出去了 当时就知道膝盖疼不敢动，过一会膝盖木了就以为没事骑车回家了，擦了碘伏云南白药粉包扎了下，但是现在肿了个大疙瘩里面像有血，腿也不敢动疼的厉害 ，有没有事 ？图是刚磕的样子

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as this may be a hemarthrosis from your traumatic injury and you may benefit from imaging. In the meantime, apply ice packs to the area, elevate the leg and compress the area with an ACE wrap or wear a knee brace.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心进一步评估，因为这可能是由外伤引起的关节积血，您可能需要影像检查。在此期间，请在患处敷冰袋，抬高腿部，并使用弹力绷带压迫该区域或佩戴护膝。

query_title_en: Meibao patch.
query_title_zh: 美宝贴
query_content_en: Can I use a Meibao patch for this? I've been changing the gauze and medicine for a week, but there's no new skin growth.
query_content_zh: 这个可以用美宝贴吗？纱布换药一周不见长皮肤。

responses.content_en: This is a complex wound that is healing well. There is healthy granulation tissue in the wound. It may take another 8 weeks for the wound to be completely covered in skin. Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 这是一个复杂的伤口，愈合良好。伤口内有健康的肉芽组织。可能需要另8周才能完全长出皮肤。请每天用肥皂和水清洗并覆盖干燥的绷带。

query_title_en: Do I need to go to the hospital?
query_title_zh: 需要去医院吗？
query_content_en: The wound is about 5 cm wide and 3 cm long. I cleaned it with hydrogen peroxide, alcohol, and erythromycin ointment, and bandaged it. Do I still need to go to the hospital since the wound doesn't require suture?
query_content_zh: 创面5公分宽3公分长左右，我用双氧水酒精红霉素软膏清理了一下创面，包扎了一下，还需要去医院吗？因为这个伤口也不需要缝合

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with gauze and a bandage. No need to go to the hospital at this time but consult a doctor if you develop  symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用纱布和绷带覆盖。目前无需前往医院，但如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: How long will it take to heal?
query_title_zh: 这多久能变回来啊
query_content_en: How long will it take for this to heal?
query_content_zh: 这多久能变回来啊

responses.content_en: It may take anywhere from 2-6 weeks for healing.
responses.content_zh: 愈合时间可能需要2到6周。

query_title_en: Is it an external injury?
query_title_zh: 外伤吧
query_content_en: Does it need to be bandaged?
query_content_zh: 需不需要包？

responses.content_en: Continue performing local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you continue to have bleeding.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行局部伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果您继续出血，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: It's been two days since the stitches were removed. Can it get wet now?
query_title_zh: 拆线已经两天了可以沾水吗
query_content_en: It's been two days since the stitches were removed. Can it get wet now?
query_content_zh: 拆线已经两天了可以沾水吗

responses.content_en: You can get the area wet but try to avoid scrubbing too roughly.
responses.content_zh: 您可以让该区域变湿，但试着避免擦洗时用力过度。

query_title_en: I fell and braced myself with my hand, and now there's a bump. Can someone tell me what this is?
query_title_zh: 摔倒手撑地的时候手上挤出来个包 各位帮忙看看是怎么回事
query_content_en: It's the area marked in the red circle.
query_content_zh: 就是红圈的位置。

responses.content_en: This is likely a cyst caused from the trauma. If it causes you pain or discomfort, you can see a hand specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由外伤引起的囊肿。如果它给您带来疼痛或不适，您可以去看手部专科医生，讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be infected.  Likely post-traumatic seroma.  Would need more context to understand further.  Is it firm, fluid filled, how is range of motion at the wrist/hand.
responses.content_zh: 看起来没有感染迹象，可能是创伤后积液。需要更多信息来进一步判断。请确认伤口是否坚硬、是否有液体积聚，以及手腕/手部的活动范围。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on these images however there does appear to be a mildly raised area over the wrist. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether you need further imaging to evaluate for underlying fracture, infection, etc in the setting of a fall onto your hand.
responses.content_zh: 根据这些图像很确定情况。然而，手腕上似乎确实有一个轻微凸起的区域。这次跌倒牵涉到手部，我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定你是否需要进一步的造像来评估潜在的骨折、感染等状况。

query_title_en: It hurts after shower, and always itch. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 洗完澡就疼，还经常痒怎么办
query_content_en: The condition has been like this ever since the fall from the vehicle. I also often feel itchiness at the border. How can I flatten the scar?
query_content_zh: 骑车时摔的现在就这样了，边上还经常痒，怎么样才能让疤变平？

responses.content_en: This is a keloid scar. Consult a dermatologist to address the deloid - laser therapy or corticosteroids can be applied to flatten the scar.
responses.content_zh: 这是蟹足肿。请咨询皮肤科医生进行处理，可以通过激光治疗或使用皮质类固醇来平复疤痕。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be a hypertrophic scar/keloid.  If it is painful or the you would like cosmetic revision, would likely require surgical scar revision.
responses.content_zh: 似乎是增生性疤痕/疙瘩。如果有疼痛、或是你希望进行美容修复，那便须要外科疤痕复原手术了。

query_title_en: What should I do about this? Seeking for advice!
query_title_zh: 我这样该办，求助

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Dermatology or General Surgery specialist to discuss treatment options as the white circular area is likely pus and needs to be removed from under the nail.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去看皮肤科或普通外科专家，讨论治疗方案，因为那个白色圆形区域可能是脓，需要从指甲下去除。

responses.content_en: Your nail appears to have been split in half, you may need removal of your nail to help with healing and if there is an underlying hematoma. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to help with management of this.
responses.content_zh: 你的指甲似乎已经断裂成两半。你可能需要移除指甲来帮助愈合。如果表面下有血肿，我建议亲自去看医生，以帮助处理这个问题。

query_title_en: The doctor said it’s necrosis and needs a skin graft. Is it really necrosis?
query_title_zh: 医生说是坏死了还要植皮是坏死了吗

responses.content_en: Differential includes skin necrosis vs subcutaneous hematoma. Recommend evaluation in emergency room.
responses.content_zh: 鉴别诊断包含皮肤坏死或皮下血肿。建议在急诊室进行评估。

query_title_en: Why is the wound like this?
query_title_zh: 伤口怎么这样
query_content_en: Got cut by glass before New Year, took 4.5 months to heal. The new skin is dark and raised, not painful or itchy.
query_content_zh: 过年前被玻璃砸掉块皮 4.5个月了才好 现在伤口皮长出来了 但是好像颜色很深 还有点鼓鼓的 不疼不痒

responses.content_en: The wound is healing slowly and the skin appears to be normal. Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily  and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口在缓慢的愈合，皮肤看起来正常。继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Got a large bite from a cat.
query_title_zh: 被猫咬了一个很大的口子
query_content_en: A stray tabby cat, the one below, bit my index finger and left a big wound.
query_content_zh: 是只流浪的虎斑猫 ，就下面的这只 然后咬到我食指上了一个很大的口子:-)

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as you may need oral antibiotics and a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the past 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去最近的紧急护理中心进行进一步检查，因为你可能需要口服抗生素和破伤风疫苗，如果你在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Can I get a tetanus shot for this?
query_title_zh: 我这个能打破伤风针吗？
query_content_en: Yesterday, a screw scratched me and caused a bit of bleeding. I cleaned and disinfected it with iodine at the time. However, today it looks different. Could anyone give me some advice?
query_content_zh: 昨天被螺丝挂流血了，就一点，当时用碘酒消毒了。然后今天看又不一样了。大家提提建议吧。

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care to receive a tetanus vaccine and further evaluation. In the meantime, continue wound care with cleaning the area with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的急救中心接种破伤风疫苗并进行进一步评估。在此期间，继续伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗并涂抹抗生素软膏。

query_title_en: It's been 14 days since the stitches, and they were removed two days ago. How does it look?
query_title_zh: 缝针14天拆线两天了，看看长的怎么样
query_content_en: Please take a look.
query_content_zh: 帮忙看看

responses.content_en: The laceration is approximate but there is old blood along the edge of the wound under the skin. As the wound heals the skin at the edge may slough off. Continue to clean wound daily with soap and water and apply a dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 裂伤已闭合，但伤口边缘皮下有旧血液。随着伤口愈合，边缘的皮肤可能会脱落。继续每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并使用干燥敷料。

query_title_en: My knee area was caught by the screw on a metal door. The femur was slightly impacted and have a mild dent. How long does it take to heal?
query_title_zh: 膝盖附近被铁门上螺丝轧上，轻微碰到股骨，有稍微塌陷，多久好啊
query_content_en: The screw was somewhat moist. The wound image below is taken 17 days post the incident. How long will it take to heal? Will I get a scar?
query_content_zh: 有点湿的那个螺丝 下图伤口已17天了。。。 多久能愈合，会留下疤么

responses.content_en: It can take up to 8 weeks for healing. It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar as this depends on how your body heals the wound. I would recommend that you receive a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since the last one.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要长达8周的时间。是否会留下疤痕取决于您身体的愈合情况，目前尚难确定。如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，我建议您接种一针。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be a puncture wound possibly over an extremity joint.  Depending on the extent of puncture, would recommend additional evaluation for possible joint injury.  Puncture wounds take longer to heal and as it is reportedly 17 days post injury, would not recommend suture repair.  Instead, we recommend follow-up with medical professional, monitoring for signs of infection, and local wound care including coverage with topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.  Tetanus shot should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是在肢体关节上的穿刺伤。根椐穿刺损伤的程度，建议造一个关节损伤的额外评估。穿刺损伤需要长一些时间才能愈合。曾有报告需时长达１７日。这里不建议缝合修复。但建议与专科医护人员跟进，留意感染迹象，和进行受伤部位护理、包括涂上外敷抗生素药膏和用非粘附性包扎物包好。如果破伤风注射己過期，亦要重新注射疫苗。

query_title_en: Wound on the sole of the foot.
query_title_zh: 脚底板伤口
query_content_en: Had a minor surgery 20 days ago, still healing slowly but doesn’t seem inflamed. Can anyone who understands take a look? Thanks.
query_content_zh: 做个小小手术 二十天了 还是愈合慢 但是觉得没炎症 谁明白帮我看看 谢谢啦

responses.content_en: The wound can take up to 8 weeks for healing. Continue performing local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口可能需要长达8周才能愈合。继续进行局部伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: Can I ask a question? Is this a clavus or wart
query_title_zh: 请问一下，我这个是鸡眼还是疣？
query_content_en: It has hurt since a couple days ago. I can't even put my feet on the ground now. Can someone time me if this is a clavus or wart? If it a wart, what kind of wart is it? Thanks everyone.
query_content_zh: 前几天开始就各种疼，现在都没法落地了，麻烦各位告知一下这是鸡眼还是疣？如果是疣是哪种疣，谢谢大家

responses.content_en: If there are small red dots within the area, that is a plantar wart. If it does not contain these red dots, it is a clavus.
responses.content_zh: 如果该区域内有小红点，那就是跖疣。如果不包含这些红点，则为鸡眼。

query_content_en: It's healed but my hand is still a bit swollen. How can I reduce the swelling?
query_content_zh: 都长好了为什么手还有点肿啊？怎样可以消肿？？

responses.content_en: You can take over the counter anti-inflammation medicine, elevate the hand and/or apply an ACE wrap to help reduce the swelling.
responses.content_zh: 您可以服用非处方抗炎药物，抬高手部或使用弹性绷带来帮助减轻肿胀。

responses.content_en: Appears to be a laceration to the webspace between the first and second digits status post suture repair.  You do have a small hypertrophic scar.  In regards to the clinical question of persistent swelling, as long as you have been evaluated for any underlying bony injury, some degree of swelling is expected and will take time to resolve.  You can speed up swelling resolution by keeping the affected extremity elevated, applying ice, and gentle compression.  Additional gentle range of motion exercises and skin stretching will help the affected area.
responses.content_zh: 缝合修复后，第一和第二指之间的网状空间似乎有撕裂。你会有一个细小的增生性疤痕。有关持续的肿胀的问题：一定程度的肿胀预计会出现，需要时间来解决；重要的是要对你进行潜在骨骼损伤的评估。你可以通过抬高受影响的肢体、敷冰和轻轻按压来加速肿胀的消退。做一些运作范围内的柔和运动，和把皮肤拉伸，会有助于受影响的地方。

query_title_en: My shoulder was bitten! The skin is scratched! It’s been a few days!
query_title_zh: 肩膀被人咬伤！破皮！有几天了！
query_content_en: Shoulder was bitten! The skin is scratched! It’s been a few days! Do I need a tetanus or rabies shot?
query_content_zh: 肩膀被人咬伤！破皮！有几天了！需要打破伤风嘛？或狂犬针？

responses.content_en: Tetanus shot is necessary. Rabies shot indicated for wild animal bites - raccoons, skunk, foxes.
responses.content_zh: 需要破伤风疫苗。野生动物咬伤，例如浣熊、臭鼬、狐狸，需接种狂犬病疫苗

query_title_en: Urgent! Seeking advice: my shoulder was bitten by someone!
query_title_zh: 急问！各位大神！肩膀被人咬伤！
query_content_en: Urgent! Seeking advice: My shoulder was bitten, and the skin was scraped. It's been a few days. Do I need a tetanus shot or a rabies shot? Can someone please tell me? [photo]
query_content_zh: 急问！各位大神！肩膀被人咬伤！破皮！有几天了！需要打破伤风嘛？或狂犬针？谁能告诉我【图片】

responses.content_en: You do not need a tetanus vaccine if you have received one in the past 5 years. No need for a rabies vaccine unless you know that the person who bit you has rabies. I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care as you may benefit from antibiotics to prevent an infection.
responses.content_zh: 如果您在过去5年内接种过破伤风疫苗，则不需要再次接种。除非您知道咬您的那个人有狂犬病，否则不需要接种狂犬病疫苗。我建议您去最近的急救中心，因为您可能需要抗生素以预防感染。

query_title_en: Can someone help me see if this is almost healed?
query_title_zh: 谁能帮我看一下，不知道是快好了
query_content_en: Can someone help me see if this is almost healed or getting worse?
query_content_zh: 谁能帮我看一下，不知道是快好了还是严重了！

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing well. But consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合良好，但如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓液分泌等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Appears to be chronic healing wound with scabbing present.  No secondary signs of infection.  Would recommend avoiding any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, and iodine.  You may do local wound care with emollients and topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正緩慢愈合，有结痂，但无感染的迹象。建议避免使用酒精、双氧水和碘等干燥剂。你可进行局部伤口护理，使用润肤剂和局部抗生素软膏，并搭配无粘连敷料。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be healing appropriately, it is forming granulation tissue/Scabbing over. If the redness around the area continues to worsen, I would recommend going to the hospital to be evaluated by provider.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合，肉芽组织/结痂正在形成。如果该区域周围的发红情况继续恶化，我建议去医院接受提医护人员的评估。

query_title_en: Help, my feet is having intolerable pain. My feet had been hit by a car.
query_title_zh: 救命，脚痛的受不了。脚被车撞了
query_content_en: Help, my feet is having intolerable pain. My feet had been hit by a car, then became swollen. There was bruises in the early phase, now the bruise had been mostly resolved. It is still swollen, and I can't leave my leg down.
query_content_zh: 救命，脚痛的受不了。脚被车撞了，肿了，前期有於伤，现在散的差不多了。但还在肿，脚不能放低，一

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Podiatry specialist for further evaluation. In the meantime, you can take anti-inflammatory medication to help with the pain and swelling if not already doing so. Continue applying ice packs, wearing compression socks or use an ACE wrap and elevating the foot.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去看足病科专家进行进一步的评估。同时，如果你还没有服用消炎药，可以服用来缓解疼痛和肿胀。继续使用冰袋、穿压缩袜或使用ACE绷带，并抬高脚部。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine what is causing the swelling. It is possible you have a underlying fracture, and it is important to evaluate for a blood clot given the swelling. ￼
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定导致肿胀的原因。你可能有下层的的骨折。因为有肿胀，要确定是否有血栓是很重要的。

query_content_en: Does this wound need to be exposed to air, and how long will it take to heal?
query_content_zh: 大家看这种伤口需不需要裸露，多久能长好

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water and OK to expose to air. Will likely take two months to heal.
responses.content_zh: 每曰用肥皂水清洁。伤口可外露在空气中。可能需要２星期才能愈合。

query_title_en: Seeking treatment methods
query_title_zh: 求治疗办法
query_content_en: I was unconscious, and on the way to the hospital, my toe got dragged on the road, losing a chunk of flesh. The doctor suggested grafting skin from another area, but I didn't go through with it and decided to heal it at home. The flesh grew back, but there's been constant discharge, and it won't scab over. Any suggestions? Whenever I use gauze, the flesh grows more, so I stopped bandaging it. I want it to form a scab.
query_content_zh: 由于昏迷了，在去医院的路上脚趾在路面拖一块没肉了，医生说要在其他地方割一块肉补，我没有，回家慢慢养，后来肉长出来了，就这样，这几天一直有液体流出，结不了壳。求个办法。一用纱布包起来就长肉，不敢包了。想让他结壳儿。

responses.content_en: The discharge is from the granulation tissue overlying the area. I would recommend that you consult a surgeon to discuss treatment options such as debridement and skin grafting.
responses.content_zh: 排出的液体来自覆盖该区域的肉芽组织。我建议您咨询外科医生，讨论清创和皮肤移植等治疗方案。

query_title_en: Can I tear this off?
query_title_zh: 我这能不能撕啊
query_content_en: Can I tear this off?
query_content_zh: 我这能不能撕啊

responses.content_en: You can either allow it to fall off on its own or try to remove it.
responses.content_zh: 您可以让其自行脱落，或尝试去除它。

query_title_en: Friends, my finger has turned blue. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 各位dalao，我手指发青了怎
query_content_en: Friends, my finger has turned blue. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 各位dalao，我手指发青了怎么办

responses.content_en: This is likely a crush injury to the finger with hematoma in the nail bed. Recommend Xray of the finger to evluate for fracture. The nail may take 4-6 weeks to regrow,
responses.content_zh: 似乎是在手指上的挤压损伤、并在指甲床上带有血肿。建议在手指部位进行Ｘ光造影、以断定有否骨折或撕裂。指甲需要４至６星期才可重新生长。

query_content_en: Does anyone have medical knowledge? My foot was pierced by a nail, and the pharmacy gave me basic treatment. I’ve been taking antibiotics for almost ten days, but pus has been coming out in the past two days, and my foot is a bit swollen. Is it infected?
query_content_zh: 勇士们，有懂医术的吗？脚被钉子扎了，在药店做了简单的处理，吃了将近十天的消炎药，这两天开始流脓水，脚还有点肿，是不是感染了？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the hospital for further evaluation as you may need a different antibiotic to treat the infection as well as a tetanus vaccine if you have not received one in the last 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去医院进行进一步检查，因为你可能需要更换抗生素来治疗感染，并且如果过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，可能还需要接种疫苗。

query_content_en: After an external injury, a blister appeared. How should I handle it to make it scab quickly?
query_content_zh: 外伤一段时间后，有水泡，现在怎么处理比较好。想快点结痂。

responses.content_en: apply dry dressing, wound is already clean and dry. No way to accelerate healing
responses.content_zh: 使用干敷料，伤口已经干净和干燥。没有办法加速愈合。

responses.content_en: Difficult to appreciate the wound on the attached picture given poor quality.  Unable to determine what part of the body is injured or what the mechanism of injury was.  In regards to the clinical question of blistering, there does not appear to be any laceration or secondary signs of infection.  Would recommend continued local wound care including gently cleansing the wound daily with warm soapy water, application of topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing as well as avoiding any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 图片质量很差，很难识别伤口。不能确定身体那部份受伤和受伤的机制。有关起了水泡的问题，似乎没有撕裂伤口和继发感染。建议在受伤部位进行护理，每曰用温和皂水轻洗伤口，涂上外敷抗生素药膏、使用非粘附性包扎物。避免使用例如二氧化氢、酒精、或是碘等干燥剂。

query_title_en: How does this injury look, everyone please take a look
query_title_zh: 这个伤情怎么样，大家看看

responses.content_en: You have a hematoma due to the injury. Continue resting, icing, wear compression socks or stockings or use an ACE wrap and elevating the leg when sitting or sleeping. It may take up to 8 weeks for healing.
responses.content_zh: 您因受伤而出现血肿。请继续休息、冰敷、穿着压缩袜或使用弹力绷带，并在坐着或睡觉时抬高腿部。伤口可能需要长达8周才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Appears to be significant bruising and swelling to the medial malleolus of the ankle with overlying abrasion.  No signs of secondary infection however given the amount of bruising there would be concern for underlying malleolus fracture.  Would recommend x-rays to evaluate for joint injury.
responses.content_zh: 内踝部位有明显的瘀伤和肿胀，伴有表面擦伤。目前无继发感染的迹象，但由于瘀伤的严重程度，需考虑内踝骨折风险。建议进行X光检查以评估关节损伤情况。

responses.content_en: This appears to be a superficial abrasion to the leg that appears to be healing well spontaneously.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是腿部的表面擦伤，似乎可以很好地自行愈合。

query_title_en: Can anyone tell me what is this? I saw this at a website
query_title_zh: 谁能告诉我这是啥？重口味吧看到的
query_content_en: Can anyone tell me what is this? I saw this at a website
query_content_zh: 谁能告诉我这是啥？重口味吧看到的

responses.content_en: This is a traumatic wound of lower leg. There is granulation tissue in the wound bed and surrounding swelling of the surrounding tissue.
responses.content_zh: 这是小腿的创伤性伤口。伤口床有肉芽组织，周围组织有肿胀。

query_title_en: While peeling an apple, I completely cut off a piece of flesh from my finger, and it bled a lot and wouldn't stop.
query_title_zh: 削苹果把手指上的一块肉完全削下来，当时哪个血涌出来，止不住。
query_content_en: While peeling an apple, I completely cut off a piece of flesh from my finger, and it bled a lot and wouldn't stop. So, at that time, I found the piece of flesh on the knife and placed it on the wound.
query_content_zh: 削苹果把手指上的一块肉完全削下来，当时哪个血涌出来，止不住。当时我就在刀上找到这块肉贴在伤口

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. The skin placed on the wound is likely held in place with clotted blood and will likely fall off with daily cleansing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。覆盖在伤口上的皮肤可能是由凝血而固定不动，随着每日清洗，可能会脱落。

query_content_en: What’s this thing on my second toe? It doesn’t look like a corn, and it’s a patch of dead skin, but it itches a lot. Ignore the third toe gap—I just removed a piece of dead skin.
query_content_zh: 第二个脚趾出的是什么东西？又不像鸡眼，而且是块死肉，但是又很痒，第三个脚缝请忽视，刚把个死肉疙瘩挖掉

responses.content_en: There is a wart on your toe. You can see your primary care provider, Podiatry or Dermatologist specialist to have it removed.
responses.content_zh: 你的脚趾上有一个疣。你可以找你的初级保健医生、足病科或皮肤科专家去除。

query_title_en: Please, knowledgeable friends, take a look. Thank you.
query_title_zh: 请懂的朋友帮忙看一下，谢谢。
query_content_en: Cut my hand while moving stones today, it's on the palm lines and I'm a bit worried. Experienced friends, can you help? Is it serious?
query_content_zh: 今天搬石头把手划伤了，因为在掌纹那里，我有点担心，有经验的朋友能否帮忙看一下要不要紧，万分感

responses.content_en: The wound is healing appropriately. The scar will soften over time and should not impede functioning of the joint. Keep clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口在合理的康复中。 疤痕会随时间软化并且不会影响到关节的功能。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥的绷带敷好。

query_title_en: Should I go to the hospital?
query_title_zh: 需要去医院吗
query_content_en: Should I go to the hospital?
query_content_zh: 需要去医院吗

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation in the hospital for finger Xray to evalute for fracture. The nail will take 4-6 months to regrow. Clean finger with soap and water daily and apply clean dressing.
responses.content_zh: 建议去医院进行手指X光检查，以评估是否有骨折。指甲需要4-6个月才能重新长出。每天用肥皂和水清洗手指，并使用干净的敷料。

query_title_en: Got my finger caught in the door, initially a small bruise, but now it's spreading. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 被门挤了 ，刚开始就那么一小块后来瘀血扩散了，现在该怎么办啊
query_content_en: I got my finger caught in a door, initially just a small bruise but now it's spread. What should I do? Any experts?
query_content_zh: 被门挤了 ，刚开始就那么一小块后来瘀血扩散了，现在该怎么办啊，有没有大佬懂的，请指教

responses.content_en: It is likely due to bleeding underneath the nail. If you are having pain and the injury occurred less than 24 hours ago, you can go to the nearest Urgent Care to have this evaluated and possibly drained. Otherwise you can take anti-inflammatory medications to help with any pain.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是指甲下的出血。如果您感到疼痛且受伤发生在24小时内，您可以前往最近的急诊诊所进行检查，可能需要引流。否则，您可以服用抗炎药物来缓解疼痛。

responses.content_en: Significant subungual hematoma to the fingernail which would likely benefit from trephination given its progression.  Nail will likely fall off and need to completely regrow.  Given the extent of the injury would also recommend imaging if there is any pain to the finger to rule out underlying fracture.
responses.content_zh: 指甲有明显的甲下血肿，鉴于其受损情况，可能需要钻孔排血。指甲会脱落和重新生长。考虑到受伤情况，如果手指有疼痛时建议造像，以排除下层有断裂/骨折。

query_title_en: Finger injury
query_title_zh: 手指受伤
query_content_en: It has been 10 days since my finger had a laceration. It still looks like this, is the condition severe?
query_content_zh: 手指被割伤十天了，仍然这样子，严重吗？

responses.content_en: Cleanse with soap and water and apply dry dressing. Wound does not look infected but seek evaluation for spreading redness or pus.
responses.content_zh: 用肥皂和水清洁伤口并敷上干燥的纱布。伤口看起来没有感染，但如果出现红肿或脓液，请寻求评估。

query_title_en: This was rubbed against each other during exercising. The middle portion has grown. How will this kind of wound heal. Will it fell off itself?
query_title_zh: 运动磨得一下  中间部分张上了  这种伤怎么愈合  会整个掉
query_content_en: This was rubbed against each other during exercising. The middle portion has grown. How will this kind of wound heal. Will it fell off itself?
query_content_zh: 运动磨得一下 中间部分张上了 这种伤怎么愈合 会整个掉吗

responses.content_en: This is a blister from exercise. Keep covered with dry bandage. The blister may pop and the skin was peel off in 2-4 weeks.
responses.content_zh: 这是因运动引起的水泡。保持用干燥的绷带裹好。在2到4周内，水泡可能会破裂并皮肤脱落。

query_title_en: Can someone check if the stitches can be removed now?
query_title_zh: 大家帮忙看一下，现在可以拆线了吗，
query_content_en: Can anyone help me check if the stitches can be removed now?
query_content_zh: 大家帮忙看一下，现在可以拆线了吗，

responses.content_en: If it has been 10-14 days since the stitches have been placed, they can now be removed.
responses.content_zh: 如果缝线已经放置了10-14天，现在可以拆线了。

responses.content_en: These stitches can likely be removed now. I would recommend being seen by a provider to have these sutures removed. ￼
responses.content_zh: 这些缝线现在可以拆除。我建议到医护人员处去拆除这些缝合线。

query_content_en: It’s been ten days since I got stitches on my leg. Does this kind of stitch need to be removed? I didn’t ask the doctor after the surgery nor the doctor mentioned it. And I can’t reach the doctor over the phone now.
query_content_zh: 吧里大神，腿伤缝合十天了，这种线用不用拆线啊！做完手术我也没问医生也没提...现在打医生电话也打不通

responses.content_en: The stiches placed do not dissolve. I would recommend that you go back to the hospital to have the stitches removed.
responses.content_zh: 缝合的线不会自行溶解。我建议你回医院取出缝线。

responses.content_en: Unclear location and what the initial wound was.  Was this a surgical wound or traumatic wound.  These appear to be silk/nylon sutures that will need to be removed but unclear based on wound description
responses.content_zh: 伤口的具体位置和初始情况不明确。不确定是手术伤口还是外伤。缝线似乎是丝线或尼龙线，需要拆除，但根据现有伤口描述无法完全确定。

responses.content_en: Assuming the purple color of the skin is due to a dye from surgery, the wound appears to have come together but it does not look like these sutures are necessarily dissolvable based on the image. I would recommend being seen in person by any physician to have these sutures evaluated for removal.
responses.content_zh: 假设皮肤的紫色是由手术中的染色物做成的，伤口似乎已经愈合。但根据图像，这些缝合线不一定是可自然溶解的。我建议你亲自去看医生，以检查这些缝合线是否可以拆除。

query_title_en: I'm really worried about my baby getting a scar, seeking help.
query_title_zh: 好担心宝宝留下疤痕，求助
query_content_en: Fell and scraped on a plastic item.
query_content_zh: 摔倒到塑料制品上擦的

responses.content_en: There is no way to prevent scarring or hypertrophic scar. Scar remodeling takes approximately one year and will soften and fade over time.
responses.content_zh: 无法预防疤痕或增生性疤痕。疤痕重塑大约需要一年，并会随时间流逝逐渐软化和淡化。

query_content_en: Got cut by a knife, thought it was fine, but after a few days, the wound healed with a dent. Will it scar? I'm very worried.
query_content_zh: 被刀割伤，以为没事，过了几天发现伤口愈合但是有个凹陷，会不会留疤，很担心

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar as this depends on how your body heals the wound.  Continue performing wound care by washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 很难确定是否会留下疤痕，这取决于您身体的伤口愈合情况。继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided, I would recommend decreasing sunlight exposure to the area and applying sunscreen as needed. At this time, it does not appear to have scarred very much.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难说。我建议减少该部位的阳光照射，并根据需要涂抹防晒霜。现在它似乎没有留下太多的疤痕。

query_title_en: Can I use a medicated plaster on this?
query_title_zh: 这种能贴膏药吗
query_content_en: Can I use a medicated plaster on this?
query_content_zh: 这种能贴膏药吗

responses.content_en: This abrasion is healed. There is no need to apply ointment or plaster.
responses.content_zh: 该擦伤已愈合，无需再涂抹药膏或贴上创可贴。

query_content_en: Got hit by a workpiece while working two days ago. Any doctors here? How should I handle it? Got some painkillers and circulation medicine from the hospital.
query_content_zh: 前天干活被工件砸伤了，有大夫吗，看看怎么处理，去医院开了一点止痛药，活血化淤的药

responses.content_en: Continue taking your medications as prescribed. Consider getting an x-ray to rule out a fracture if this was not done previously. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge as those are signs of infection.
responses.content_zh: 继续按照处方服用药物。如果之前没有过，可以考虑做X光检查以排除骨折的可能性。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物等感染迹象，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Large subungal hematoma.  Should obtain xrays to rule out fracture and likely needs trephination for pain control
responses.content_zh: 指甲下血肿，建议拍X光以排除骨折的可能，并可能需要穿刺减压以缓解疼痛。

responses.content_en: Given the color of the fingernail, there is concern for compromise of the blood vessels under your fingernail and potential necrosis of the nail. I would recommend being seen in person by a physician for debridement/potential removal of the nail to help with healing and prevent further damage to the nail.
responses.content_zh: 鉴于指甲的颜色，我担心指甲下的血管会受损、指甲可能会坏死。我建议你亲自去看医生、进行伤口清创/或移除指甲，以帮助愈合并防止指甲进一步受损。

query_content_en: Experts, my finger was cut by a knife last month. The stitches were removed half a month ago, but now I can't straighten the first joint of my thumb. What's going on? Is it serious?
query_content_zh: 大神们，上个月手指被刀割伤，都拆线半个月了 现在大拇指第一关节伸不直，是啥情况，严不严重

responses.content_en: This may be due to excess scar tissue over the wound. I would recommend that you see a Dermatology or Hand Surgery specialist for further treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由于伤口上过多的瘢痕组织造成的。我建议您去看皮肤科或手外科专家，寻求进一步的治疗选项。

query_title_en: I have a large swollen area from hitting the iron metal. It was injured on the 20th and had been five days since then. There are yellow things surround.
query_title_zh: 磕到铁柱子了肿了一大块，20号磕的五天了，周围有黄色的东西是
query_content_en: I have a large swollen area from hitting the iron metal. It was injured on the 20th and had been five days since then. What are the yellow things surrounding the wound? Is the bone alright? I did not go to the hospital to check.
query_content_zh: 磕到铁柱子了肿了一大块，20号磕的五天了，周围有黄色的东西是什么？骨头没事吧，没去医院看。。。

responses.content_en: The yellow surround tissue is a resolving bruise below the skin. If you can bear weight on your leg there likely is not a fracture but if you are concerned a Xray would be necessary to evaluate for fracture.
responses.content_zh: 周围的黄色组织是皮下正在消退的瘀伤。如果您能够承重，可能没有骨折，但如果有疑虑，建议进行X光检查以评估是否有骨折。

query_title_en: Can my hand still be functional after surgery?
query_title_zh: 这手手术后还能要吗？
query_content_en: Can my hand still be functional after surgery?
query_content_zh: 这手手术后还能要吗？

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if the hand will be functional as it will depend on the extent of the injury on the hand structures, the surgery procedure and recovery process.
responses.content_zh: 手部功能是否恢复很难说，这取决于手部结构受损的程度、手术过程和恢复过程。

responses.content_en: I would recommend discussing this with your physician, it is difficult to say based on the image provided the level of depth and nerve damage from this injury. ￼
responses.content_zh: 我建议你和你的医生讨论这一点。根据提供的图像，很难判断这种损伤的深度、和神经损伤程度。

query_title_en: I got an infection after washing out a tatto. How should I treat the pus below the scar?
query_title_zh: 洗纹身后感染了。结痂下有脓该怎么处理！
query_content_en: I got an infection after washing out a tatto. How should I treat the pus below the scar?
query_content_zh: 洗纹身后感染了。结痂下有脓该怎么处理！

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital Urgent Care to consult a doctor if there is pus as it would need to be drained. There is also redness around the wound may indicate an infection.
responses.content_zh: 如果有脓液，我建议您去最近的医院急诊咨询医生，因为可能需要引流。伤口周围的发红也可能表明有感染。

responses.content_en: I would recommend soaking the area in warm soapy water to help with healing. There appears to be granulation tissue forming, this will likely heal in a few weeks.
responses.content_zh: 我建议将该部位浸泡在温肥皂水中，以帮助愈合。似乎有肉芽组织形成，这可能会在几周内愈合

query_title_en: Can I ask what is happening?
query_title_zh: 请问这是怎么回事
query_content_en: Can I ask what is happening?
query_content_zh: 请问这是怎么回事

responses.content_en: It appeas that you have bruising and bleeding underneath the skin. If this was not from an injury, I would recommend that you see your Primary Care doctor for further evaluation. Consult a doctor if you also have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 您的皮肤下似乎有瘀血和出血。如果这不是由于受伤引起的，我建议您去看您的初级保健医生进行进一步检查。如果您还出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Need additional clinical context to provide recommendations however based on the singular picture appears to be hematoma with some rupture of superficial capillary vessels.  To promote with healing, keep the affected extremity elevated, apply ice and gentle compression.
responses.content_zh: 从单一的图片来看，似乎有血肿和表面上的微丝血管断裂。需要更多临床医疗资料以提供建议。如想加速愈合，可将受影响的肢体抬高，敷冰并轻轻按压。

query_content_en: This morning, I hit my toenail on the edge of the bed. Will this color go away? (This is the new nail that grew after I had my toenail removed last year.)
query_content_zh: 今天早上脚趾盖提到床边上了，这个色会不会掉，（这是去年拔完脚趾盖新长的）

responses.content_en: The dicoloration is a bruise under the toenail. This discoloration will resolve as the nail grows out. Recommend Xray to evlauate for fracture
responses.content_zh: 指甲下的变色是瘀伤，随着指甲的生长，这种变色会逐渐消退。建议进行X光检查以评估是否有骨折。

query_title_en: Will my finger need amputation?
query_title_zh: 需要截指吗
query_content_en: Will my finger need amputation?
query_content_zh: 需要截指吗

responses.content_en: The tissue underneath looks like it is healing well but the black area may need to be removed. I would recommend that you see a General Surgery or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss further treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 下面的组织看起来愈合得很好，但黑色区域可能需要去除。我建议您看普通外科或整形外科专家，讨论进一步的治疗方案。

query_title_en: The tendon of my pinky finger is broken, can the stiches be removed now? It has been half months
query_title_zh: 手指尾的筋断了，现在可以拆线了吗？快半个月了。
query_content_en: The tendon of my pinky finger is broken, can the stiches be removed now? It has been half months
query_content_zh: 手指尾的筋断了，现在可以拆线了吗？快半个月了。

responses.content_en: The stitches can now be removed.
responses.content_zh: 现在可以拆缝线

query_title_en: Seeking help!
query_title_zh: 求助
query_content_en: After being pinched by a crayfish, a piece of my fingernail is missing.
query_content_zh: 被小龙虾夹过之后 指甲怎么少了一块

responses.content_en: No further intervention is needed at this time. The nail will slowly grow out over time but it may take up to 6 months.
responses.content_zh: 目前不需要进一步的介入。指甲会慢慢长出来，但可能需要长达6个月的时间。

responses.content_en: Can we warm soapy soak of the area three times a day but does not appear to violate the nailbed.  Nail will have to grow out.  No evidence of subungal hematoma.
responses.content_zh: 我们可以每天用温肥皂水浸泡患处三次，但看起来没有影响到指甲床。指甲需要自然长出，没有甲下血肿的迹象。

responses.content_en: This appears to be damage to your lunula or a portion of your fingernail with the crayfish bite. Based on this photo it is hard to say whether this has penetrated deeper into the skin but at this time it does not appear to be infected nor is there underlying bleeding. Please keep the area clean as this heals, which may take months.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是小龙虾咬伤后对你的甲半月或指甲的一部分造成的损伤。根据这张照片，很难说它是否已经深入皮肤，但此时它似乎没有感染，下面也没有出血。在愈合过程中，请保持该部位清洁，这可能需要几个月的时间。

query_title_en: Is it okay to remove the stitches like this? Waiting online, urgent
query_title_zh: 这样可以拆线了吗？  在线等  急
query_content_en: Is it okay to remove the stitches like this? Waiting online, urgent.
query_content_zh: 这样可以拆线了吗？ 在线等 急

responses.content_en: The stitches can be removed after 8-10 days. But I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for evaluation as the lower part of the wound appears red and could be a sign of an infection.
responses.content_zh: 缝线可以在8-10天后取出。但我建议您去最近的急救中心进行评估，因为伤口的下部似乎发红，可能是感染的征兆。

query_title_en: How deep and wide is this wound? Should I go to a big hospital for a check-up?
query_title_zh: 这伤口有多深，多宽啊，要去大医院检查吗
query_content_en: How deep and wide is this wound? Should I go to a big hospital?
query_content_zh: 这伤口有多深，多宽啊，要去大医院检查吗

responses.content_en: It appears to be 1 cm wide but is difficult to say how deep the wound is without examining it in person. Since it is on the finger and along the joint, it may be beneficial for you to have it evaluated at a Urgent Care or Emergency Room as it may need stitches.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来有1厘米宽，但在未亲自检查的情况下，很难确定深度。由于伤口位于手指关节处，建议您到急诊护理中心或急诊室接受评估，因为可能需要缝合。

query_title_en: A few days ago, I had a motorcycle accident, and the doctor said that a skin graft would cost more than RMB 20,000. Friends, do you think I need a skin graft? [picture]
query_title_zh: 摩托车摔伤了，医生说植皮要2万多，病友来看看需要植皮吗【图片
query_content_en: A few days ago, I had a motorcycle accident, and the doctor said that a skin graft would cost more than RMB 20,000. Friends, do you think I need a skin graft? [picture]
query_content_zh: 摩托车摔伤了，医生说植皮要2万多，病友来看看需要植皮吗【图片】【图片】

responses.content_en: A skin graft would allow for quicker healing, restore function and improve the appearance of the area but would not be mandatory. But the choice is ultimately up to you if the procedure is very costly.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤移植可以加速愈合，恢复功能并改善该区域的外观，但并非必需。最终的选择取决于您自己，尤其如果手术费用较高的情况下。

responses.content_en: Will likely require surgical revision to heal properly.  Given location, could lead to joint contracture and decreased rang of motion at leg.  Does not appear to be infected.
responses.content_zh: 可能需要外科修复才能愈合。由于伤口位置，可能会导致关节挛缩和腿部活动范围受限。目前没有感染迹象。

responses.content_en: The skin appears to be necrotic in nature (essentially the overlying skin is dead). A skin graft would help the likelihood of improvement as necrotic skin has a high likelihood of getting infected which could then cause a systemic infection. I also would recommend a skin graft to help with healing but it is up to you to decide based on the risks and benefits discussed by the surgeon.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤似乎已是坏死的（基本上覆盖的皮肤是死的）。皮肤移植将有助于情况的改善；因为坏死皮肤很大机会受到感染，从而导致全身感染。 我还建议进行皮肤移植以帮助愈合，但这取决于你和外科医生讨论的风险和效益来作决定。

query_title_en: Even though it's just a cut on my finger, I want to know if I need to remove this piece of flesh.
query_title_zh: 虽然是破了手指头，但我想问问我这块肉需不需要割掉
query_content_en: I slipped and grabbed onto the advertisement board, which cut my hand like this. I went to a clinic, and they said just to bandage it, but two days later, when I unwrapped it, I felt like I should have gotten stitches or had part of the skin debrided. What should I do now?
query_content_zh: 滑倒扶了下广告牌手就成这样了，先找个诊所看了下说包一下就好，两天后自己拆开看看，感觉当时就应该缝一下或者割掉，现在应该怎么处理呀

responses.content_en: Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行局部伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带包扎。

responses.content_en: At this stage of healing, it is too late for sutures.  The tissue will likely slowly heal over time as the granulation tissue and scab fall off.  This will likely take multiple weeks.
responses.content_zh: 在目前愈合的这个阶段，缝合修复已经太迟了。随着肉芽组织和结痂的脱落，组织可能会随着时间的推移慢慢愈合。这可能需要数星期才能完成。

query_title_en: My injury has been around for over a month, and even when it heals, it forms blisters. It’s leaking fluid and has a small pit.
query_title_zh: 我的这个伤已经一个多月了，长好了就是起泡。还冒水，还有个小坑
query_content_en: My injury has been around for over a month, and even when it heals, it forms blisters. It’s leaking fluid and has a small pit. Can anyone explain what's going on?
query_content_zh: 我的这个伤已经一个多月了，长好了就是起泡。还冒水，还有个小坑万能的吧友谁知道怎么回事，求解，

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage. The tissue in the wound bed is continuing to heal. It may take 8 weeks to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并涂抹干燥的绷带。伤口床的组织正在继续愈合。可能需要8周才能完全愈合。

query_title_en: Just a question, how long does it take for this scar to come off? It is about 3mm deep.
query_title_zh: 问一下，这个结痂得多久能掉，深度差不多3毫米
query_content_en: Just a question, how long does it take for this scar to come off? It is about 3mm deep.
query_content_zh: 问一下，这个结痂得多久能掉，深度差不多3毫米

responses.content_en: It can take up to 8 weeks for the scab to come off.
responses.content_zh: 结痂可能需要长达8周才能脱落。

responses.content_en: This will likely take weeks to possibly a month to heal completely. Currently, there is some granulation tissue forming. ￼
responses.content_zh: 这可能需要数周至一个月的时间才能完全愈合。目前，有一些肉芽组织正在形成。

query_content_en: Dear medical experts, I work in maintenance and wear gloves daily. Yesterday, I had a fight with my wife, and she scratched my hand.
query_content_zh: 各位医学大佬，我干维修的每天干活都带手套，就是那种线手套，昨天和媳妇吵架，她把我手抓破了。。。

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care by washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: I would recommend keeping the area clean and dry, this will likely heal on its own. If you do not feel safe at home, I would recommend being seen by a provider for further resources. If you are worried about underlying bony injury, I would also recommend being seen by a provider.
responses.content_zh: 我建议保持该区域清洁干燥，这可能会自行愈合。如果你不放心自已处理，我建议你去看医生，那里有更多资源。如果你担心表面下的骨骼损伤，我还建议你去看医生。

query_title_en: Friends, what should I do? Could you look at my toe nail which was bruised from kicking the ball.
query_title_zh: 万能的吧友，帮看看我脚指甲踢球淤血，要怎么处理
query_content_en: Friends, what should I do? Could you look at my toe nail which was bruised from kicking the ball.
query_content_zh: 万能的吧友，帮看看我脚指甲踢球淤血，要怎么处理

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation in ER for Xray to evaluate for fracture. The nail will take up to 6 months to grow back.
responses.content_zh: 建议在急诊室进行X光评估以排除骨折。指甲可能需要长达6个月才能重新生长。

query_content_en: I got a scrape wound from a shattered glass bottle. I went to the hospital and the doctor cleansed the wound. According to the doctor, both suture and no suture were an option, so I choose not to have the wound sutured. Can I ask everyone, how long does would like this will recover.
query_content_zh: 玻璃瓶碎了被划伤，去医院医生清理了一下伤口，说缝不缝都行，然后我就没缝，想问下大家，这样的伤口多长时间能好。

responses.content_en: If the wound is not sutured, it may take up to 6-8 weeks for full recovery.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口没有缝合，完全康复可能需要6至8周的时间。

responses.content_en: Would heal more quickly with sutures given tissue gapping.  Will take multiple weeks to granulate in without suture repair.  If wound is over 24 ould would not recommend suture repair.   Clean wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 由于组织裂开，缝合会加快愈合速度。如果不缝合，可能需要数周才能長出肉芽。如果伤口超过24小时，不建议缝合。每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。

responses.content_en: The bottom layer of the skin appears to be healing appropriately given the no sutures and does not appear infected at this time. It will take some time for the upper layers of the skin to heal, from weeks to months. If any redness of the skin develops around the area, I would see a physician in person.
responses.content_zh: 在没有缝合的情况下，皮肤的底层似乎在正常地愈合；现时似乎没有感染。皮肤上层愈合需要一些时间，从几周到几个月不等。如果该部位周围出现任何皮肤发红，我会亲自去看医生。

query_content_en: Kicked a rock with my big toe, it bled at the time. I trimmed some of the nail, but after a week, it's still leaking. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 脚拇指踢到石头了，当时流了血，现在剪掉一些指甲，一个星期了，怎么办各位，现在还流水

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Avoid soaking the toe for another week. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。避免在接下来的一周内泡脚。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to address this issue, you have had significant damage to your nail. ￼￼
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生来解决这个问题，你的指甲已经严重受损。

query_title_en: Is this serious? What should I do?
query_title_zh: 这个严重吗？怎么办？
query_content_en: Is this serious? What should I do?
query_content_zh: 这个严重吗？怎么办？

responses.content_en: Perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和清水清洁伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Got a scrape on my back, now it looks like this.
query_title_zh: 背上被蹭了一下，然后成这样了。
query_content_en: What medication can help it heal quickly?
query_content_zh: 用什么药好的快？

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying moisturizing ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹保湿药膏并用绷带包扎。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing with granulation tissue.  To minimize scarring, avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.
