Keep the area moisturized and covered.  After the wound has healed, to minimize scar formation, avoid UV exposure and use SPF containing lotions
responses.content_zh: 伤口显示有肉芽组织愈合的迹象。为减少瘢痕，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。保持局部湿润并覆盖伤口。在伤口愈合后，为减少瘢痕形成，避免紫外线照射，并使用含SPF的护肤品。

responses.content_en: I would recommend mildly cleaning the area with warm soapy water and dressing the area with bacitracin ointment and xeroform dressing.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水轻柔地清洁该区域；并用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料包扎。

query_title_en: Anyone have a trick?
query_title_zh: 谁有好办法
query_content_en: Anyone have a trick?
query_content_zh: 谁有好办法

responses.content_en: This is a full thickness injury of the lower leg that does not appear to be infected. There is healthy granulation tissue in the wound bed and may take two to four months before if is covered with skin. Continue applying a dry bandage daily to protect the wound. Seek evaluation if signs of infection: spreading redness or pus extruding from the wound.
responses.content_zh: 这是小腿的全层损伤，虽然没有感染迹象，但伤口床上有健康的肉芽组织，可能需要两到四个月才能被皮肤覆盖。每天继续使用干燥的绷带保护伤口。如果出现红肿扩散或有脓液渗出，请寻求评估。

query_title_en: Scratch wound from bike
query_title_zh: 骑车刮伤
query_content_en: This  scratch wound was from riding my electric bike. It has been on the calf for half month. Anyone know when will it heal? Looking at the condition now, how can I make it heal quickly?
query_content_zh: 骑电动车刮伤的，在小腿上有半个月了。请问什么时候能长好啊？ 现在这个样子怎么好的快。

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的急救中心进行进一步评估。

query_content_en: Can anyone help me? Fell off my electric scooter this afternoon, landed on my knee. The external injury isn’t serious but bending and walking hurt a lot. Besides an X-ray, how to tell if the knee bone is damaged?
query_content_zh: 万能的吧友能帮我看看吗？ 今天下午骑电动车摔到，膝盖着地 外伤没有太严重但是膝盖屈伸很痛，受力走路也很痛 除了拍片子如何简单判断膝盖的骨头有没有损伤呀?

responses.content_en: Unfortunately the only way to tell if the bone is injured is through an x-ray. I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital to have this performed if you are concerned about a fracture.
responses.content_zh: 不幸的是，唯一能够确定骨头是否受伤的方法是通过 X 光检查。如果您担心骨折，我建议您去最近的医院进行此检查。

responses.content_en: An x-ray is the best way for us to determine whether there is an underlying fracture or bony damage. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person.
responses.content_zh: 用X光检查是确定是否有表面下的骨折或骨骼损伤的最佳方法。我建议亲自去看医生。

query_title_en: Does the wound on the front of the shin heal especially slowly? I fell and hurt my right shin on July 21.
query_title_zh: 小腿胫前伤口是不是好起来特别慢啊？7月21日摔跤割裂了右小腿
query_content_en: Does the wound on the front of the shin heal especially slowly? I fell and cut my right shin on July 21. Got stitches removed 14 days after surgery, rested at home, then noticed necrosis, went back for debridement and VSD for a week. After a month of natural healing, there’s still a 0.5x0.5 cm granulation tissue. Now using hydrocolloid dressing. Any advice?
query_content_zh: 小腿胫前伤口是不是好起来特别慢啊？7月21日摔跤割裂了右小腿胫前肌肉。手术14天后拆线回家休息，一周不到发现伤口皮肤坏死，回院除黑痂清创➕VSD负压一周。然后就是自然长了一个月还剩0.5X0.5厘米黄豆大小肉芽不愈，现在在用水胶体敷料。病友们有经验传授吗？

responses.content_en: The wound is likely healing slow due to the severity of the injury and not from the location. Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily then cover with the dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口愈合缓慢可能是由于伤势的严重程度，而不是因为位置原因。请继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗患处，然后覆盖敷料。

responses.content_en: Chronic appearing wound after laceration with sutures.  No overt signs of secondary infection.  Likely delayed wound healing.  Would recommend continued follow-up with wound care including avoiding any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine and using wet-to-dry dressings or Xeroform/Adaptic changed daily.
responses.content_zh: 缝合后的伤口呈慢性状态，无明显继发感染迹象，但可能会出现延迟愈合。建议继续伤口护理随访，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂，并使用湿敷-干敷或Xeroform/Adaptic，每日更换。

responses.content_en: This area appears to be healing appropriately, with the appropriate timeline.  I would recommend dressing the area to prevent trauma or friction to the area to promote wound healing.
responses.content_zh: 这部位似乎以正常时间速度愈合中。我建议对该部位进行包扎，以防止对它造成创伤或摩擦，从而促进伤口愈合。

query_content_en: Injured my eye and got five stitches. It's been five days, and now there's a 2-3 cm hematoma. How long will it take to heal?
query_content_zh: 眼睛受伤，缝合5针，已经5天了，现在有个2-3cm的血肿，多久能好？

responses.content_en: Hematoma should resolve in 2-3 weeks
responses.content_zh: 血肿应在2-3周内消退。

responses.content_en: Hematomas take time to heal they can take multiple weeks to fully heal.  To speed up healing, you can apply ice to the affected area.  Bruising may settle further down the face.
responses.content_zh: 血肿需要时间才能愈合，可能需要数周才能完全愈合。如果想愈合快一些，可以冰敷受伤部位。瘀伤可能会在脸上进一步消退。

query_content_en: My finger got poked last month. The outside has healed, but there seems to be a scab inside that's still a bit deep. It hurts when I touch something. Should I pick off the outer skin to remove the scab?
query_content_zh: 手指上个月被戳了一下，然后外面好了里面好像结痂了，那个痂一直在手指里面，好像还有点深，我这个手指戳到东西的时候会疼一下，我要把外皮挑开把痂挑出来吗

responses.content_en: I would not recommend removing the outer skin on your own. It is most likely due to scar tissue forming underneath. The pain should improve over time.  Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 我不建议您自行去除表皮。这很可能是由于下面形成了疤痕组织。疼痛应会随着时间的推移有所改善。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Require more clinical context of the underlying injury.  If there is pain, there is concern for retained foreign body.  Based on the picture it appears fairly deep and would likely need imaging and additional evaluation to determine if there is a foreign body.
responses.content_zh: 需要有关受伤的更多临床医疗资料。如果有疼痛的话，很可能有外物残留在伤口内。从照片上看，伤口是相当深的；需要摄造影像和迸一步评估、以确定是否有外物残留。

query_title_en: The wound hasn't healed for several months. Can any experts please tell me the reason? It became swollen and started festering in July.
query_title_zh: 伤口几个月都没好，麻烦神医帮我看一下是什么原因，七月肿了个脓
query_content_en: The wound hasn't healed for months. Could any experts tell me the reason? It developed a pus-filled bump in July, which I scraped off with a knife. Due to my limited medical knowledge, I applied dermatitis cream and amoxicillin powder to the wound, but later realized these might have harmed the wound. [Pictures]
query_content_zh: 伤口几个月都没好，麻烦神医帮我看一下是什么原因，七月肿了个脓包，我用刀刮掉了，因为医学知识有限，我给伤口涂了皮炎平杀菌，还用过阿莫西林的药粉涂过，后来才知道这些对伤口损害很大。【图片】【图片】

responses.content_en: This may be a hypertrophic scar. I would recommend that you see a Dermatology specialist for further treatment.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是增生性疤痕。我建议您咨询皮肤科专家，进行进一步治疗。

query_title_en: How should this be treated?
query_title_zh: 这可怎么治疗好？？
query_content_en: How should this be treated?
query_content_zh: 这可怎么治疗好？？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Plastic Surgery or Podiatry specialist for further treatment that may involve reconstructive procedures such as a skin graft.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看整形外科或足科专家，进行可能涉及皮肤移植等重建手术的进一步治疗。

responses.content_en: Picture appears to be intraoperative or postoperative wound to the dorsum of the foot with significant soft tissue loss.  Unclear as to the etiology but concern for possible burn versus infection and debridement.  Will likely need extensive wound care including skin grafting.
responses.content_zh: 图片显示为手术中或是手术后足背伤口，软组织有明显损缺。病因尚不清楚，但可能是烧伤、或是受到感染和清创。需要进行广泛的伤口护理和皮肤移植。

query_title_en: Burn
query_title_zh: 烫伤，
query_content_en: Burn
query_content_zh: 烫伤，

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: There is no clinical question being asked.  Also difficult to tell what is the pre and post picture.  If the pre-picture is the area of large ulceration with exposed subcutaneous fat and wound granulation, the post picture appears to be healing quite well.  There is some puckering of the skin and scarring which is unavoidable given the extent of the soft tissue injury.  You may experience some degree of chronic pain and decreased range of motion secondary to skin tension and may require scar revision in the future.
responses.content_zh: 这里没有临床的医疗问题。亦很难判别那一张照片是受伤前、或是受伤后拍摄的。如果受伤前照片是显示了外露的皮下脂肪和伤口肉芽的大溃疡区域，受伤后照片似乎显示愈合得很好。考虑到软组织损伤的程度，不可避免地会出现皮肤起皱和疤痕。你可能会经历一定程度的慢性疼痛，和继发于皮肤张力的活动范围减小，未来可能需要疤痕修复。

query_title_en: The skin has been broken for a week and hasn't healed. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 皮破了一周了现在还没愈合 请问怎么办
query_content_en: The skin has been broken for a week and hasn't healed. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 皮破了一周了现在还没愈合 请问怎么办

responses.content_en: The abrasion is superficial with healthy tissue in the wound bed. No clear signs of infection. Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. If there is pus or spreading redness seek evaluation in urgent care. It may take 2 weeks to close completely.
responses.content_zh: 擦伤部位相当浅，伤口底部仍有健康组织。没有明显感染迹象。用肥皂水每曰清洗、并用干包扎物包好。如果有起脓或红肿现象便要到紧急护理诊所求诊。可能需要２星期伤囗才能完全愈合。

query_title_en: A tragedy from yesterday. I got ran over by a motorcycle. It hurted badly.
query_title_zh: 昨天悲剧了！被摩托车压到！痛彻心扉啊！
query_content_en: A tragedy from yesterday. I got ran over by a motorcycle. It hurted badly.
query_content_zh: 昨天悲剧了！被摩托车压到！痛彻心扉啊！

responses.content_en: Perform wound care by washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. You can go to the nearest Urgent Care if you would like to rule out a fracture given the type of trauma. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 进行伤口护理时，用肥皂和清水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果想排除骨折的可能，您可以前往最近的急诊诊所。若出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Got poked earlier, now it hurts whenever I pluck a string. Can it be treated?
query_title_zh: 之前戳了一下，现在一拨弦就疼，请问可以治么
query_content_en: Got poked earlier, now it hurts whenever I pluck a string. Can it be treated?
query_content_zh: 之前戳了一下，现在一拨弦就疼，请问可以治么

responses.content_en: You can take anti-inflammatory medicine to help with the pain. If you are able to do so, avoid activities that may use the fingertip. Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 您可以服用抗炎药物来缓解疼痛。如果可以的话，避免会使用指尖的活动。请继续进行局部伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Help, does this require the tetanus shot? I was too quick when chopping meat.
query_title_zh: 求解，这不用破伤风吧，切肉的时候着急了。。。
query_content_en: Help, does this require the tetanus shot? I was too quick when chopping meat.
query_content_zh: 求解，这不用破伤风吧，切肉的时候着急了。。。

responses.content_en: I would recommend a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the past 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 如果您在过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种一针。

query_title_en: The black dead skin on the wound is stuck to the wound with blood. Should it be removed?
query_title_zh: 伤口的黑色死皮被血液沾在伤口上了，需要弄开吗？
query_content_en: The black dead skin on the wound is stuck to the wound with blood. Should it be removed?
query_content_zh: 伤口的黑色死皮被血液沾在伤口上了，需要弄开吗？

responses.content_en: There is no need to remove the skin as it will come off on its own.
responses.content_zh: 没有必要去除皮肤，因为它会自行脱落。

query_content_en: Seeking help, my two-year-old got cut by glass and needed about ten stitches. The wound is uneven after removing the stitches. What long-term effects might this have? Any other methods? It's been a week already.
query_content_zh: 求助一下各位吧友，宝宝两岁了，被玻璃划了道口子，缝了十来针，拆线后伤口不平整，请问以后会造成什么影响不？有没有别的办法 已经一个礼拜了【图片】【图片】

responses.content_en: Scar remodeling can take six months. After this period a referral to plastic surgery for consultation may be appropriate if cosmesis is a concern.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕重塑可能需要六个月。在此期间，如果出现外貌方面的担忧，就可能需要转诊到整形外科进行咨询。

query_title_en: My hand was cut, and it's still swollen after almost two months. Any advice?
query_title_zh: 手被割到了，快两个月了怎么还是肿，求解
query_content_en: My hand was cut, and it's still swollen after almost two months. Any advice?
query_content_zh: 手被割到了，快两个月了怎么还是肿，求解

responses.content_en: The laceration is healed but there is still a healing hematoma under the skin that likely represents the swelling. The hematoma may take 2-3 months to completely resolve.
responses.content_zh: 裂伤已经愈合，但皮下仍有一个愈合中的血肿，可能是肿胀的原因。血肿可能需要2-3个月才能完全消退。

query_title_en: Should this wound be bandaged? Is the infection serious?
query_title_zh: 各位这伤口用包扎吗？感染严重吗？
query_content_en: Should this wound be bandaged? Is the infection serious?
query_content_zh: 各位这伤口用包扎吗？感染严重吗？

responses.content_en: This is an abrasion that does not appear to be infected. Apply a dry bandage daily to protect the wound. Seek evaluation if signs of infection: spreading redness or pus extruding from the wound.
responses.content_zh: 这是擦伤，看起来没有感染。每天应用干燥的绷带保护伤口。如果出现感染迹象，例如红肿扩散或有脓液渗出，请寻求评估。

query_title_en: Friends, can the wound like this heal on its own?
query_title_zh: 请问各位吧友，像我这种伤口能自己愈合么。
query_content_en: Friends, can the wound like this heal on its own?
query_content_zh: 请问各位吧友，像我这种伤口能自己愈合么。

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage. It may take 4-8 weeks to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并涂抹干燥的绷带。伤口可能需要4到8周完全愈合。

query_content_en: It's the fourth day since my injury. For the first three days, I had my bandage changed at the hospital. Today, I cleaned it myself at home, and the wound looks dry. However, the bandage is stuck to the wound. The physician said not to worry, as the bandage will come off automatically, but I'm unsure if this might cause any issues.
query_content_zh: 受伤第四天，前三天是在医院换的药，今天在家自己清洗了下，揭开上面的纱布好像伤口干了，但这层纱布粘住了，当时医生说这层纱布不用管让它以后自己掉，不知道有没有问题

responses.content_en: It is OK to remove the bandage. The wound is not infected. Recommend cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 可以把绷带除掉。伤口未受感染。建议用肥皂水每日清理伤囗、之後用干包扎物包好。

query_title_en: Hand injury
query_title_zh: 手破了
query_content_en: I got injured from falling off an electric scooter. Will it leave a scar?
query_content_zh: 骑电瓶车摔伤，会留疤吗

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar as this depends on how your body heals the wound.  Continue performing wound care by washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 很难确定是否会留下疤痕，这取决于您身体的伤口愈合情况。继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Is difficult to say based off the images provided, this may leave a scar if the wound is deep.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难说，如果伤口很深，这可能会留下疤痕。

query_title_en: This is the wound at day 14. The suture was removed yesterday. This is right above the knee. The bone was not injured. The depth is approximatly...
query_title_zh: 伤口的第14天。昨天拆的线。在膝盖上方。没伤到骨头。深度大概
query_content_en: This is the wound at day 14. The suture was removed yesterday. This is right above the knee. The bone was not injured. The depth is approximatly 2CM. Now I feel my leg is unable to bend, can I know what's happening?
query_content_zh: 伤口的第14天。昨天拆的线。在膝盖上方。没伤到骨头。深度大概2CM左右。现在感觉腿弯不了是怎么回事呀

responses.content_en: After initial healing, scars begin a process of thickening and contraction. Scar remodeling can take up to a year and will soften over time.
responses.content_zh: 在初步愈合后，疤痕会经历增厚和收缩的过程。疤痕重塑可能需要长达一年时间，并会随时间流逝逐渐软化。

query_title_en: This wound didn’t get stitches and injured a tendon, now it’s like this... what should I do? The tendon is exposed.
query_title_zh: 这个伤口没缝针，伤了筋，现在成这样了，怎么办。。。。筋在外面
query_content_en: This wound didn’t get stitches and injured a tendon. Now it’s like this... what should I do? The tendon is exposed.
query_content_zh: 这个伤口没缝针，伤了筋，现在成这样了，怎么办。。。。筋在外面。。

responses.content_en: If the tendon is exposed, I would recommend that you see a Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss reconstructive procedures such as a skin graft.
responses.content_zh: 如果肌腱暴露，我建议您咨询整形外科专家，讨论重建手术，如皮肤移植。

query_title_en: I chose cell seeding after scar from the incision
query_title_zh: 切缝留疤后选择了细胞种植！
query_content_en: I chose cell seeding after scar from the incision
query_content_zh: 切缝留疤后选择了细胞种植！

responses.content_en: The incision is healed. No wound care necessary
responses.content_zh: 切口已经愈合，不需要进一步的伤口护理。

query_title_en: Is this wound going to last a lifetime?
query_title_zh: 这种伤口是不是一辈子的事了
query_content_en: Is this wound going to last a lifetime?
query_content_zh: 这种伤口是不是一辈子的事了

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if there will be permanent scarring but it appears to be healing well at this time.
responses.content_zh: 很难确定是否会留下永久性疤痕，但目前看来愈合情况良好。

query_content_en: It's been a week. Does anyone know how long this wound takes to heal? The surrounding area is a bit stiff but not painful. The skin won’t peel off, right?
query_content_zh: 一个星期了，有没有哪个大佬知道这种伤口多久能好，皮不会掉吧，伤口周围有点僵硬，但是不痛

responses.content_en: It can take up to 8 weeks for healing. If the skin gets enough blood flow to it and survives, then it will not peel off.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要长达8周。如果皮肤得到足够的血液供应并存活下来，它就不会剥落。

responses.content_en: The margins of the wound are slowly coming together, the skin may peel off however that may be just the dead skin coming off and the underlying skin should be coming together. I would recommend reducing range of motion to your finger as it heals.
responses.content_zh: 伤口边缘慢慢愈合，皮肤可能会剥落，但这可能只是死皮脱落，下面的皮肤应该愈合。我建议在手指愈合时减少其活动范围。

query_title_en: It's been a month, should I go to the hospital for this injury?
query_title_zh: 请问我这伤要去医院看吗，一个月了
query_content_en: Should I go to the hospital for the wound? It has been a month.
query_content_zh: 请问我这伤要去医院看吗，一个月了

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. It may take up to a month for the skin to cover the wound. Clean daily with soap and water and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。皮肤可能需要长达一个月的时间覆盖伤口。每天用肥皂和水清洗，并使用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_content_en: I accidentally kicked and broke a glass that had mice, snakes, lizards, and rabbits crawling over it. Will this wound cause diseases like plague, tetanus, or rabies?
query_content_zh: 我不小心把玻璃踢碎了，那个玻璃有老鼠、蛇、蜥蜴、兔子爬过，这么样的伤口，请问会得鼠疫，破伤风，狂犬病等疾病吗

responses.content_en: It would be unlikely to you to get rabies or plague unless you were bit by the animal or insect itself. I would recommend a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the past 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 除非您被动物或昆虫本身咬伤，否则感染狂犬病或鼠疫的可能性很小。如果您在过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种。

responses.content_en: Unable to give full recommendation based on clinical contacts.  Unclear if this was wearing shoes or if this injury occurred while barefoot.  Does not have evidence of overt secondary infection however would recommend updating tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 无法基于当前临床信息提供完整的建议。不清楚在受伤时是否穿鞋。尽管无明显继发感染的迹象，但如果破伤风疫苗未更新，建议进行补接种。

responses.content_en: I would recommend receiving a tetanus vaccine if your tetanus is not up-to-date.  I would continue to monitor the area for infection as it continues to heal.
responses.content_zh: 如果你的破伤风疫苗已过期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。在伤口愈合期中，我会继续留意该部位的感染情况。

query_content_en: Friends, I need some advice. The morning before last, I hit my little toe on the bed frame and scraped off a layer of skin. How can I do for it to heal faster? I am a worker, and I go to work every day. My worker shoes are not breathable.
query_content_zh: 请问下大家，前天早上小脚趾撞床脚了，上面挂掉了一层皮，怎样处理好的快一点，本人工人一枚，每天上班，劳保鞋还不透气

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be partial avulsion of the toenail with underlying hematoma.  Does not appear to be injury to the nailbed/base of the nail.  Would recommend bulky dry gauze dressing, buddy taping to the adjacent toe, and hard sole shoe to avoid significant bending of the digit.  Toenail will likely have to regrow.  No evidence of secondary infection
responses.content_zh: 伤口表现为部分趾甲撕脱，并伴有血肿，但甲床或甲根未见受伤迹象。建议使用厚干纱布敷料、邻趾固定带、硬底鞋以避免脚趾过度弯曲。趾甲可能需要重新生长。目前无继发感染迹象。

responses.content_en: I would recommend getting different shoes if possible to allow for less friction/trauma to the area. There is a small hematoma to the area that should likely heal on its own with time.
responses.content_zh:
如果可能的话，我建议换掉鞋子，以减少对该区域的摩擦/创伤。
该部位有一个小血肿，过了一些时间，它很可能会自行愈合。

query_content_en: My hand is smashed. Now there is numbness at half of the middle finger and ring finger. The other half does not have numbness. Should I go check out at the hospital?
query_content_zh: 不懂就问，手掌被挤到，现在无名指和中指一半麻，一半不麻，需要去医院看一下吗

responses.content_en: If you have numbness, this may indicate a nerve injury. I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 如果您感到麻痹，那可能是神经损伤。我建议您去最近的医院进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: Got hit by a heavy object, bought disinfectant from the pharmacy but didn’t apply any medicine, worrying inflammation. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 被重物撞到，药店买了点消毒水，没有搽药，说是怕发炎，怎么办
query_content_en: Got hit by a heavy object, bought wound disinfectant from the pharmacy but didn’t apply any medicine, fearing inflammation. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 被重物撞到，药店买了点消毒水，没有搽药，说是怕发炎，怎么办

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation and possible imaging to rule out a fracture.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的急救中心进行进一步评估和有可能的影像检查，以排除骨折。

query_title_en: My finger suddenly turned black, don't know the reason
query_title_zh: 手指突然发黑，不知道啥原因
query_content_en: My finger suddenly turned black, don't know the reason.
query_content_zh: 手指突然发黑，不知道啥原因

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的急救中心进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: Is there a surgeon? Can someone help me figure out how to make this wound heal? Thank you.
query_title_zh: 有没有外科医生啊?帮我看看我这个要这么弄才能愈合?谢谢唉，好
query_content_en: Is there a surgeon? Can someone help me figure out how to make this wound heal? Thank you. It's really troublesome.
query_content_zh: 有没有外科医生啊? 帮我看看我这个要这么弄才能愈合?谢谢 唉，好麻烦

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the hospital for imaging to rule out a fracture and treatment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往医院进行影像检查以排除骨折并接受治疗。

responses.content_en: Unable to fully visualize the wound on the attached picture however there does appear to be a laceration to the finger pad.  Unclear if injury to the fingernail.  Unclear as to the mechanism of injury or timing of injury.  Need further information to provide any recommendation
responses.content_zh: 无法完全看清图片中的伤口，但指腹似乎有撕裂伤，不清楚是否涉及指甲损伤。目前也不明确受伤的机制或时间，需要多一些信息才能提供建议。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen in person by a provider to allow for further assessment of the finger. It is unclear if there has been a partial amputation of your finger or underlying fracture.
responses.content_zh: 我建议由医护人员亲自检查，以便对手指进行进一步评估。目前尚不清楚你的手指是否有部分截肢、或表面下的骨折。

query_title_en: My fingernail was ripped off. Should I trim it or leave it alone? If I leave it alone, it will bleed a lot, but if I trim it, I'm afraid the nail will grow into the flesh later.
query_title_zh: 指甲盖被掀开了，我要剪掉还是合上啊  合上的话血流一大堆剪掉
query_content_en: My fingernail was ripped off. Should I trim it or leave it alone? If I leave it alone, it will bleed a lot, but if I trim it, I'm afraid the nail will grow into the flesh later.
query_content_zh: 指甲盖被掀开了，我要剪掉还是合上啊 合上的话血流一大堆剪掉又怕以后指甲长肉里

responses.content_en: I would recommend consulting with a doctor in-person if you would like to have the nail trimmed. Otherwise you can leave the nail alone as it is unlikely for it to grow into the flesh.
responses.content_zh: 如果您想修剪指甲，我建议您亲自咨询医生。否则，您可以不管它，因为指甲不太可能长入肉中。

responses.content_en: Injury appears to be partial amputation of fingertip.  Nail base appears in tact.  You should let the fingernail grow out and monitor for signs of ingrown nail.  Would not recommend nail removal at this point as this could cause injury to the nail base and restrict further nail growth.  You should do local wound care, soaking the finger in warm soapy water 3 times daily for 10 to 15 minutes at a time and applying topical antibiotic ointment with a nonadherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是部分手指尖的截断，但指甲基部完好。建议让指甲自然生长，并观察是否有甲沟炎的迹象。目前不建议拔除指甲，以免损伤指甲基部并影响其生长。建议每天用温肥皂水浸泡手指3次，每次10至15分钟，并涂抹抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to have the nail removed as the nail has been partially removed, and it is unclear based on the image but it is possible that the finger has been partially amputated as well which would require further management. The area requires cleaning with warm soapy water.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生。因为指甲已经被部分切除，要把指甲除掉；根据图像尚不清楚，但手指也可能被部分截肢。这将需要进一步的治理。该区域需要用温肥皂水清洁。

query_title_en: Guys, how do I treat this? My finger got crushed by a hydraulic machine at work.
query_title_zh: 老哥们 这样个要怎么的治疗啊 在工厂上班备液压机压到手指了
query_content_en: Guys, how do I treat this? My finger got crushed by a hydraulic machine at work.
query_content_zh: 老哥们 这样个要怎么的治疗啊 在工厂上班备液压机压到手指了

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care to get imaging to rule out a fracture given the trauma. In the meantime, apply ice packs to the area.
responses.content_zh: 鉴于受伤情况，我建议您前往最近的急诊诊所进行影像检查以排除骨折的可能。与此同时，可以在患处使用冰袋冷敷。

responses.content_en: With any significant crush injury there should be imaging to evaluate for any underlying fracture.  Would need additional imaging to evaluate for any nailbed injury including subungual hematoma or damage to the nail base/bed.  If there is no violation of the skin, no need for suture repair however would monitor for significant swelling and bruising which will likely progress.
responses.content_zh: 如果经历过严重的挤压外伤，便需要摄像造影以确定伤口下面有没有骨折或断裂。亦需要额外造影以衡量指甲床的受伤情况，例如甲下血肿或甲床损伤。如果损伤还没有侵占到皮肤，便毋须用缝合修复。但是要留意有没有严重的肿胀和瘀伤，这些情况可能会慢慢出现的。

query_content_en: This happened a couple of days ago when my wife accidentally caused a long cut during a massage. It bled a lot, and I went to the hospital to get suture. I'm not sure if it can fully recover.
query_content_zh: 这是前两天，被老婆用按摩打了很长一条口子，当时留了很多血，也去医院缝了针，不知道这还能不能恢复？

responses.content_en: It should heal well but may take up to 8 weeks.
responses.content_zh: 它应该能愈合得很好，但可能需要长达8周的时间。

query_content_en: Is this infected? It’s been four days, and I see some pus in places. I removed the stitches myself. Is it okay to use a bandage now?
query_content_zh: 我这个感染了吗，四天我看有的地方有点浓我自己把线拆了，这个现在用创口贴拉上了可以吗，

responses.content_en: The laceration is not obviously infected but the stitches were likely removed prematurely. Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. If there is pus or spreading redness seek evaluation in urgent care.
responses.content_zh: 撕裂伤口没有明显感染，但缝线可能过早被拆除。用肥皂水每曰清洗、并用干包扎物包好。如果有起脓或红肿现象便要到紧急护理诊所求诊。

query_title_en: Is there pus forming? Do I need to peel off the scar
query_title_zh: 这个是化脓了吗需要揭痂吗？
query_content_en: Is there pus forming? Do I need to peel off the scar
query_content_zh: 这个是化脓了吗需要揭痂吗？

responses.content_en: The scab should be left in place. There is a small amount of natural fluid from the healing tissue under the scab. Clean daily with soap and water.
responses.content_zh: 结痂应留在原位。结痂里面有少量来自愈合组织的自然液体。请每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_title_en: My hand was cut by a knife.
query_title_zh: 手被刀划了
query_content_en: Cut my hand with a knife yesterday, skin peeled back exposing the flesh. Rinsed with water immediately. I faint at the sight of blood, so my husband applied a band-aid. Today I washed my face, brushed my teeth, and cooked without significant pain. I want to replace the band-aid. How long will it take to heal?
query_content_zh: 昨天手被刀划了，皮掀开能看见肉，第一时间用水冲洗。我本人晕血，让老公帮忙帖了创可贴今天正常洗漱做饭，无明显疼痛感，想换一片新的创可贴，手现在这样了，请问几天能好？

responses.content_en: It will likely take a few weeks to heal. Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要几周。请继续进行局部伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: It’s been half a month and I still can’t bend it. How serious is this wound, and how much will it scar?
query_title_zh: 半个月了不能弯曲，请问这个伤口属于什么水平，会留多少疤啊

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Hand Surgery or Occupational Therapy specialist as it may be due to muscle stiffness but cannot exclude a tendon injury. It is difficult to say if this will scar as it depends on how the body heals.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看手外科或职业治疗专家，这可能是由于肌肉僵硬造成的，但不能排除肌腱损伤。很难说这是否会留下疤痕，因为这取决于身体的愈合情况。

query_title_en: After suturing the wound on my finger, it got infected and necrotic. Can anyone tell me if there is any hope for recovery?
query_title_zh: 手指外伤缝合后出现感染和肉坏死成这样了，麻烦帮看下这样还有救
query_content_en: After suturing the wound on my finger, it got infected and necrotic. Can anyone tell me if there is any hope for recovery?
query_content_zh: 手指外伤缝合后出现感染和肉坏死成这样了，麻烦帮看下这样还有救吗

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Hand Surgery or Plastic Surgery specialist for further evaluation and possible debridement.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看手外科或整形外科专家进行进一步评估和可能的清创

query_title_en: Is there any hope for this severely damaged flesh?
query_title_zh: 肉烂成这样还有救吗
query_content_en: Is there any hope for this severely damaged flesh?
query_content_zh: 肉烂成这样还有救吗

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss scab removal and reconstructive procedures such as a skin graft.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去找整形专科医生来看一下像植皮那样的祛疤和重建手术

query_content_en: A few days ago, I accidentally crushed my finger with a machine while working. The wound has been healing for over ten days. The fingertip feels a bit numb, and only hurts when pressed hard. Will this wound fully recover?
query_content_zh: 前些天 干活的时候 手指头不小心 被机器压了一下！ 现在伤口长了十几天了！ 现在感觉指头尖 有点没知觉！ 稍用力捏这个指尖 才有疼痛感 ！ 我这个伤口是不是不能完全恢复了？【图片】【图片】

responses.content_en: This crush injury of the finger does not appear to be infected. Clean with soap and water. The nail may take 4-6 months to regrow. The numbness in the finger tip is likely due to trauma to the nerves in the finger tip. Sensation may return but will likely take months. Recommend Xray of the finger to assess for fracture.
responses.content_zh: 手指的挤压伤看起来没有感染。用肥皂和水清洗。指甲可能需要4到6个月才能重新长出。手指尖的麻木可能是由于指尖神经受到创伤。感觉可能会恢复，但可能需要几个月的时间。建议进行手指X光检查以评估是否有骨折。

query_title_en: There is redness at the scar. Is there any topical medication for relief? Can anyone give me a suggestion?
query_title_zh: 疤痕发红，擦什么药可以缓解？大神们支支招。

responses.content_en: You can try over the counter scar treatment gels and patches but I would recommend that you see a Dermatology specialist to discuss further treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 您可以尝试使用非处方的疤痕治疗凝胶和贴片，但我建议您咨询皮肤科专家，讨论进一步的治疗方案。

query_title_en: How long will the wound take to heal?
query_title_zh: 这种伤口多长时间长好

responses.content_en: It may take months to heal.
responses.content_zh: 愈合可能需要数月。

query_title_en: A question for everyone
query_title_zh: 问一下大家
query_content_en: A while ago, my toe had been smashed. This past few days, it no longer swell nor hurt anymore. I just found out the nails has became like this. Should I go to the hospital to remove the nail? Will there be any problem?
query_content_zh: 我前段时间脚趾头被砸了一下，这几天消肿了也不疼了，刚刚才发现指甲变成这样了，请问我要不要去医院拔掉啊？会不会有什么问题？

responses.content_en: There is no problem as long as there are no signs of infection - purulent drainage or spreading redness. The nail does not need to be removed at this time but may take 4-6 months to regrow.
responses.content_zh: 只要没有感染迹象（如脓性渗出或扩散的发红），就没有问题。指甲目前不需要移除，但可能需要4-6个月才能重新长出。

responses.content_en: Difficult to evaluate the wound/injury with the included picture.  Would recommend additional pictures to evaluate for nail base damage.  The current nail is likely nonviable and a new nail will have to grow out if there is not damage to the germinal matrix of the nail.  Would not recommend removal of the nail at this time unless pain is intolerable or there are concerns for infection.
responses.content_zh: 从图片上很难衡量伤口或受伤程度。建议再发多一些图片来衡量指甲床的损伤情况。看来现今的指甲己不可保全了。如果指甲层生发基质没有受损，新的指甲会长出来。除非不能抵受疼痛或有受感染的顾虑，不建议把指甲除掉。

query_title_en: Details of the injury, a reminder for guys!
query_title_zh: 受伤过程，提醒路人！
query_content_en: I injured myself while riding my bike. I quickly went to a nearby small hospital for an X-ray. No bones were damaged, but I needed 13 stitches and had the stitches removed after ten days. I was feeling good about healing myself and didn't want to spend a lot of money at a big hospital, but in the end, I went to a large hospital with my family for better care.
query_content_zh: 骑车碰伤赶紧去附近小医院拍片，没伤到骨头就缝针13针掉针十天，感觉个人能看好，没合疗少花钱犹豫不决太信任小医院。最后还是进大医院连带家人陪

responses.content_en: This laceration is healed but the skin around the wound has been disrupted by an underlying blood clot below the skin. There are no signs of infection. The skin will slough over time.
responses.content_zh: 该裂伤已经愈合，但伤口周围的皮肤因皮下血块而受到影响。没有感染迹象。皮肤会随着时间逐渐脱落。

query_title_en: How should I treat a scrape wound from rollerboarding so that I don't damage it further or leave a scar?
query_title_zh: 玩滑板擦伤摔伤如何处理才可以不二次伤害不留疤？
query_content_en: The last time I got a scrape wound, I first covered it with Yun Nan Bai Yao powder and erythromycin, then wrapped it with two layers of gauze. Unfortunately, the gauze adhere to the wound the second day, and when I removed the dressing, I ripped off the scar. I painted some betadine afterward, and did not use any more gauze. The outer side of the thigh was covered by my pants, so the wound drainage also smeared to the pants. I covered it with gauze at night to sleep, and then the gauze adhere to the wound again. I did not tear down the dressing until the scar fell off. What should I do to avoid this? #wound#
query_content_zh: 上次擦伤后先上了云南白药粉和红霉素，然后用两层纱布包了一下，结果第二天纱布就和伤口粘在一起了，然后撕下来本来伤口干了结痂了又撕坏了。后来涂了碘酒，没用纱布，因为在大腿外侧正好在裤子里，渗出液和一些东西就粘到了裤子上。晚上睡觉包了纱布，然后纱布就又粘上了，这次没撕，直到结痂掉 应该如何避免这种情况？#外伤#

responses.content_en: Clean wound daily with soap and water and apply a dry dressing. If the dressing sticks to the wound apply saline to loosen gauze before removal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并使用干燥敷料。如果敷料粘在伤口上，可使用生理盐水润湿纱布以便移除。

query_title_en: My wound is infected
query_title_zh: 伤口感染了
query_content_en: Picture one is taken right after the fall. The day after the fall, I painted erythromycin ointment at the scarring site, and the ointment might have caused the wound to close. The second image is taken on the fifth day. When I use a q tip to press on the wound, yellow pus will drain out from the wound. Realizing that this does not look right, I went to the hospital today and the doctor peeled off half of the scar and the other half will be peeled off tomorrow. It hurts, will it leave a scar after this is gets peel off? How many days does it take to heal?
query_content_zh: 图一是刚摔伤的图，摔伤后第二天在结痂的地方涂抹了红霉素软膏，好像就是涂抹红霉素软膏的原因导致伤口封闭了，图二是第五天的时候拍的，用棉签按压伤口会流出黄色脓液，意识到情况不对，今天去医院了医生把结的痂揭开了一半剩下的一半明天揭，挺疼的，这个揭开后会留疤吗？大约多少天能好？

responses.content_en: likely will leave a scar, will take up to 8 weeks to heal
responses.content_zh: 可能会留下疤痕，愈合可能需要长达8周的时间。

responses.content_en: Fairly large soft tissue injury with scab formation.  Would not recommend removing any further scab as this is part of the healing process.  Wound does not appear to be secondarily infected.  Would recommend local wound care with topical antibiotic ointment, nonadherent dressing such as Xeroform or Adaptic and changing the dressing daily.  During daily dressing changes, gently cleanse the wound with warm soapy water.  Avoid any drying agents including alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 有相当大的软组织受损和结痂。因为结痂是康复過程，不建议把馀下的痂组织清除。伤口似乎没有受到继发感染。建议在受伤部位进行护理，涂上外敷抗生素药膏、用Xeroform或Adaptic非粘附性包扎物。包扎物应每日更换。更換包扎物时用温和皂水轻洗伤口。避免使用例如二氧化氢、酒精、或是碘等干燥剂。

query_title_en: It's been a few days since the scab formed from the fall. It's been three days, and it's still bleeding and oozing pus.
query_title_zh: 摔伤了几天结痂，3天了现在还流血流脓
query_content_en: It’s been a few days since the scab formed from the fall. It's been three days, and it's still bleeding and oozing pus. When I woke up this morning, I saw blood and pus everywhere. I have a tendency to develop scars, and even minor injuries take much longer to heal than they do for most people. My wounds are slow to heal. #wound#
query_content_zh: 摔伤了几天结痂，3天了现在还流血流脓，早上起来看流的到处都是，我是疤痕体质，只要受一点外伤都比普通人好得慢很多，很多，伤口不爱愈合#外伤#

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further treatment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去最近的急诊诊所进行进一步治疗。

query_title_en: Does anyone had nail removal before.
query_title_zh: 兄弟萌有没有拔过指甲的
query_content_en: I was caught by bike spokes. There is a horizontal irregular crack at the left midde finger nail. I went to the hospital for a nail removal ad suture. The recovered wound looks like this. How long will it take for the nail to fully grow back?
query_content_zh: 我五月三十号被自行车辐条别了一下，左手中指指甲横向不规则裂开，去医院做了拔甲跟甲床缝合，现在恢复成这个样子，指甲还有多久才能走完全长好

responses.content_en: It can take up to 6 months for a nail to regrow.
responses.content_zh: 指甲可能需要长达6个月的时间重新生长。

query_title_en: My hand got scraped and it seems serious. What should I do?
query_title_zh: xdm手磕破了，感觉有点严重，应该怎么办啊(Ｔ▽Ｔ)
query_content_en: Yesterday, I broke some glass while opening a package in the stairwell, and it cut my hand. Now I can slightly move all my fingers except my index finger. It seems like there's still a piece of glass in my index finger because it hurts a lot when I move it. The cut near my pinky has bone exposed but doesn’t hurt as much as my index finger. This morning, I saw bleeding on the scabbed index finger, and there's a bump that makes me think there's still glass inside. What should I do? I thought it would heal in a few days, but now it seems serious. Should I go to the hospital? Please help! (The first picture was taken after washing the wound at home and wiping it with alcohol wipes. The second is three hours later, the third is nine hours later, and the fourth and fifth were taken this morning. #surgical wound#
query_content_zh:
昨天在楼道里拆快递，一用力把楼道玻璃弄碎了，玻璃扎了一手。
现在出食指外的4个指头都可稍微活动，好像食指内还有一块玻璃，一动就特别疼。小指下的伤口可以见骨了，也没食指那的疼。早上起来看到结痂后的食指还淌血，还有一块凸起，个人感觉应该还有一块玻璃。
这会我应该怎么办啊(´-ωก`），本来感觉过几天就好了，但好像又很严重，用不用去医院什么的。
急求万能的吧友解答
（图一是回家水洗之后用酒精棉擦完后拍的，图二是过了3个小时，图三是9小时之后的，图四和图五是今天早上拍的食指）#外伤#

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation if you are concerned that there is glass inside the wound.
responses.content_zh: 如果你担心伤口内有玻璃，我建议你去最近的医院进行进一步检查。

responses.content_en: Multiple lacerations with some appearing to need stiches if wound is less than 24 hours old.  If there is concern for glass, needs medical evaluation for imaging and washout.  Tetanus should be updated if not up to date
responses.content_zh: 有多处撕裂伤，有些如果在24小时内可能需要缝合。如果怀疑有玻璃碎片，需接受医学评估以进行影像检查和冲洗。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。

responses.content_en: Given the inability to move your index finger and the possibility of bone exposure and glass being present in your finger, I would strongly recommend you go to the hospital to receive further imaging of your hand to prevent an infection or further injury of your hand.
responses.content_zh: 鉴於你的食指无法移动、手指中可能有骨骼外露和玻璃，我强烈建议你去医院接受进一步的手部造像，以防止感染或手部进一步受伤。

query_title_en: I fell, and sprayed iodine to the wound.
query_title_zh: 摔了一跤，伤口目前喷了碘伏。
query_content_en: Is there anything else I should do?
query_content_zh: 是否还要其他处理呢

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Avoid soaking the toe for another week. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。避免在接下来的一周内泡脚。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Would recommend thorough wound cleaning with warm soapy water as well as local wound care with application of topical antibiotic ointment, nonadherent dressing changed daily.  Would additionally recommend updating tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Avoid putting any drying agents on the wound such as hydrogen peroxide, alcohol, or iodine.  Minimize scar formation, avoid UV exposure.
responses.content_zh: 建议用温和的肥皂水彻底清洗伤口，和伤口部位的护理。涂上外敷用的抗生素药膏，用非粘附性的包扎物包好；每日更换包扎。另外，如果破伤风注射己過期，亦要重新注射疫苗。避免在伤口使用酒精、二氧化氢、或碘等干燥剂。减少形成疤痕，避免暴露在紫外线中。

query_title_en: My toe got hit by the door.
query_title_zh: 脚趾被门撞到了
query_content_en: My toe got hit by a door. Should I cut off the skin that has fallen off?
query_content_zh: 脚趾被门撞到，这层肉掉了要剪掉吗

responses.content_en: You could trim the skin with a sterilized scissor but you could also leave the skin on and it will slough off by itself.
responses.content_zh: 你可以用消毒剪刀修剪皮肤，但你也可以不处理，皮肤会自行脱落。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided, I would recommend being seen in person by a physician to determine underlying damage to the area.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难确定。我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定该部位表面下的损伤。

query_content_en: I got scraped by a rusty iron bar, then washed it with alkaline soap, squeezed out some blood, and disinfected it with iodine. Do I still need to get a tetanus shot?
query_content_zh: 被一个生锈的铁棒刮了一下，然后用碱皂洗了一下，挤了一下血，又拿碘酒消毒了，还需要打破伤风疫苗吗？

responses.content_en: Yes, you need a tetanus vaccine if you have not received one in the past 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 是的，如果您在过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，您需要接种。

responses.content_en: Regarding the clinical question, if your tetanus shot is not up-to-date tetanus should be updated.  No overt evidence of secondary infection at this time.  Would recommend local wound care including topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.  Avoid using any alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine to open skin.
responses.content_zh: 如果破伤风注射己過期，便要重新注射疫苗。现时没有明显的继发感染。建议在伤口部位进行护理，涂上外敷抗生素药膏和用非粘附性包扎物包好。避免使用酒精、二氧化氢或碘等干燥剂。

query_content_en: I scraped and injured my foot while riding an electric bike. It's been 21 days, and the scab looks like this. I'm currently using iodophor and erythromycin ointment, but the scab hasn't come off yet. The doctor said it will heal slowly, but the exact time is uncertain. Does anyone have any good suggestions for a faster recovery?
query_content_zh: 骑电动车脚擦伤摔伤了，结痂21天成这样。目前是碘伏加红霉素软膏，还没脱痂。医生说慢慢恢复，具体时间不确定。各位友友们，有什么好的建议吗？能快速恢复的

responses.content_en: I would recommend stopping the iodoform and ointment as it would be best to allow the scab to dry out.
responses.content_zh: 我建议停止使用碘仿和软膏，最好让结痂自然干燥。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be fairly large with granulation tissue, scabbing and scarring present.  Will need extended period of time for healing.  Would recommend local wound care including gentle cleaning with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily, avoiding any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine, and using topical emollients, moisturizing agents, or topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  You may change the dressing daily.  Gentle range of motion exercises will help prevent contractures of the skin.
responses.content_zh: 伤口较大，伴有肉芽组织、结痂和疤痕，需要较长时间愈合。建议局部伤口护理，包括每天1至3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂，并使用局部润肤剂、保湿剂或局部抗生素软膏，搭配无粘连敷料。你可每日更换敷料。轻柔的关节活动有助于防止皮肤挛缩。

responses.content_en: I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water to help improve the drainage from the wound. I would also recommend continuing to apply the erythromycin ointment and applying a xeroform dressing to the wound. Given the depth of injury, this will likely take some time to heal.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水浸泡伤口，以帮助改善伤口的引流。我还建议继续使用红霉素软膏，并在伤口上涂抹XEROFORM包扎料。由於伤口颇深，这可能需要一些时间才能痊愈。

query_title_en: The scar on my arm fell off after being soaked in water. Inside the wound, there are yellow and white spottings. The spotting whitens and became larger after being soaked in water
query_title_zh: 手臂结痂泡水脱落  里面伤口有白黄色的点  泡水后变白变大

responses.content_en: Those are likely normal tissue that is still undergoing healing. There is no sign of infection at this time.
responses.content_zh: 这些可能是仍在愈合的正常组织。目前没有感染的迹象。

query_title_en: Seeking help from any experts! My ankle wound has healed, but it turned black.
query_title_zh: 请问一下专业的人士，我脚踝的这个伤口愈合了，但是颜色黑黑的
query_content_en: Could there be bruising inside, and what should I do it?
query_content_zh: 请问一下里面是否有淤血呢，需要怎么处理。

responses.content_en: Laceration has healed and surrounding skin appears viable. Darkening of skin likely resolving bruising from the time of trauma.
responses.content_zh: 撕裂部位已愈合、旁边的皮肤似乎亦已存活。皮肿变黑可能是受創时的瘀伤正在愈合所导致。

query_title_en: Seeking for the advice! What should I do with this wound?
query_title_zh: 请问一下，我这个伤口应该怎么办
query_content_en: It's been almost a month, and it's still not healing. It seems to worsen whenever I take a bath, but I don't want to stop bathing. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 前前后后小一个月了怎么都不好，感觉一洗澡就有问题，我又不想不洗澡，请问我应该作何处理呢？

responses.content_en: If it worsens after it gets wet, you can place dry gauze on it and wrap it with Tegaderm or saram wrap to keep it dry while showering. It can take up to 8 weeks for healing.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口在沾湿后恶化，你可以在上面放干纱布，并用Tegaderm或保鲜膜包裹，以保持干燥，方便淋浴。愈合可能需要长达8周。

responses.content_en: This area appropriately for granulation tissue. This may take some time to heal. You can soften the area with warm water. Do not scrub this aggressively.
responses.content_zh: 这个区域适合肉芽组织生长。这可能需要一些时间才能痊愈。你可以用温水软化这个部位。不要用力擦洗。

query_title_en: Finger pad separated from the flesh.
query_title_zh: 手指肚和肉分离
query_content_en: Got cut about 1cm deep by a knife along the nail bed, you can see the inside flesh. Should I cover it to let it heal or will new flesh grow? There was a lot of bleeding, and I stopped it with ash. Now it's covered with a band-aid. Will it heal?
query_content_zh: 被刀从指甲缝划开往里切了大概1cm，可以揭开看到里边的肉，贴上去能长好吗？还是重新长一块肉，当时从指甲缝流了好多血止不住就拿灰敷了，现在贴着创可贴，我想知道能长住吗

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear infected and the tissue of the fingertip appears viable. Clean ash off with soap and water and dress with dry dressing daily.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎未受感染，指尖上的组织似乎可以存活。用肥皂水把灰屑清理、之後用干包扎物每曰包扎好。

query_title_en: I fell off my bike and went to the campus clinic four or five times, but it still hasn't healed.
query_title_zh: 骑车摔伤了，去了校医院四五次还没好
query_content_en: My left leg seems to be infected. The doctor removed the scab. My right leg has a thick layer, but it's not entirely a scab. How long will this take to heal?
query_content_zh: 左腿应该是感染了，医生帮忙把结痂处去掉了。右腿不知道为什么有厚厚的一层，但不完全是结痂。这个要多久才能好呀？

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. Clean with soap and water daily and apply a dry dressing. It may take 2-4 months for the skin to completely cover the wound.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。请每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥的绷带覆盖。皮肤可能需要2到4个月才能完全覆盖伤口。

query_title_en: Feeling a bit anxious.
query_title_zh: 有点焦虑了
query_content_en: Two days ago, a piece of flesh was scratched off by something unknown. I only noticed when my hand got sticky after a long time. I wiped it with alcohol at that time, then applied iodophor and a band-aid the next day. I have to use a band-aid because of work, but the wound still has a layer of fluid. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 前天不知道被啥刮掉块肉，过了很久手黏了才发现，当时用酒精擦了下，第二天擦碘伏上邦迪了，这个位置我不得不用邦迪，不然影响工作，伤口一直这样，有层液体一样。请问该怎么办？

responses.content_en: The fluid is likely normal from the healing process. Continue local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 液体可能是因为愈合过程而正常。请继续进行局部伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、局部温热、红肿、出血或脓性排出，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Got it from a bicycle collision.
query_title_zh: 骑自行车互撞的
query_content_en: Company clinic used saline and alcohol for disinfection, then applied a band-aid. Six hours later, I checked, and the wound was deep. Will it scar? Should I see a doctor tomorrow? How to handle it?
query_content_zh: 公司医务室生理盐水酒精消毒后用了个创可贴，6个小时左右我打开是这样的，伤口比较深，会留疤吗，明天需要去医院看看嘛，怎么处理

responses.content_en: If the wound is still bleeding, I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation and possible stitches. In the meantime, continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口仍在出血，我建议您前往最近的急诊中心进一步评估，并可能需要缝合。同时继续进行伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Unable to evaluate from the attached images if there is a laceration that would require suture repair.  If there is significant gapping of tissue or the wound is deep, would likely heal better with a suture repair.  Additionally, as it is on the extensor surface needs thorough evaluation to evaluate for any underlying extensor tendon injury.  Additional questions as to the mechanism of injury are needed to understand if there is any underlying fracture.  Would recommend medical follow-up based on the information provided.
responses.content_zh: 从附上的图片上不能衡量有关撕裂部位是否需要缝合修复。如果组织裂缝是相当大的话, 缝合修复会令康复较快。还有的是：伤口是在伸肌表面上，须要彻底的衡量伸肌腱有否受损。更要探讨受伤的机制，以了解有没有表面下的撕裂。建议利用己有的资料进行医学跟进。

query_content_en: No bump or hit, but a mysterious wound appeared and is bleeding a bit. Can anyone help figure out what’s going on?
query_content_zh: 也没碰着撞着，莫名出现的伤口，有点流血。 有人帮忙看看是什么情况吗？

responses.content_en: It may be due to insect bites or dry skin leading to cracks and bleeding. If you are concerned, I would recommend that you see your Primary Care doctor for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由于蚊虫叮咬或皮肤干燥导致的裂口和出血。如果您感到担忧，我建议您去看您的家庭医生进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: The stitches was removed at two occasions in the past 21 day. Will it reopen? Will it leave a large scar?
query_title_zh: 21天分两次拆线，这个还会不会裂开，会留下很大的疤痕吗？
query_content_en: The stitches was removed at two occasions in the past 21 day. Will it reopen? Will it leave a large scar?
query_content_zh: 21天分两次拆线，这个还会不会裂开，会留下很大的疤痕吗？

responses.content_en: The wound should hopefuly not reopen if the stitches were removed after the recommended time frame. It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar as it depends on how your body heals.
responses.content_zh: 如果缝线在建议的时间拆除，伤口应该不会重新裂开。是否会留下疤痕取决于您的身体愈合情况，难以确定。

responses.content_en: Large soft tissue wound status post suture repair with bruising noted around the repair site to the skin flap.  In regards to the question as to will it reopen and will leave a scar, there does not appear to be significant evidence of wound dehiscence however depending on the viability of the skin flap, how deep the wound was, and your underlying medical issues, this may result in delayed healing/poor healing with scar formation.  Given the extent of the wound there will be scar formation present.  Wound will likely need long-term wound care follow-up.
responses.content_zh: 大面积软组织伤口在缝合修复后，修复部位及皮瓣周围可见瘀伤。关于是否会重新裂开及是否会留下瘢痕的问题，目前没有明显的伤口裂开的迹象。然而，这取决于皮瓣的存活情况、伤口的深度以及你的基础健康状况，可能会导致愈合延迟或不良愈合，并有瘢痕形成。鉴于伤口的严重程度，预计会出现瘢痕。伤口可能需要长期的伤口护理随访。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to have healed well and has come together appropriately. I would avoid trauma to the area and friction to promote wound healing. It will likely leave a scar however I would reduce sun exposure to the area and apply sunscreen to reduce likelihood of scarring.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已长回、似乎愈合得很好。我会避免对该部位造成创伤和摩擦，以促进伤口愈合。它可能会留下疤痕，但我会减少该部位的阳光照射，并涂抹防晒霜以减少结疤。

query_title_en: I scraped myself when I fell while sprinting 50 meters during a fitness test.
query_title_zh: 体测50米短跑摔跤擦伤了
query_content_en: Could any experts take a look if my wound is an infection? The school nursing room was very expensive. They charged me RMB 36 for a basic care yesterday.
query_content_zh: 大佬帮忙看看是不是感染了 学校医务室太坑了，昨天简单消毒就收了我36块钱

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing well with granulation tissue.  No evidence of secondary infection.  Would recommend continued local wound care including topical antibiotic ointment and covered with a nonadherent dressing.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine. Monitor for signs of infection such as increased swelling, redness, drainage, or any systemic signs of infection such as fever and chills.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎生长了肉芽组织、愈合良好。没有继发感染的迹象。建议持续伤口护理，包括涂用抗生素药膏和非粘附性包扎物。避免使用酒精、二氧化氢和碘等干燥剂。留意感染迹象，如肿胀加剧、发红、排液，或任何全身感染迹象，如发热和发冷。

query_title_en: Friends, help me determine if this wound is from a four-year-old's bite.
query_title_zh: 吧友们，帮忙看看这种伤口是不是一个四岁孩子咬的

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say how you sustained the wound but it does not appear to be infected. Continue cleaning with soap and water daily and apply dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 很难说伤口是怎么造成的的，但它似乎没有感染。请继续每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥的绷带敷上。

query_title_en: Will this nail still grow?
query_title_zh: 这指甲还能长吗
query_content_en: Got hit, there was a bruise, cleaned it up with scissors and nails after it dried.
query_content_zh: 砸到了 有淤血 干了后剪刀指甲扣干净了

responses.content_en: If the nailbed was not damaged, the nail should grow back but it may take 6 months.
responses.content_zh: 如果指甲床没有受损，指甲应该会重新长出，但这可能需要6个月。

query_title_en: My fingernail was removed by a doctor after being pinched by a V-belt. It's been almost a month. Will it heal?
query_title_zh: 电机三角带挤的，指甲被医生拔掉了，快一个月了，还能好吗
query_content_en: My fingernail was removed by a doctor after being pinched by a V-belt. It's been almost a month. Will it heal?
query_content_zh: 三角带挤的，指甲被医生拔掉了，快一个月了，还能好吗

responses.content_en: It can take up to 6 months for a nail to regrow.
responses.content_zh: 指甲可能需要6个月後才会重新生长。

responses.content_en: Significant injury to the distal phalange of the third finger.  Concerns that there are development of dry gangrene versus infection with significant eschar.  Would recommend medical evaluation
responses.content_zh: 第三指末节的伤情严重，有干性坏疽或感染并伴有大量焦痂的担忧。建议接受医学评估。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person as there is concern for necrosis at the tip of your finger.  You may need further debridement and management in person.
responses.content_zh: 顾虑到指尖可能坏死，我建议你亲自去看医生。你可能需要进一步伤口清创和亲身接受治理。

query_title_en: I fell off the bike last night in the rain.
query_title_zh: 昨天晚上下雨天骑电瓶摔了
query_content_en: I just removed a small black speck of dirt, but there's still some smaller bits inside. How should I do? Can I let it get wet in the shower? It doesn't seem very deep.
query_content_zh: 刚刚拿把一点黑色的小小个的脏东西搞了出来，现在里面还有点更小的，怎么处理，洗澡可以碰水吗，好像伤的不是很深

responses.content_en: You can allow soap and water to run over the area when showering or washing hands and gently try to remove the dirt. Then apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 你可以在淋浴或洗手时让肥皂和水流过伤口区域，轻轻尝试去除污垢。然后涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带包扎。

query_title_en: Sigh, bad luck.
query_title_zh: 唉，倒霉
query_content_en: Does this need medical attention? Any experts know?
query_content_zh: 这个需要就医吗？哪位大神知道？

responses.content_en: If you are having pain and it has been less than 24 hours, you can go to the nearest Urgent Care for evaluation and possible drainage. Otherwise you can take anti-inflammatory medicine to help with the pain
responses.content_zh: 如果您感到疼痛且距离受伤时间不到24小时，建议去最近的急诊中心评估并可能进行引流。或是您可以服用消炎药来缓解疼痛。

responses.content_en: Appears to be fairly large subungual hematoma to first toe.  Unable to visualize underneath the bandage if there is any laceration present.  Would recommend trephination of the toenail if pain is not tolerable.  Given the amount of hematoma underneath the toenail, the toenail may eventually fall off but will likely regrow.
responses.content_zh: 大脚趾下有较大的指甲下血肿。由于敷料覆盖，无法观察是否存在撕裂伤。如果疼痛难以忍受，建议进行指甲穿刺术。鉴于指甲下血肿的程度，指甲可能会脱落，但通常会重新生长。

responses.content_en: There appears to be a hematoma developing underneath your nail. Hernia will need to be removed by A provider, to prevent further swelling. I would also recommend removing that Band-Aid as it may be obstructing blood flow from your nail.
responses.content_zh: 你的指甲下面似乎有血肿。血肿需要护理人员者切除，以防止进一步肿胀。我还建议除掉创可贴，因为它可能会阻碍指甲的血液流动。

query_title_en: I had a fall in November last year.
query_title_zh: 我上一年十一月份的时候摔伤
query_content_en: Other injuries healed in a month, but my index finger's second joint is still swollen. An X-ray showed nothing serious, and the doctor prescribed medication. The main issue now is it can't bend like the other fingers, hurts when twisting a bottle cap, and feels better after massaging. Should I see a traditional Chinese bone injury specialist?
query_content_zh: 其他伤一个月就好了，但是食指第二个关节肿起来到现在还没完全好，拍了x光，医生说没什么事的就开了药给我。现在主要症状是不能像其他手指那样弯曲，拧瓶盖会疼，在揉过之后会减轻，需要去看跌打吗

responses.content_en: You may have injured a tendon or ligament at the time of the injury, leading to scarring that may be limiting your finger mobility. I would recommend that you see a Hand Orthopedic specialist and/or Occupational Therapy for further evaluation. You are welcome to see a traditional Chinese bone injury specialist as well if you would like.
responses.content_zh: 你在受伤时可能伤到了肌腱或韧带，导致疤痕形成，这可能限制了你的手指活动。我建议你去看手部骨科专家或作业治疗师进行进一步检查。如果你愿意，也可以去看传统的中医骨伤专家。

query_title_en: It's been 2 months since I scabbed over a compression injury on the inside of my lower leg, and now the skin around the wound is damaged and bleeding. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 小腿内侧挤压伤去痂已经2个月了，现在伤口周围皮肤破损出血什么
query_content_en: The inner side of my lower leg got crushed, and it's been two months since the scab came off. Now, the skin around the wound is broken and bleeding. What's causing this? When I apply iodine, it stings, and it also stings during normal times. The middle of the wound doesn't hurt, though.
query_content_zh: 小腿内侧挤压伤去痂已经2个月了，现在伤口周围皮肤破损出血什么原因呢，破损出血的地方涂碘伏时会蛰疼平常也会蛰疼，中间伤口到不疼

responses.content_en: This is likely due to new blood vessel growth along the area. Avoid trauma such as scratching the area during the healing process and keep it clean, dry and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由于该区域的新血管生长所致。在愈合过程中避免创伤，如抓挠该区域，并保持清洁、干燥，并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: Injury from falling off a bicycle
query_title_zh: 骑自行车摔伤
query_content_en: Fell off my bike, just applied hydrogen peroxide. Bro, how should I handle this?
query_content_zh: 骑车摔伤，刚上了双氧水。老哥嗯嘛怎么解决啊

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: Anyone know?
query_title_zh: 有人知道吗
query_content_en: This is already on day five. How does this look right now. Do I need other medication to washout or apply to the wound?
query_content_zh: 已经是第五天了，现在这个样子是什么意思，还要用什么药来清洗或者敷着吗

responses.content_en: It appears to be healing and there is no sign of an infection. Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正在愈合，没有感染的迹象。继续进行伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Need more context to know if this is a diabetic wound, pressure wound, or do to vascular insufficiency.  Appears to be a pressure ulcer with delayed healing.  Avoid alcohol, hydrogen peroxide and should do wet to dry dressing changes with topical antibiotic ointment. Likely needs podiatry follow up
responses.content_zh: 需要更多信息来判断是糖尿病伤口、压疮，还是血管功能不全所致。看起来像是愈合延迟的压疮。避免使用酒精和过氧化氢，应使用湿敷-干敷法进行换药，并涂抹抗生素软膏。建议后续进行足科随访。

responses.content_en: The bottom layer of the skin appears to be healing appropriately and does not appear infected at this time. It will take some time for the upper layers of the skin to heal. If any redness of the skin develops around the area, I would see a physician in person. At this time, you do not need to wash it out as it is attempting to heal.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤底层似乎在正常愈合，此时似乎没有感染。皮肤上层需要一些时间才能愈合。如果该部位周围出现任何皮肤发红，我会亲自去看医生。现时伤口正在愈合中，你不需要把它洗掉。

query_title_en: Can anyone with experience help to see if this condition needs skin flap surgery
query_title_zh: 有经验的朋友帮忙看看这种情况是否需要皮瓣手术
query_content_en: The othropedic clinic doctor recommend to have it recover itselves slowly. Another doctor recommend the skin flap surgery. When the suture was removed,  there was some signs of dry crusting. There was a second infection after the suture removal, and the treatment took another half month. After the crusting dry skin was peeled off, the fingertip skin looks very thin. Then it looks very pink the second day.
query_content_zh: 门诊骨科医生说让自己慢慢恢复，有一个医生却说需要皮瓣手术才行。拆线时就已经有了干枯迹象，拆线后二次感染又有半个月左右的敞开治疗，撕掉干枯皮壳后指尖肉很薄，第二天就已经非常粉嫩。

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Plastic Surgery specialist to get another opinion regarding the skin flap.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您咨询整形外科专家，获取关于皮瓣的第二意见。

query_title_en: Fell off my bike yesterday.
query_title_zh: 昨天骑车摔的
query_content_en: Can I take a shower today with this condition?
query_content_zh: 这个情，今天能洗澡吗？

responses.content_en: You can take a shower and allow soap and water to run over the area. Then apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 你可以淋浴，让肥皂和水流过伤口区域。然后涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带包扎。

query_content_en: In March last year, my right big toenail was smashed off completely, and the muscle at the end of the toe detached with a slight bone fracture. Now, a year later, it's mostly healed, but the toenail looks like this, which confuses me. Why is part of the nail yellow? The muscle has reattached and healed.
query_content_zh: 去年3月份右脚大拇指指甲被砸伤，指甲完全脱落，指甲末端肌肉脱离，末梢轻微骨裂。现在一年了，基本恢复了，但是指甲长成这个样子，我就糊涂了。请问，半截发黄的指甲是什么情况？就是那部分肌肉脱离的，已经缝合愈合了。

responses.content_en: The yellowing of the nail may be due to trauma or a fungal infection. You can see your Primary Care physician for further evaluation and obtain treatment if it is due to a fungal infection.
responses.content_zh: 指甲发黄可能是由于创伤或真菌感染所致。您可以去看您的初级保健医生，接受进一步评估，若确认为真菌感染时就接受治疗。

responses.content_en: Given the report of the injury, there would likely be prolonged period of healing for continued nail regrowth.  If the nail is excessively thick or yellow, there may be a secondary fungal toenail infection that will require an extended period of treatment.
responses.content_zh: 根据受伤报告，指甲的重新生长可能需要较长时间。如果指甲过厚或发黄，可能存在继发性真菌感染，造成治疗时间延长。

responses.content_en: The tip of the nail may have been damaged in the trauma, although the deeper part of the nail may have healed, this will take some time to fully recover.There is also the possibility that the tip of the nail is infected with a fungal infection.  I would recommend buying a topical antifungal ointment to help manage this infection.
responses.content_zh: 指甲的较深部分可能已经愈合，但指甲尖可能在创伤中受损。这需要一些时间才能完全恢复。指甲尖也有可能感染到真菌。我建议购买一些外敷用的抗真菌软膏来帮助控制这种感染。

query_title_en: My nail turned black after being hit. Will a new nail grow?
query_title_zh: 指甲被撞黑，还能长出新指甲吗？
query_content_en: On April 17, I collided with an electric scooter, and my right ring finger was severely hit. The flesh under the nail (the part below the white area shown in the picture) partially came off but didn’t completely detach. The doctor put in three stitches. Stitches were removed on May 1. Now the nail is loose. Will a new nail grow? I'm worried about nail bed damage.
query_content_zh: 4月17号与一电动车相撞，右手无名指指头撞击严重，当时指甲下一部分肉（即图中指甲白色下面部分）掉了出来，但没有完全掉下，因此医生缝了三针，5月1号拆线，现在指甲摇摇欲坠，想问一下这种情况新指甲还能长出来吗，好担心甲床损伤

responses.content_en: A new nail should grow if the nail bed was not permanently damaged. It can take up to 6 months for this to happen.
responses.content_zh: 如果指甲床没有永久损伤，新指甲应该会重新生长。这个过程可能需要长达6个月。

responses.content_en: Appears to be significant nail injury.  Unclear to tell at this time if a new nail will grow.  If there is damage to the germinal matrix at the base of the nail, this may impact future nail growth.  New nail growth would likely take multiple weeks to months.
responses.content_zh: 似乎是指甲受伤。现时不清楚指甲会否重生。如果指甲根部的生发基质受损，这可能会影响未来的指甲生长。新指甲可能需要数星期才能长回。

query_title_en: Is the new nail growing back after my nail bed was cut and stitched up a fungal nail infection?
query_title_zh: 看下甲床被切掉又缝合了，新长出的指甲是不是灰指甲啊？
query_content_en: Why is the surface so uneven?
query_content_zh: 为什么坑坑洼洼的！

responses.content_en: It does appear that there is a new nail growing but there is no sign of a fungal infection.
responses.content_zh: 看起来确实有新指甲在生长，但没有真菌感染的迹象。

query_title_en: Second day of an abrasion. Is this infected or healing normally?
query_title_zh: 擦伤第二天，这是感染了还是正常恢复？

responses.content_en: If you have symptoms such as fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, pain, warmth, worsening redness or pus-like disharge at the wound, I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 如果你有发烧、寒战、恶心、呕吐、疼痛、伤口发热、红肿加重或有脓性分泌物等症状，我建议你去最近的紧急护理中心进行进一步检查。

query_title_en: Seeking help...
query_title_zh: 求助。。。
query_content_en: Fell while biking, disinfected it, should I put a band-aid or let it scab naturally?
query_content_zh: 骑车时摔得，已经消过毒了，贴创可贴还是让他自然结痂

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: I would recommend placing a non-adhesive dressing like a xeroform gauze to allow healing, I would recommend placing bacitracin ointment as well.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用非粘附性包扎物包扎，如XEROFORM纱布，以促进愈合。我也建议涂上杆菌肽软膏。

query_title_en: How can you treat accidental cut wound
query_title_zh: 意外割伤，这个怎么处理？
query_content_en: I cut myself accidently. The hospital did some imaging, there was no any appearant bone fracture, but told us the bone did injured slightly. We then did stiches. This area should not involve tendon and nerve right? The doctor was not so concerned, but I am afriad. They did not order any anti-inflammatory medications. Should I get some anti-inflammatory medication myself?
query_content_zh: 不小心割伤了，医院拍了片子，没有明显骨折，说是骨头稍微有点伤，然后缝合了几针，这个位置应该不涉及肌腱，神经之类的吧，医生说的轻轻松松，自己属实害怕……也不给开消炎药，要不要自己去买些消炎药服用？

responses.content_en: The cut would need to be deep to involve tendons or nerves. If you are able to move or feel sensation along the area, it is unlikely to have involved the tendons or nerves. If you are having pain or swelling, feel free to take anti-inflammatory medicine to help with your symptoms.
responses.content_zh: 切口需要足够深才会影响到肌腱或神经。如果您能够在该区域移动或感到触觉，通常不会涉及到肌腱或神经。如果您感到疼痛或肿胀，可以服用消炎药来缓解症状。

responses.content_en: Included picture is of large gapping laceration with exposed subcutaneous fat.  Wound appears deep and it is difficult to tell if there is muscle involvement.  The clinical question suggest that sutures were placed however there is no included image of sutures.  Also unclear in the description what is meant when they state that the bone was slightly injured.  Unable to give recommendation if there is tendon involvement without evaluation.  If concerned would recommend follow-up.
responses.content_zh: 图片显示的是一个较大的裂伤，皮下脂肪外露。伤口较深，难以判断是否涉及肌肉。临床描述中提到伤口可能已缝合，但没有包含缝合的图片。临床描述中提到骨头略微受伤，但描述不清，无法明确其含义。如果有肌腱受损的疑虑，需进一步评估后才能提供建议。如果担忧，建议随访。

responses.content_en: This wound does not appear to involve nerve or tendon based on the location of the injury and the structures that run in this area. If you do not have any anti-inflammatory medication, pick up some over-the-counter to help with pain management.
responses.content_zh: 根据损伤的位置和部位的结构，该伤口似乎不涉及神经或肌腱。如果你没有任何抗炎药，可以服用一些非处方药物来帮助控制疼痛。

query_title_en: Can muscle loss be repaired?
query_title_zh: 肌肉损失 缺失还可以修复吗？
query_content_en: It was a traffic accident. There was a foreign body penetrating vertically through back of my right thigh, and parts of the flesh was missing. The top later of the skin was sutured, so nothing can be seen from the superficial layer. Since I was only in my 10s, and that I am still growing in height, the missing part of the muscle mass has been constantly changing during devleopment, and eventually forming the dent you can see  now. I can walk properly, but the core strength was not stable. I will have pain if I walk for a long distance. My calves always have cramps.
query_content_zh: 是交通事故，异物垂直插入右大腿则后方，少了一块肉，当时把表面的皮肤缝合，表面看不出什么。因为当时才十几岁，身高还在发育，发育过程中肌肉缺失的地方一直在变化，最终形成现在的凹陷。可以正常行走，但重心不稳，长时间行走，会疼痛，小腿经常抽筋。

responses.content_en: Unfortunately if the wound has not changed after a year, it would be unlikely for it to remodel. You can see a Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss scar revision surgery.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口在一年后没有变化，重塑的可能性很小。您可以咨询整形外科专家，讨论疤痕修复手术。

query_title_en: The injury was caused by falling off a scooter.
query_title_zh: 骑车摔得伤
query_content_en: Could any experts tell me if this is inflammation and suppuration?
query_content_zh: 大神们请问我这个是发炎鼓脓了吗

responses.content_en: There is inflammation since the area around the wounds are red. If there is pus-like drainage from the wounds, then there is suppuration. Based on the photos, there does not appear to be suppuration.
responses.content_zh: 由于伤口周围发红，代表存在炎症。如果伤口有脓样分泌物，则代表有化脓。根据照片显示，目前似乎没有化脓现象。

query_title_en: It has been 20ish days, I don't know if it will recover back to what it used to be
query_title_zh: 20多天了，不知道能不能长回愿样

responses.content_en: It can take a wound 6-8 weeks for healing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口的愈合时间可能需要6-8周。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be a healing avulsion injury to the tip of the finger with some possible nail injury.  Will require multiple weeks of healing for granulation which appears to be occurring.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  May use topical emollients and moisturizing creams to help soften skin.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是手指尖的撕脱伤，可能伴有指甲损伤。愈合可能需要数周，肉芽组织正在逐渐形成。避免使用酒精、过氧化氢或碘等干燥剂，可以用润肤剂和保湿霜来软化皮肤。

responses.content_en: Unclear what caused this injury, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person for a incision and drainage if there is frustrating from the area as the appears to be significant swelling to the finger as well as overlying granulation tissue at the tip of the finger. This will take a long time to heal and I would recommend soaking the finger in warm soapy water several times a day to soften the skin in the area.
responses.content_zh: 不清楚造成这种损伤的原因。手指和指尖的肉芽组织似乎明显胀大；如果该部位令你觉得不顺畅，我建议你亲自去看医生进行切口和引流。这伤口需要很长时间才能愈合，我建议每天用温肥皂水浸泡手指几次，以软化该部位的皮肤。

query_content_en: Fell off the bike, what should I do? Applied purple medicine, one wound healed, one hasn't after 3 days.
query_content_zh: 骑车摔伤大家看看怎么办，现在上的紫药水一个愈合了一个没有3天了

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、发冷、恶心、呕吐、发热、红肿、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Wounds to bilateral knees with abrasions with what appears to be violation of the dermis.  Would need additional clinical information to ensure that they have no difficulty with range of motion or bony tenderness that would require additional evaluation.  Would recommend thorough wound cleaning with warm soapy water as well as local wound care with application of topical antibiotic ointment, nonadherent dressing changed daily.  Would additionally recommend updating tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Avoid putting any drying agents on the wound such as hydrogen peroxide, alcohol, or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 双侧膝盖有擦伤，似乎侵损到真皮层。需要更多临床医疗资料、以确保在活动范图内活动没有困难和骨骼痛楚，这需要额外评估。建议用温和的肥皂水彻底清洗伤口，和伤口部位的护理。涂上外敷用的抗生素药膏，用非粘附性的包扎物包好；每日更换包扎。另外，如果破伤风注射己過期，亦要重新注射疫苗。避免在伤口使用酒精、二氧化氢、或碘等干燥剂。

query_title_en: Feels like it's festering.
query_title_zh: 感觉是化脓了。。
query_content_en: Fell off my bike three days ago, disinfected with hydrogen peroxide and iodophor at home, then applied the hospital’s emergency ointment, but it doesn’t seem to help.
query_content_zh: 骑车摔的，第三天，家里有双氧水碘伏就消毒了一下，然后涂的医院配的外用应急软膏，感觉没啥用

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the hospital for further evaluation as it appears the wound is infected and you may need additional treatment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去医院进一步检查，因为看起来伤口已经感染，可能需要额外的治疗。

query_title_en: Burn injury on the second day, feeling a bit panicked
query_title_zh: 烫伤第二天，有点慌
query_content_en: It seems like I got burned when I was a child, but I don't remember anything now. Is it okay to get burned like this? Shouldn't be a problem, right?
query_content_zh: 小时候好像也烫过，但现在一点印象都没有，烫成这个程度没问题吧……没吧？

responses.content_en: Apply burn cream to the areas and cover with a bandage. Avoid popping the blisters as this may increase your risk of infection.
responses.content_zh: 在烧伤区域涂抹烧伤膏，并用绷带覆盖。避免戳破水泡，因为可能增加感染的风险。

responses.content_en: Given that the burns are over/close to joints, I would recommend being seen by a provider in person to have the wound debrided to allow the fluid/blisters in your finger to drain. ￼
responses.content_zh: 由于烧伤在关节上方/附近，我建议由医护人员亲自去清理伤口，以排除手指上的液体/水疱。

query_title_en: It's been more than two months and it still hasn't healed.
query_title_zh: 两个月多了，还没有好

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a General Surgery or Plastic Surgery specialist for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看普通外科或整形外科专家进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: Can someone take a look if this wound is from a dog bite? Do we have anyone with exerience?
query_title_zh: 帮忙看下这个伤口是不是狗咬的，有懂行的吗

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation and to receive antibiotics. You should also receive a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心进一步评估并接受抗生素治疗。如果您的破伤风疫苗已经接种超过5年，也应接种破伤风疫苗。

responses.content_en: The wound itself does not appear to be secondarily infected and dog bites are not typically sutured given risk for infection.  Depending on the depth or extent of the wound may need antibiotic prophylaxis.  Additionally, your tetanus shot should be updated if not up-to-date.  Regarding rabies prophylaxis, if the you are not vaccinated to rabies or the status of the dog is unknown and the dog cannot be quarantined, would recommend rabies postexposure prophylaxis including immunoglobulin and vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎未有继友感染。因为有可能受感染，狗咬伤口通常不进行缝合修复。根据伤口的深度或程度，可能需要预防性地使用抗生素。另外，如果破伤风注射免疫期己过，应注射破伤风疫苗。至于狂犬病预防，如果你没有接种狂犬病疫苗，或者狗的状态未知，狗不能被隔离，建议进行狂犬病暴露后预防，包括使用免疫球蛋白和疫苗。

query_title_en: Will my hand have a scar?
query_title_zh: 我手这样会留疤吗
query_content_en: It was from scratching
query_content_zh: 挠出这样的

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar. Use sunscreen or wear a hat when outdoors to minimize sun exposure to the area.
responses.content_zh: 很难确定是否会留下疤痕。为了减少该区域的日晒，请使用防晒霜或外出时戴帽子。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully evaluate wound as it is unclear where this is located however does have the appearance of a wound on the flexor surface.  There appears to be granulation tissue present with significant scaling.  In regards to the clinical question of will this have a scar, this will likely have some residual scar given the wound type.  To minimize scar formation, would recommend coverage with a topical antibiotic, nonadherent dressing and do dressing changes daily.  While doing dressing changes, may clean the wound gently with warm soapy water.  To minimize scar formation as the wound heals, avoid UV exposure and after there is no longer any evidence of open skin, may use scar minimization cream such as Mederma.
responses.content_zh: 由于不清楚伤口的具体部位，因此难以全面评估，但伤口似乎位于屈侧表面，有肉芽组织和显著鳞屑。针对是否会留下瘢痕的问题，基于伤口类型，可能会有一些残留瘢痕。为减少瘢痕形成，建议使用局部抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料进行覆盖，并每天更换敷料。在更换敷料时，可用温肥皂水轻柔清洗伤口。随着伤口愈合，为减少瘢痕形成，应避免紫外线照射，并在没有开放性伤口后，使用如Mederma的瘢痕淡化霜。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing appropriately, there is a possibility that there will be no scar.  I would recommend soaking your hand in warm soapy water to promote drainage from the wound and dressing the area with a nonadhesive dressing. I would recommend avoiding sunlight exposure to the hand and applying SPF as needed.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合，有可能不留疤痕。我建议将手浸泡在温肥皂水中，以促进伤口的引流，并用非粘附性包扎敷料包扎该区域。我建议避免手部暴露在阳光下，并根据需要涂抹防晒霜。

query_title_en: Fell off my bike, and the hospital recommended a skin graft, but I decided to recover at home.
query_title_zh: 骑车摔伤，医院要求植皮，回家保守恢复。
query_content_en: It's been 13 days now, and I feel anxious and awful while changing the dressing. I hope to get some support from this online forum. Hospital treatment for a skin graft costs over RMB ten thousand. I'm feeling bad to think that a single fall costs this much.
query_content_zh: 现在已经13天了，换药的时候紧张心里难受。希望能得到吧友得支持。去医院植皮治疗要1万出头呢，唉一跤打一万。谁不疼。

responses.content_en: A skin graft would allow for quicker healing, restore function and improve the appearance of the area but would not be mandatory. But the choice is ultimately up to you if the procedure is very costly.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤移植可以加速愈合，恢复功能并改善该区域的外观，但并非必需。最终的选择取决于您自己，特别是如果该手术费用较高的情况下。

responses.content_en: Significant tissue avulsion to the dorsal aspect of the foot with some exposed subcutaneous fat.  Will likely have extended healing.  With granulation tissue.  You should keep the wound clean and do gentle washing with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine to open skin.  You should use topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressings, change daily.  No overt evidence of secondary infection.
responses.content_zh: 足背部组织有显著撕脱，伴有部分皮下脂肪暴露，预计愈合时间较长，并伴有肉芽组织。你应保持伤口清洁，每天1至3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗。避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。建议使用抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料，并每日更换。无明显继发感染的证据。

responses.content_en: I'm sorry that this injury happened, and it is unfortunate that the skin graft treatment cost so much. It is possible that this area would not completely heal without a skin graft, and at the very least it would likely leave a large scar/mark without a skin graft. I would recommend it these financial concerns with your provider to see if there are any other options for you. If you decide to manage this at home, I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water and dressing the wound with bacitracin ointment and a xeroform dressing.
responses.content_zh: 很遗憾发生了这种损伤。更加不幸的是，植皮治疗花费了这么多钱。如果没有皮肤移植，这个区域可能不会完全愈合；至少在没有皮肤移植的情况下，它可能会留下很大的疤痕/痕迹。我会与你的护理人员探讨这些医疗上的使费问题，看看是否有其他选择。如果你决定在家里处理这个问题，我建议把伤口浸泡在温肥皂水中，用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料包扎伤口。

query_title_en: What kind of wound is this?
query_title_zh: 这到底是什么伤口
query_content_en: A wound with a diameter of one centimeter has pus.
query_content_zh: 直径一厘米，伤口有脓

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say what type of wound this is without additional information such as the history on how this wound appeared.
responses.content_zh: 在没有更多信息（如伤口出现的背景）的情况下，很难判断这是哪种类型的伤口。

responses.content_en: Appears to be a pressure injury but unclear as to the location, duration, or context.  Difficult to tell if infected given limited picture.  Needs medical evaluation and wound care
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来像是压疮，但位置、持续时间或具体情况不明确。由于图片信息有限，很难判断是否存在感染。建议进行医疗评估和专业伤口护理。

responses.content_en: This appears to be an infected 1 cm size wound with purulent drainage. Just based on the image it is difficult to assess the underlying depth of the infection but there is definite damage to the overlying skin with surrounding erythema (redness of the skin).
