This definitely needs in person evaluation by a physician and warrants potential drainage/antibiotics as well as further history as to what caused this wound.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是一个已受感染的1厘米大小的伤口，有流脓现象。仅根据图像很难评估感染的深度，但周围的红斑（皮肤发红）显示了上覆皮肤已受了损伤。你需要亲自去见医生进行评估；可能需要引流/服用抗生素，以及进一步了解的病史，以确定造成这种伤口的原因。

query_title_en: Cut off half with a kitchen knife.
query_title_zh: 菜刀切掉一半
query_content_en: Guys, what should I do? I accidentally cut myself the night before last. I used a band-aid at first, then changed it yesterday morning. The band-aid stuck to the wound, and when I took it off, it bled a little, so I applied some Yunnan Baiyao powder and put on another band-aid. I just removed it today, but it’s still sticking to the wound. It bled a little when I took it off. I disinfected it with iodine and put on another band-aid. How long will this take to heal?
query_content_zh: 兄弟们，这个怎么办 前天晚上不小心切到了 当时贴了个创口贴 昨天早上把创口贴换了 创口贴粘在伤口上面 取下来之后有点流血就在创可贴上面撒了点云南白药粉贴了上去 今天刚刚取下来了 还是粘在伤口上面 取下来有一点点溢血 用碘伏棉签消毒后又贴了个创可贴 这个大概什么时候能好呢

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. It may take up to 6-8 weeks for healing. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。愈合可能需要6至8周。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Do not use iodine, alcohol, or hydrogen peroxide.  Does not appear to be secondarily infected but would recommend cleaning wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing dressing.  Will need to heal by secondary intention and tissue will granulate in.  Nail will need to regrow.
responses.content_zh: 避免使用碘、酒精或过氧化氢。伤口似乎没有继发性感染，但建议每天用温肥皂水清洗三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。需要通过自发愈合方式进行修复，组织将逐渐长出肉芽。指甲需要重新长出。

responses.content_en: It appears as though a layer of your skin was removed when you removed the bandaid. I would recommend placing  bacitracin ointment to the wound and xeroform gauze to the wound to help with wound healing and prevent infection. This will likely take a few weeks to heal.
responses.content_zh: 当你除去伤口的包扎物时，你的皮肤似乎被除去了一层。我建议在伤口上涂抹杆菌肽软膏，敷上XEROFORM纱布，以帮助伤口愈合并预防感染。这可能需要几周的时间才能痊愈。

query_title_en: Fell off an electric scooter a few days ago, got abrasions.
query_title_zh: 前几天骑电动车摔车了 #擦伤#
query_content_en: Can you check if this scab is normal? I went to the school clinic when I got injured; they disinfected it and gave me iodophor to apply twice daily. The injury is on my knee, so it's hard to go out and get a PCR test, and I can’t go to the hospital. (The first few photos are taken when I just got injured.)
query_content_zh: 请你们帮我看看这个结痂的情况是否正常？刚受伤的时候有去学校校医室检查了，他们帮我做了消毒，开了碘伏让我回家一天两次擦。因为伤在膝盖的位置，基本上出门很困难所以没法做核酸，就没办法去医院检查…..（前几张是刚受伤时候的照片）

responses.content_en: The wound is healing slowly and the scab appears to be normal. Continue local wound care with washing with soap and water daily  and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, swelling, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口在缓慢的愈合，皮肤看起来正常。继续进行局部伤口护理，天天用肥皂和水清洗并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发热、寒战、恶心、呕吐、红肿、温热、肿胀、出血或脓性分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_content_en: Can someone tell me if my wound can heal on its own, or do I need a skin graft? I was hit by an electric bike on the side of my calf while walking, but at first, I didn’t think it was serious. Two days later, the wound turned black, so I went to the hospital for treatment. After about a week, I had an ultrasound debridement under anesthesia. It’s been a month now, and here are some pictures of the wound from the start until now. The wound is less than a centimeter wide, and I’ve been getting the treatment every three days at the wound care clinic. Because the health record is under burns and plastic department, two doctors keep saying that it won’t heal on its own and that I’ll need a skin graft. Even if it heals, they say I’ll have a scar, and wearing pants will hurt. I want to ask everyone if they are just exagerating the seriousness to make me get the surgery, or do I really need a skin graft?
query_content_zh:
求各位大佬给看看，我这个伤口能自己恢复好吗？必须植皮吗
是在走路时被电瓶车撞伤的小腿侧边，当然觉得问题不大没在意，两天后伤伤口发黑才去的医院处理，大概一周左右做了麻醉的超声清创，目前已经一个月，下面分别是刚受伤到目前的照片，伤口大概不到厘米.一直每三天在伤口治疗门诊换药.
因为需要病历挂了烧伤整形科，有两个医生从一开始就不停说我这个自己长不好必须要植皮，就算长好了也会留疤穿裤子也要磨着疼之类的，我想问问各位大佬他是故意说严重想让我植皮手术还是我这个就是必须植皮呢？

responses.content_en: A skin graft would allow the wound to heal faster but it is ultimately your decision if you would like to pursue it.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤移植可以让伤口愈合得更快，但最终是否进行取决于你的决定。

query_title_en: Please help me take a look.
query_title_zh: 麻烦各位大佬给看看
query_content_en: The wound on my index finger joint has not completely healed for years. It hurts slightly when I bend my finger. Can anyone help analyze what might be causing this?
query_content_zh: 食指关节处的伤口好些年了总是不能完全愈合，手指弯曲时伤口微疼，各位大佬，老哥们能帮忙分析下是怎么回事吗？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Hand Surgery specialist for further evaluation as it may be due to scar tissue.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您看手外科专家进行进一步检查，可能是由于疤痕组织引起的。

responses.content_en: This likely occurred from the skin tightly coming together after the scar formed, I would recommend doing daily exercises the joint to improve healing to allow more flexibility in your finger.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由于疤痕形成后皮肤紧紧地粘在一起造成的，我建议每天活动一下关节，以改善愈合，使手指更灵活。

query_title_en: Will my finger heal back to its original look after this injury?
query_title_zh: 手指伤成这样还能恢复成原来的样子吗？
query_content_en: I injured myself while riding my bike. It's been almost three weeks. Will the two sides of skin grow together? Will it leave a scar? I didn't get stitches at the time. Would it have been better if I had?
query_content_zh: 骑车摔伤，快3周了，两边能长一起吗？会不会留一个坑？当时没缝针，缝起来会不会好一点

responses.content_en: There appears to be healing occuring but it is difficult to say if the two sides of the wound will come together and return to its original look. The wound may leave a scar. It may have helped to get stitches at that time as they would have brought the tissue together.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正在愈合，但目前很难确定伤口的两侧是否会完全愈合并恢复到原来的样子。伤口可能会留下疤痕。如果当时进行了缝合，可能有助于将组织拉拢在一起。

responses.content_en: Difficult to tell if there is a developing felon, fingerpad infection.  If there is swelling, pain, and redness, would need evaluation for possible incision and drainage.  Laceration appears to be healing but will need time to granulate in an heal.   Would recommend cleaning wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing dressing.  Tetanus should be updated if not up to date.
responses.content_zh: 很难判断是否有指腹感染或甲沟炎形成。如果有肿胀、疼痛和发红的情况，需要进行评估，可能需要切开和引流。撕裂伤正在愈合，但需要时间长出肉芽和完全恢复。建议每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。

responses.content_en: It is unclear based on the image if there is an underlying infection however the laceration appears to have come together appropriately. This may have benefited from sutures at the time to help wound healing however this wound has come together. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether there is an underlying infection in the finger.
responses.content_zh: 根据图像，尚不清楚是否有表面下的感染，但撕裂伤囗似乎已经正常地愈合。现在伤囗己愈合，在伤口愈合前，缝线复合对你可能有所帮助。我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定手指是否有受到感染。

query_title_en: Will it heal?
query_title_zh: 还能恢复吗。
query_content_en: Parts was the skin was scraped out. It has been five months and nothing is changing. Will it return back to what it was before?
query_content_zh: 挂掉一块皮，已经已经五个月了，一直是这样，请问还能恢复到以前那样吗？

responses.content_en: Hypertrophic scars will soften over the course of a year. If cosemesis is a conern consult plastic surgery for scar revision.
responses.content_zh: 增生性瘢痕在一年内会软化。如果外观是个问题，请咨询整形外科进行瘢痕修复。

query_title_en: Please help, please help.
query_title_zh: 帮帮忙帮帮忙
query_content_en: A few days ago, I accidentally scraped off a layer of skin and used a bandage. Now there's something white and green in the middle of the wound. Is it infected?
query_content_zh: 前几天不小心擦掉了一层皮用止血贴包了，现在伤口中间有个白白绿绿的东西是不是化脓了啊

responses.content_en: There is no sign of infection at this time. The middle of the wound contains healing tissue. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 目前没有感染的迹象。伤口中央含有愈合组织。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓液分泌，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: My finger was cut by a knife, it went halfway through.
query_title_zh: 手指被刀割了，刀切下去一半
query_content_en: How should I handle this? How long will it take to heal? It's the second day today.
query_content_zh: 我现在该怎么处理，多久可以好，今天第二天了

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge. The nail may take up to 6 months to regrow. The cut will heal in 2-4 weeks.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。指甲可能需要长达6个月才能重新长出，伤口将在2-4周内愈合。

responses.content_en: As the wound is over 24 hours old, would not recommend suture repair.  To facilitate healing, it may be helpful to soak the affected extremity and warm soapy water 1-3 times daily for 10 to 15 minutes at a time.   Apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a nonadherent dressing.  Change the dressing once daily.  Tetanus shot should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 因为伤口己超过２４小时，不建议缝合修复。可以每日１至３次，每次１０至１５分钟，把受影响部位浸在温暖的肥皂水中以促进愈合。涂上外敷抗生素药膏、用非粘附性包扎物包好。每曰更换包扎物。如果破伤风疫笛注射免疫期己过，应注射破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Is this inflammed?
query_title_zh: 这是发炎了吗
query_content_en: I accidentally kicked the nail, and the whole toe nail ripped off. It has been two weeks, the wound is in extreme pain and oozing blood, is it infalmmed?
query_content_zh: 不小心踢到钉子，脚趾甲整个撕掉了，现在已经快两周了，伤口有剧烈疼痛和渗血，是发炎了吗？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as there may be an infection if you have continued pain and bleeding.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心接受进一步评估，如果您持续感到疼痛和出血，可能存在感染的风险。

query_title_en: Finger got cut by a blade, disinfected with Iodophor and bandaged, woke up to a blackened wound, what should I do?
query_title_zh: 手指被刀片划伤，碘伏消毒后包了创口贴，一觉醒来伤口变黑，怎么办
query_content_en: Got cut by a razor while shaving, rinsed it with water, and disinfected with Iodophor.
query_content_zh: 刮胡子的刀片划伤，冲过水之后用碘伏消毒了

responses.content_en: Continue performing local wound care with washing area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 你要继续用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抗生素药膏和用绑带缠好

query_title_en: Does this wound need stitches?
query_title_zh: 这伤口有必要缝合吗
query_content_en: Yesterday's wound has already turned yellow after a day.
query_content_zh: 昨天的伤口，已经过了一天了，伤口发黄

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for stitiches for proper healing and to evaluate the other wound to make sure there is no sign of an infection.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去最近的急救中心缝合，以确保伤口能正确愈合，并评估其他伤口以确保没有感染迹象。

query_title_en: Fell off my bike, applied iodophor, and used a sterile dressing. Should I keep it covered?
query_title_zh: 骑车摔了，涂了碘伏然后贴了一个无菌敷贴，这样子还需要继续贴着
query_content_en: Fell off my bike, applied iodophor, and used a sterile dressing. Should I keep the sterile dressing on? The wound seems to be oozing pus or blood.
query_content_zh: 骑车摔了，涂了碘伏然后贴了一个无菌敷贴，这样子还需要继续贴着无菌敷贴吗，我看伤口好像在流脓还是流血

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water and cover with dry dressing. The liquid is slightly bloody because it is a new wound. This will stop in a day or two. The wound is not infected at this time.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗并覆盖干燥的敷料。这个液体有点像血，因为这是一个新伤口。这将在一两天内停止。此时伤口没有感染。

query_title_en: Facial abrasion, below is the condition
query_title_zh: 面部擦伤 情况如下
query_content_en: I have a facial abrasion from riding on a vehicle. There are two small openings, and then a large abrasion site. Currently, I cleaned the wound with iodine, and applied batroban twice. Anyone please tell me when will it recover, and if it will leave a scar?
query_content_zh: 面部骑车擦伤了，有两个小口，然后有一大片擦伤痕迹，目前碘伏清洁过伤口，涂了两次百多邦，想问问各位老师什么时候能恢复，会不会留下疤痕

responses.content_en: It may take up to 4 weeks for recovery. It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar as it depends how the body heals. Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 恢复可能需要长达4周。很难说这是否会留下疤痕，因为这取决于身体如何愈合。请继续进行伤口护理，包括用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: My palm has been scraped for more than half a month, the wound is black and getting hard
query_title_zh: 手掌磕破半个多月了，伤口发黑发硬

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a General or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss removal of the scab.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看普通外科或整形外科专家，讨论去除结痂的问题。

query_title_en: I have more than ten stiches after the car accident. I am creating a group chat for everyone to discuss how to get rid of scars
query_title_zh: 出车祸脸上缝了十几针，建个群大家一起交流交流怎么祛疤

responses.content_en: Follow up with your doctor to have the stitches removed as recommended. Keep the wound moist with petroleum jelly and cover with a bandage. Wear sunscreen and use a hat when outdoors. If you would like, you may a Dermatology specialist for further treatment.
responses.content_zh: 按照建议，跟进医生进行拆线。保持伤口湿润，使用凡士林并用绷带覆盖。外出时涂抹防晒霜并戴帽子。如果您愿意，可以看皮肤科专家寻求进一步治疗。

responses.content_en: I would recommend applying sunscreen to the area once it heals and reducing sunlight exposure to reduce scarring.
responses.content_zh: 我建议在该部位愈合后涂抹防晒霜，减少阳光照射以减少疤痕。

query_title_en: Does this require a tetanus shot?
query_title_zh: 这种要打破伤风吗
query_content_en: Will it scar?
query_content_zh: 会不会留疤啊

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you get a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the last 5 years. There is a possibility that it may leave a scar. If it continues to bleed, you may need to go to the nearest Urgent Care for stitches. Otherwise, perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种。伤口可能会留下疤痕。如果出血持续，您可能需要前往最近的急诊护理中心进行缝合。或是继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Healing laceration. If tetanus is not up to date would recommend tetanus.  Clean would three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 撕裂伤正在愈合。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine the depth of the laceration and if you need sutures. If you had your tetanus shot recently (last 10 years) then you do not need another vaccine. This will likely leave a scar long term but to help reduce the chance of scarring I would keep the laceration away from sunlight and keep the area clean.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定撕裂损伤的深度，以及是否需要缝合。如果你最近（过去10年）接种了破伤风疫苗，那么你就不需要再接种疫苗了。这可能会长期留下疤痕。为了减少疤痕的机会，我会让撕裂处远离阳光，保持该部位清洁。

query_title_en: Does this situation still require gauze bandaging?
query_title_zh: 这种情况还需要用纱布包扎吗？

responses.content_en: If the wound is dry and no longer bleeding or draining, you do not need to place gauze bandaging over it.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口干燥且不再出血或渗液，则无需在上面放置纱布。

query_title_en: Experts, I had stitches removed from this wound. When I lift my wrist, it feels tight. How long until I can move freely?
query_title_zh: 大佬们 这个伤口拆线了 上抬手腕有拉扯感 大概多久能自由活动呢
query_content_en: Firends, I had stitches removed. When I lift my wrist, it feels tight. How long until I can move freely?
query_content_zh: 大佬们 这个伤口拆线了 上抬手腕有拉扯感 大概多久能自由活动呢

responses.content_en: The scar from the laceration will continue remodel for 1-1.5 years after an injury. Over time the scar will cebome softer and smoother.
responses.content_zh: 裂伤的疤痕将在受伤后继续重塑1到1.5年。随着时间过去，疤痕会变得更柔软和光滑。

query_title_en: Went out shirtless for a walk and got injured by some mischievous kids. How do I treat this to avoid scarring?
query_title_zh: 光着膀子出去遛弯被熊孩子暗杀了，想问问这种伤怎么处理不留疤
query_content_en: Went out shirtless for a walk and got injured by some mischievous kids. How do I treat this to avoid scarring?
query_content_zh: 光着膀子出去遛弯被熊孩子暗杀了，想问问这种伤怎么处理不留疤

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as you may need treatment with stitches. I would recommend a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the last 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心接受进一步检查，您可能需要缝合治疗。如果您在过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种破伤风疫苗。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully appreciate size of the wound however there does appear to be significant tissue gapping which would heal better with sutures.  If wound is greater than 24 hours old, would not recommend suture repair given increased risk for infection.  In order to minimize any scarring during and after the wound heals, avoid UV exposure, use sunscreen for up to 1 year, avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  Use emollients including moisturizing lotions and topical antibiotic ointment and keep the wound clean and covered with a nonadherent dressing.  After the wound heals to minimize scar formation you may do tissue massage to align collagen fibers and use scar cream such as Mederma
responses.content_zh: 伤口的大小不易明确，但似乎有明显的组织缺损，缝合可能有助于愈合。如果伤口超过24小时，不建议缝合，以免增加感染风险。为减少愈合期间和愈合后的瘢痕形成，避免紫外线照射，使用防晒霜持续一年，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。可使用润肤剂如保湿乳液和局部抗生素软膏，保持伤口清洁并用无粘连敷料覆盖。在伤口愈合后，为减少瘢痕，可进行组织按摩以整合胶原纤维，并使用如Mederma的瘢痕霜。

responses.content_en: Difficult to assess based on this image, it does not appear to be a deep laceration however if you have concerned that the wound is not closing then I would recommend presenting to the hospital to be evaluated further.
responses.content_zh: 根据这张照片很难评估，它似乎不是深度的撕裂损伤；但是，如果你担心伤口不能愈合，我建议你去医院做进一步评估。

query_title_en: Friends, are there a small piece of hair puncturing the skin or is it a small scar from a scrape wound
query_title_zh: 吧友们，这个是有根小头发刺进去了还是一个小划伤的疤痕啊
query_content_en: As mentioned above, it is on my feet. My feel was having some stabbing pain and I noticed this. I thought there was a small piece of hair and I tried squeezing it, but nothing came out
query_content_zh: 如题，脚上的，今天交上有点刺痛注意到的，以为是根小头发挤了半天没挤出来

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go into the nearest Urgent Care to have this evaluated in-person to see if there is a foreign body inside.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你前往最近的急诊诊所进行面对面的检查，看看是否有异物在里面。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided, there is no obvious underlying foreign body based on the image however, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether there is a underlying foreign body (pin, hair, etc.)
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难确定。图像上没有明显在表面下的异物，但我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定是否有下层异物（针、头发等）

query_title_en: Suddenly got a scratch on my wrist.
query_title_zh: 手腕上突然出现一道划痕
query_content_en: There are only two small holes, so why is there a scratch? I don't know how this appeared. The photo is too blurry. The wound looks a bit moist and feels like salt has been sprinkled on it. Help.
query_content_zh: 他明明只有两个小洞为什么会有一个划痕呢呢，我都不知道我怎么出现在这个伤口(>﹏<)这手机拍照太辣了，我描述一下这个伤口有一些湿润的痕迹，然后有一种被盐洒上去的感觉，救命π_π

responses.content_en: Laceration appears superficial. No clear signs of infection. Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. If there is pus or spreading seek evaluation in urgent care
responses.content_zh: 撕裂伤口似乎很浅。没有明显感染迹象。用肥皂水每曰清洗、并用干包扎物包好。如果有起脓或红肿现象便要到紧急护理诊所求诊。

query_title_en: It is a 2mm superficial wound. The skin is everted. Do I need the tetanus shot?
query_title_zh: 两毫米外伤，皮肤外翻，需要打破伤风吗？
query_content_en: I fell into a cobstruction site. It was a deep wound.
query_content_zh: 摔在施工的土地里了，很深的口子

responses.content_en: Superficial abrasion of the forearm. OK to get tetanus shot given trauma sustained on construction site.
responses.content_zh: 前臂表面的擦伤。因为在建筑地盘受伤，应去接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Injured my finger, a piece of flesh is missing. What should I do? Urgent.
query_title_zh: 摔伤手指缺了一块肉，应该怎么办，急
query_content_en: It's been 10 days. The black flesh turned to yellow rotten flesh, but no new flesh is growing. I'm using Meibao burn ointment daily. How can I maximize healing and minimize scarring?
query_content_zh: 都10天了，黑肉变成了黄色的腐肉，但是一直没有长肉的症状，每天在涂美宝烫伤膏，请问怎么样才能最大程度上长好肉，尽量少留疤？

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water daily followed by ointment and covering with a bandage. You could also go see a Dermatology or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss further treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和清水清洗，然后涂上药膏并用绷带覆盖。您也可以去看皮肤科或整形外科专家，讨论进一步的治疗方案。

query_title_en: How should I treat this kind of scar?
query_title_zh: 想问下这种伤疤怎么处理
query_content_en: How should I treat this scar? You can see the blood vessels, and it's a bit itchy. Does it need treatment, or is it hopeless?
query_content_zh: 想问一下这种伤疤怎么处理，可以看到血管，还有点痒，需要处理吗还是肯定好不了了

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Dermatology or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看皮肤科或整形外科专家，讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: Need more information as to the mechanism of injury if this was a burn versus laceration.  Appears to be healing although picture quality is poor and difficult to fully visualize the wound.  If there is scarring present, to minimize long-term appearance of scar would recommend  avoiding UV exposure, using sunscreen at all times, keeping the wound moisturized with emollients.  If scar permission is present, you may perform massage of the tissue to realign collagen fibers and use topical scar medication such as Mederma.  Given the size of the injury, there will likely still be some residual scar and if you require cosmetic effects will likely need scar revision surgery.
responses.content_zh: 需要更多关于损伤机制的信息，以判断是烧伤还是撕裂伤。虽然图片质量较差，难以完全看清伤口，但似乎正在愈合。如果有疤痕，为了减轻疤痕的明显程度，建议避免暴露於紫外线，持续使用防晒霜，并用润肤剂保持伤口湿润。如果出现疤痕增生，可按摩组织以帮助胶原纤维重新排列，并使用疤痕药物（如Mederma）。由于损伤面积较大，可能会遗留一些疤痕，如需改善外观，可能需要疤痕修复手术。

responses.content_en: I would recommend dressing the area with a bacitracin ointment and a xeroform dressing as it is starting to heal. It may scar, I would recommend reducing sunlight exposure to the area to reduce the likelihood of this.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经开始愈合，我建议用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM包扎物料包扎该部位。它可能会留下疤痕，我建议减少该位置的阳光照射，以降低这种可能性。

query_title_en: My ring finger got cut by a stainless steel edge.
query_title_zh: 无名指被白钢边划伤
query_content_en: My finger was cut by a stainless steel edge a few days ago. Does it have pus inside? It doesn’t seem like it when I press it. I just disinfected it. Any advice on how to treat this?
query_content_zh: 手指被白钢边划伤好几天了，这样里面是有脓液吗？按着好像还没有的样子，刚消消毒，有懂得还怎么处理

responses.content_en: Pus is usually thick and appears yellow/white/green. If you are concerned about an infection or have other symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding, consult a doctor and have this evaluated in-person. A tetanus vaccine is also recommended if you have not received it in the past 5 years. Otherwise, perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 脓液通常较为浓稠，颜色呈黄色、白色或绿色。如果您担心感染或出现其他症状，如发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血，请咨询医生并进行面对面的检查。如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，建议接种。否则，继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Laceration appears to be greater than 24 hours old and not amenable for suture repair.  There appears to be some granulation tissue with mild erythema of the skin flap.  No overt signs of infection.  Would recommend local wound care including soaking in warm soapy water 1-3 times a day for 10 to 15 minutes at a time.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  You may apply topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 撕裂伤似乎已超过24小时，不适合缝合修复。伤口有一些肉芽组织，伴有轻度红斑，但无明显感染迹象。建议局部伤口护理，包括每天浸泡温肥皂水1到3次，每次10至15分钟。避免使用干燥物质，如酒精、过氧化氢或碘。可使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say based on the image whether there is pus inside however it simply looks inflamed in the area. I would recommend soaking the area and warm soapy water to soften the skin and promote drainage if it is infected. I would recommend keeping the area covered with a non-adherent dressing to prevent further damage to the area.
responses.content_zh: 根据图像很难说里面是否有脓液，但它看起来已是发炎了。如果已受感染，我建议浸泡该区域、并用温肥皂水软化皮肤、和导走多馀液体。我建议用非粘附性包扎料覆盖该部位，以防止对它造成进一步损害。。

query_title_en: Knife wound
query_content_en: It’s been 6 days, can any expert tell if this piece of skin is alive or dead?
query_content_zh: 6天了，有哪位大神，能看下这块皮，是活是死

responses.content_en: It appears that the skin is still alive. But if the skin is not alive, it will slough off by itself over time. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 看起来皮肤仍然是存活的。但如果皮肤不再存活，它会随着时间的推移自行脱落。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be a flap tissue injury with possible sutures.  In regards to the clinical question if the skin is alive or dead, difficult to tell.  With any flap injury there is concern for devitalization of the tissue however appears to be too early to tell.  There does not appear to be any overt evidence of secondary infection and the piece of tissue is acting as a biologic bandage and should remain in place.  If the tissue is nonviable, it will eventually fall off and the area will leave an ulceration that will need to heal by secondary intention.  Given that this is over a finger joint, there is risk for skin contracture and decreased range of motion.  Would recommend close follow-up with a medical professional.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是皮瓣组织损伤，可能需要缝合修复。很难断定皮肤己死或是仍然存活。皮瓣组织损伤很大可能引起组织丧失生存活力；不過似乎为言过早。这里没有明显的继发感染。那一小点皮瓣组织可作为一个生物绷带、需作保留。如果组织无法存活，它最终会脱落，留下溃疡区域。这处需要辅助性的修复。考虑到这是发生在手指关节上，它有皮肤挛缩和活动范围缩小的风险。建改与专业医疗人员密切跟进。

query_title_en: This thing has been on my arm for several days, it's very itchy and I don't dare touch it.
query_title_zh: 这个东西长胳膊上好几天了，很痒，不敢动
query_content_en: The texture is similar to a blister.
query_content_zh: 质感和水泡差不多

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和清水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或类似脓液的分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Difficult to interpret or provide any recommendation based on the poor quality of the picture and no clinical context.  Cannot give any recommendation at this time without additional clinical context as to the nature of the wound and additional photos of her quality
responses.content_zh: 照片的质量差，亦欠缺诊疗的医学背境，所以不能阐识和提供建议。在欠缺有关伤口的性质和质量较好的照片下、没有诊疗的医学背境，未能提供任何建议。

query_title_en: Just asking, is the yellow liquid on my wound pus or exudate?
query_title_zh: 不懂就问，请问我这伤口上面黄色的液体是脓液还是组织渗出液？
query_content_en: Should I apply anything?
query_content_zh: 要不要涂些什么？

responses.content_en: The yellow liquid appears to be fluid from the normal healing process. Pus usually appears thicker and has a bad odor. No need to apply any ointment but consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, redness, warmth, bleeding or pus.
responses.content_zh: 黄色的液体看起来像正常恢复的过程。 脓经常是更厚的并且伴有臭味。 你不需要涂任何药膏，但如果有出现像发烧，冷汗，恶心，呕吐，红肿，发热， 流血或流脓的症状，你就要去看医生

query_title_en: Seeking help from community members, surgeons, emergency responders, and doctors.
query_title_zh: 求助吧友外科#急救#大夫#伤口#
query_content_en: An elderly was injured by firecrackers during the New Year. The leg wound area is purple. Is this bruising or an infection?
query_content_zh: 家里老人过年被鞭炮炸伤 腿部伤口面积发紫 如图 请问这是有淤血还是要感染#伤# #大夫# 【图片】【图片】【图片】

responses.content_en: The top portion of the wound may be an infection as it appears to have some yellow drainage. I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 伤口上半部可能有感染迹象，因为似乎有一些黄色渗液。我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心接受进一步评估。

responses.content_en: Appears to be a burn injury.  Your needs tetanus updated if not up to date.  Does not appear to be secondarily infected but would recommend cleaning wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是烧伤。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。看起来没有继发感染，但建议每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。

responses.content_en: Based on the image it is hard to say whether this is a infection or a bruise, or a component of both. This warrants further evaluation by a doctor in person to determine whether there is underlying injury/infection.
responses.content_zh: 根据图像，很难说这是感染还是瘀伤，或者两者兼而有之。这需要医生亲自进行进一步评估，以确定是否有表面下的损伤/感染。

query_title_en: Is this wound infected? It was from a month ago, and still have not healed yet. Help urgently needed.
query_title_zh: 想问一下这个是伤口感染了吗？一个月前了一直不好，急急急
query_content_en: I fell a month ago when riding my bike. I have not healed ever since, and the wound does not hurt either. It only hurt when I touch it, and does not impact walking. Does someone with experience know if this is infected?
query_content_zh: 一个月以前骑车摔伤了，一直不好，伤口也不疼，只有碰一下才会疼，走路也不怎么影响，就是想问一下各位大佬这个是感染了嘛？

responses.content_en: Delayed wound healing and surrounding redness may suggest an infection. Recommend evaluation in urgent care for antibiotics. If antibiotics do not improve healing it may require debridement.
responses.content_zh: 伤口愈合延迟和周围红肿可能表示感染。建议前往急诊寻求评估并接受抗生素治疗。如果抗生素不能增进愈合，可能需要清创。

query_title_en: Injured my ankle.
query_title_zh: 脚踝受伤了
query_content_en: On the seventh day, the physician said that the skin might not heal well, and a skin graft might be needed later.
query_content_zh: 第七天的时候大夫说皮可能长不好，后期可能需要植皮

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital as the wound needs to be cleaned and a possible infection may need to be addressed with antibiotics
responses.content_zh: 建议你去最近的医院因为伤口看起来需要清理和可能性的感染或许需要抗生素

query_title_en: The tendon on the bodyside of my forearm is completely rutpured!
query_title_zh: 小臂胳膊内测肌腱全断了！
query_content_en: Can any experts advise me on how to treat this persistent infection? I'm allergic to many antibiotics, including penicillin, ciprofloxacin, and levofloxacin. What should I do? I'm currently at the city hospital, but the condition is still not under control. If anyone has experience with this, please help. Otherwise, I might lose my arm.
query_content_zh: 各位大佬给看看这个怎么治呀感染了，不见好怎么办呀急急，医院里很多抗生素过敏，青霉素环丙沙星，左氧氟沙星，都过敏，怎么办呀，现在人在市医院，病情还没有控制住，各位谁有经验，给想想办法，在不行胳膊保不住了

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you ask to speak to an Infectious Disease specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您请求与传染病专家讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: Pictures appear to be from a surgical operation.  Unable to give recommendation and would recommend discussion with a medical team.  Regarding the your question as to how to treat an infection, this should be discussed with the a surgical team and infectious disease.
responses.content_zh: 这些图片似乎来自外科手术，无法给出具体建议。建议与医疗团队讨论。至于如何治疗感染的问题，应与外科团队和感染科沟通。

responses.content_en: I would recommend discussing this with the providers in the hospital. You may benefit from antibiotics from this but there are several options for antibiotics that are not the ones that you are allergic to.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你与医院里的医务人员讨论这个问题。服用抗生素可能对你有所帮助；如对一些抗生素有过敏现象，你可以服用其他抗生素。

query_title_en: Pus under the scab.
query_title_zh: 结痂下化脓
query_content_en: Just asking, I can see yellow liquid under the scab when exposed to light, and the scab feels soft. Does this mean there's pus under the scab?
query_content_zh: 不懂就问，光照可以看见结痂下面🈶黄色液体，而且结痂摸起来是软的，这种是不是结痂下面化脓了

responses.content_en: Pus can be yellow in apperance but is thick in its texture. The yellow liquid you observe may also be due to a collection of fluid from the inflammation that occurs during the normal healing process. Consult a doctor if you have additional symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding as these may indicate an infection.
responses.content_zh: 脓液外观可能呈黄色，但质地较厚。您观察到的黄色液体也可能是由于在正常愈合过程中，炎症引起的液体积聚。如果出现其他症状，如发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血，这些可能表明感染，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: Will the wound on my face leave a scar? What should I do?
query_title_zh: 脸上的伤口会留疤吗？怎么办
query_content_en: I accidentally got a wound on my face (as shown in the picture). Will it leave a scar? How can I prevent scarring? What medication should I use? What should I be careful of while eating? Is there anything else I should be aware of?
query_content_zh: 不小心脸上有个这样的伤口（如图）怎么办？会留下伤疤，或者疤痕么？要怎么注意才可以？我不想留疤痕，怎么办？要拿什么药？吃饭的时候注意什么？还有其他要注意的地方吗？

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if a scar will form as it depends on how the body heals. Keep out of direct sunlight by wearing a hat and applying sunscreen for 6 months to prevent hyperpigmentation. You do not need to avoid any particular foods.
responses.content_zh: 是否会形成疤痕很难确定，这取决于身体的愈合情况。为了防止色素沉着，建议6个月内避免阳光直射，戴帽子并涂抹防晒霜。您不需要避免任何特定食物。

query_title_en: I got a small scratch from a rusty iron piece. Do I need a tetanus shot? The wound is shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 被带铁锈的铁块划伤了一点点要不要打破伤风 伤口如图

responses.content_en: If the metal had rust on it recommend a tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 如果金属上有锈迹，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: How should I treat such a wound (warning: blood shown in the picture)?
query_title_zh: 这样的伤口怎么处理（晕血勿进.有图）
query_content_en: Details: While walking, I didn't see a wooden bench on the side and scratched my right knee about 10 cm below. It hurts a lot and bled a bit. Since it was late, I just put on a couple of band-aids and left it alone. Two days later, I took off the band-aids, and it looked like this (as shown in the picture). How should I treat this wound? Should I apply any ointment?
query_content_zh: 详情：走路的时候没看见边上有木凳.于是 右脚膝盖右侧下方大概10cm的地方就擦伤了...555.我觉得很痛，流了一些血、因为当时很晚了，所以我贴了两个创可贴就没管了...两天后打开创可贴是这样的，如图.....问题：如何处理这个伤口，是要擦什么药水吗？

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: I was scratched by a kitten. Do I need to get vaccinated? I have already cleaned the wound with soap and iodophor, as shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 被小猫抓了一下需要去打疫苗吗已经用肥皂和碘伏清理过了伤口如图

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: As shown in the image, my thumb was cut, and had four stitchs. The stitches was removed 14 days after the day of injury, and I have been wrapping it throughout this time, and reapplied medicaitons. The wound was not red during dressing change, but there was edematous, and now the thumb is unable to bend. Is this concerning? The injury occured 11/16 and suture removed on the 30th, at what date will it be healed and able to bend?
query_content_zh: 如图 我大拇指肚位置被割伤，缝了4针，受伤14天拆的线，期间一直在包扎，也换过药，换药时伤口不红，但有水肿，现在大拇指不能弯曲，请问有事吗？ 11月16号弄伤的30号拆的线，请问几号可以长好并且弯曲？

responses.content_en: If the swelling is new, that may be concerning. I would recommend that you consult a doctor for further evaluation. It may take up weeks for you to regain functions such as bending but if you do not, see your Primary Care doctor to obtain a referral to Occupational Therapy.
responses.content_zh: 如果肿胀是新的情况可能需要关注。我建议您咨询医生进行进一步评估。恢复如手指弯曲等功能可能需要几周时间，但如果没有恢复，建议您看您的初级保健医生，以转诊职业治疗。

query_title_en: I got hit by a car on a cement road and my arm has several wounds with some flesh scraped off. How long will it take to heal? I need to continue basketball training. The wounds are shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 在水泥地被车撞手臂上好几处伤擦掉了几块肉这样的伤要多久会好还要篮球训练，伤口如图

responses.content_en: The wounds do not appear infected. Given the type of trauma, I recommend emergency room evaluation for imaging.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。鉴于创伤的类型，我建议去急诊室做影像检查。

responses.content_en: Very difficult to appreciate the wound from the pictures but appears to be multiple areas including elbow, heel/foot.  Appears to be healing well with granulation tissue without secondary signs of infection.  Would recommend continued local wound care.  Avoid any drying agents such as there is alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine.  Will still likely require multiple weeks of wound care for healing.  You may use topical antibiotic ointment and use nonadherent dressing.  May clean the wound 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water.
responses.content_zh: 很难从图片中看清伤口，但似乎包括肘部和脚后跟/脚多个部位。愈合良好，具有肉芽组织，没有二次感染的迹象。建议继续进行局部伤口护理。避免使用任何干燥剂，如酒精、过氧化氢或碘。愈合可能仍然需要数周的伤口护理。你可以使用局部抗生素软膏，并使用不粘贴敷料。可以每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口1到3次。

responses.content_en: This appears to be road rash, or superficial abrasions from the accident. As long as you have no other internal injuries, this should heal in a few weeks and shouldn't prevent you from doing basketball training.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是路疹，或事故造成的表面擦伤。只要内部没有受伤，几星期内会愈合，不会诊影响你你篮球训练。

query_content_en: Two months ago, I scraped my ankle while riding an electric bike, as shown in picture one. During the healing process, I scratched the wound with my hand. It has been two months and it hasn't healed yet, as shown in pictures two and three. It's also very itchy. Applying Dermovate seems to help a bit. What could be the issue?
query_content_zh: 我在两个月前骑电动车蹭到脚脖，如图一，然后伤口愈合过程中用手扣过伤口，现在两个月了，还没好，如图二.三，而且还特别痒，现在用皮炎平抹抹会好一点，请问这是怎么回事？？

responses.content_en: The wound is healing and does not appear infected. Itching at the wound site is common.
responses.content_zh: 伤口正在愈合，且看起来没有感染。伤口处的瘙痒是常见的现象。

query_content_en: I had surgery on my leg ten years ago, and after the stitches were removed, it seemed like the wound opened up again. After healing, the part that opened up became the scar shown in the picture. It has no sensation, feels hard with no elasticity, and the skin tends to crack easily. Is this normal? How should I take care of it daily?
query_content_zh: 十年前腿部做的手术，拆线后好像伤口裂开了，痊愈后裂开那部分就是如图的疤痕，而且没啥知觉，发硬没弹性，皮肤容易崩裂，请问这正常吗？日常应如何保养呢？

responses.content_en: Scar massage can be attempted to soften scars. The scar tissue has decreased elastiscity and strength compared to normal tissue. You can continue applying moisturizer daily.
responses.content_zh: 可以尝试进行疤痕按摩以软化疤痕。疤痕组织的弹性和强度比正常组织低。您可以每天继续涂抹保湿霜。

responses.content_en: Hypertrophic surgical scar.  Can try tissue massage and scar cream but given the size would likely need scar revision surgery if you want cosmetic improvement of the wound.
responses.content_zh: 增生性手术瘢痕。可以尝试组织按摩和瘢痕膏，但考虑到其大小，如果你希望改善伤口外观，可能需要进行瘢痕修复手术。

responses.content_en: This appears to be a thick raised scar, also known as a hypertrophic scar. I would continue to keep the wound clean, and prevent opening up the scar with movement as it may take additional time to heal.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是一个厚厚的凸起疤痕，也称为增生性疤痕。继续保持伤口清洁，并防止因活动而弄开疤痕，因为如此一来，这可能需要额外的时间才能愈合。

query_title_en: My hand was scratched by a small kitten. It's a small kitten. I've already washed it with soapy water. As shown in the picture, the wound isn't very deep. Should I go get a shot for this?
query_title_zh: 手被一只小猫抓伤了，还挺小的一只小猫，已经用肥皂水洗过了，如图伤口不是很深，这样要去打针吗

responses.content_en: No rabies shot needed. Clean wound with soap and water.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。用肥皂和水清洗伤口。

responses.content_en: Will does not appear to be very deep, continue to soak the area in warm soapy water. You may need antibiotics and tetanus shot. ￼
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎不是很深；应持续将该部位浸泡在温肥皂水中。你可能需要抗生素和破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: What should I do about a scar on my face? It's urgent!!!
query_title_zh: 脸上伤口留疤怎么办？急！！！
query_content_en: As shown in the picture, has the wound completely healed now? If so, can I wash my face with water and apply ointment? Which ointment is the best? Please provide an answer!!!! Thank you for the detailed response, I prefer not to have copy-paste answers.
query_content_zh: 如图所示，现在是伤口完全愈合了吗？如果是，可以用水洗脸和涂药膏了吗？哪种药膏最好？求解答！！！！谢谢解答，越详细越好，不喜欢复制粘贴。

responses.content_en: The wound is healed and you can wash your face with water. You can apply any ointment such as Vaseline.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经愈合，您可以用水洗脸。可以涂抹凡士林等软膏。

responses.content_en: Avoid UV exposure, use SPF containing moisturizer, massage area three times a day and use Mederma scar cream.
responses.content_zh: 避免紫外线暴露，使用含防晒成分的保湿剂，每天按摩该区域三次，使用Mederma瘢痕膏。

responses.content_en: Based on the image provided, it is hard to determine whether the wound is healed or not. At this time I do not recommend any ointments or urgent action to address the scar,
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像，很难确定伤口是否愈合。我不建议使用任何药膏；现时亦没有任何迫切需要来治理疤痕。

query_title_en: For minor dog bites or scratches, does the wound shape look like this in the picture? As shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 被狗咬伤或抓伤轻微伤口形状图是不是这个样子的啊如图所是

responses.content_en: A scratch can look like the injury as in the photo.
responses.content_zh: 划痕可能看起来像照片中的伤口。

responses.content_en: If vaccination status of dog is unknown, would recommend rabies series.  Local wound care is sufficient.
responses.content_zh: 如果狗的疫苗接种状态未知，建议接种狂犬病疫苗。局部伤口护理就行了。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided, this could potentially be caused by a minor dog bite. I would keep the area clean and dry and dress with a non-adherent dressing. ￼
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像，很难确定情况。伤口可能是由轻微的狗咬伤引起的。我会保持伤口清洁干燥，并用非粘附性的包扎物包好。

query_content_en: I was either bitten by my Samoyed or the leash got caught. There's no bleeding, and the wound is very small. Should I get a shot? The wound is shown in the picture. How much does the rabies vaccine cost at Shuangyu People's Hospital?
query_content_zh: 被自家萨摩耶咬到不知道还是狗绳子勒到，没流血，伤口非常的小，不知道要不要打针，，。伤口如图。双屿人民医院狂犬疫苗多少钱打完。

responses.content_en: No rabies vaccine necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

responses.content_en: Rabies postexposure prophylaxis depends on the animal in question, the vaccination status of the animal as well as your condition.  If the animal can be quarantined and monitored, postexposure prophylaxis may not be necessary.  If the vaccination status of the animal is unknown and cannot be monitored, then rabies postexposure management is recommended including the immunoglobulin as well as the rabies vaccination. Tetanus should additionally be updated if the tetanus status is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 狂犬症暴露后的预防措施取决于牵涉的动物、动物的疫苗接种情况，和你的疫苗接种情况。如果有关的动物可以隔离和覌察，你可能毋须进行暴露后的预防。如果动物接种疫苗情况不明、和不能观察，那便须要管控好狂犬症暴露后的措施，包括接种疫苗和注射免疫球蛋白。如果破伤风接种过期，建议更新破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: My fingernail is injured like this. Will it grow back normally, or will there always be a gap? As shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 手指甲伤成这样，还能长好吗？还是以后都会有一个缺口？如图

responses.content_en: The finger nail will grow back but can take 4-6 months.
responses.content_zh: 指甲会重新长出来，但可能需要4-6个月的时间。

query_title_en: My toenail just fell off. Will it grow back? (as shown in the picture)
query_title_zh: 趾甲刚脱落，如图这样还会不会长？
query_content_en: A month ago, I got hit, and now the scab has just fallen off. Can I use hydrogen peroxide to clean it? Or should I use a band-aid?
query_content_zh: 一个月前被砸了，现在才脱落。这样可不可以用双氧水洗？或者能不能用邦迪啊？

responses.content_en: It can take up to 6 weeks for the nail to regrow. Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 指甲可能需要长达6周才能重新生长。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Avoid hydrogen peroxide.  Keep clean and covered with dry dressing
responses.content_zh: 避免使用过氧化氢。保持清洁，用干燥的敷料覆盖。

responses.content_en: I would avoid hydrogen peroxide as this would increase inflammation,  however do keep the area clean and dry. I would recommend being seen by a physician to determine whether there is an underlying infection given the area of redness around nail bed and to determine whether you will need a course of antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 因为会增加发炎的情况，避免使用二氧化氢，但一定要保持该部位清洁干燥。我建议你去看医生，以确定指甲床周围发红的区域是否由於己受感染，并确定你是否需要服用抗生素。

query_title_en: It's been two months since I got injured, and the wound is still quite red. Can I apply makeup now? (as shown in the picture)
query_title_zh: 受伤两个月了，现在伤口挺红。可以化妆了嘛，如图

responses.content_en: OK to apply makeup.
responses.content_zh: 可以化妆。

query_title_en: I slammed to kill a mosquito, and the mosquito's blood is on my hand. My hand has a wound. Will I be infected with things like AIDS. Image showned.
query_title_zh: 拍死一只蚊子 蚊子的血都弄在手上了 手上有伤口 会不会感染艾滋病什么的 如图

responses.content_en: HIV cannot be transmitted by mosquitos. Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 艾滋病病毒不能通过蚊子传播。每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: My palm was cut by glass, and this is ten days since the stitch was removed. Does the wound in the image appear normal? There are some ripping pain at the wound when I open my hand.  How should I help it to heal and how long does it take?
query_title_zh: 手掌玻璃割伤拆线10天，伤口恢复如图正常吗？现手掌用力张开伤口有撕裂痛感，应该如何恢复，多久可恢复

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing but can take up to 4-8 weeks. You can take pain medication and avoid carrying heavy objects or activities that cause pain at the site.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来正在愈合，但可能需要4到8周时间。您可以服用止痛药，并避免搬重物或进行导致伤口部位疼痛的活动。

query_content_en: I accidently scraped my knee last week, and it then form a scab. It still hurts a little, and the current state is shown in the image. The  wound is fully dried and scabbed, but there seems to have a little yellow spot in the middle. Is this infected? If so, what should I do? Do I need to peel of the scab?
query_content_zh: 上周膝盖不小心擦伤 后来结痂了 但是还是有点疼 现在样子如图 伤口完全干燥结痂 但是好像中间有一点黄色？请问这是感染了吗？ 如果是的话怎么处理？ 把结痂扣掉吗？

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. Do not remove the scab. Clean with soap and water daily.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。不要去除结痂。每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_title_en: After being burned by boiling water and self treated, the skin fell off few days later and the wound site had some blackish yellow gangrenous tissue. Image attached. Is this concerning? What should I do next?
query_title_zh: 开水烧伤自行处理几天后皮掉了伤口部有偏黑色和黄色的腐肉 如图，要紧不？接下来如何处理？
query_content_en: It was burned at night. I wrapped it the first day, and then the next day, there was blisters. I applied the burn cream again. Two days later, there was drainage coming out from the blister. I wrapped it after rinsing it with sodium chloride, and a day later, the blister ruptured, showing yellow gangrenous tissue. With no choice, I removed the grangrenous skin, rinsed it with sodium chloride, then applied burn cream and wrapped it. It then became what it looks like right now, and there is redness at the periwound area. What should I do? Is this serious?
query_content_zh: 由于是晚上烫伤，第一天简单包扎后第二天，起了水泡，再次简单用烧伤膏处理两天后，水泡流出液体，无奈，氯化钠清洗后包扎，一天后，水泡皮破掉，此时出现黄色腐肉。无奈 又将腐肉皮去掉后氯化钠溶液清洗后再次用烧伤膏包扎，于是成了今天这个样子，周围发红，该如何处理，要紧不？

responses.content_en: The wound is not infected and is healing. Continue to clean with soap and water and cover with a dry dressing. The redness around the wound is exposed skin from where the blister came off.
responses.content_zh: 伤口没有感染，正在愈合。继续用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口周围的红肿是水泡脱落后暴露的皮肤。

responses.content_en: The yellow tissue is healing granulation tissue.  No signs of infection. The granulation tissue will expand out to the wound edge. May do gentle washing with soap and water, avoid excessive scrubbing, and apply topical antibiotic with nonadherent dressing
responses.content_zh: 黄色组织是愈合的肉芽组织。没有感染的迹象。肉芽组织将扩展到伤口边缘。可以进行温和的肥皂水清洗，避免过度摩擦，并涂抹局部抗生素和不粘贴敷料。

responses.content_en: This area appears to be healing appropriately. I would apply zero form and bacitracin to the area to prevent infection and promote healing. It does not appear to be infected at this time.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合中。需要在这个部位涂上杆菌肽软膏、和用XEROFORM包扎料包好，以助长愈合。目前似乎没有受到感染。

query_content_en: I was scratched by a cat, which caused bleeding. I have received a rabies vaccine and immunoglobulin. However, the wound was touched by something that a dog had been biting, and the dog's fur and nose also touched the wound. Is there a problem? I ate spicy food; is that an issue? The wound is shown in the picture.
query_content_zh: 我被猫抓了，流了血，打了狂犬疫苗和蛋白，被狗狗使劲挨过的东西碰着了，被狗狗的毛，鼻子碰着了伤口，有事吗？我吃了辣的，有事吗？伤口如图。

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily. Cover with dry dressing. You will have full function when the wound heals.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口愈合后，功能将完全恢复。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully evaluate wound given the poor quality of the picture. You have stated receiving the rabies vaccine and immunoglobulin.  If there is significant redness, swelling, drainage, or systemic signs of infection such as fever, chills, or generalized bodyaches there would be concern for secondary infection however unable to make that recommendation based on the quality of the picture.
responses.content_zh: 提供的图片质量很差，很难衡量伤口的情况。你表示己接种了狂犬症疫苗和免疫球蛋白。如果有严重的发红、发肿、液流、或系统性的病徵，如发烧、发冷、整身体痛，那便可能是继发感染。不过图片质量太差，现在未能提出任何建议。

query_title_en: My finger blistered after being electrocuted (as shown in the picture). What should I do?
query_title_zh: 手指被电后起泡了（如图）怎么办

responses.content_en: Recommend ER evaluation to evaluate the heart after electrocution.
responses.content_zh: 建议去急诊室进行评估，以检查电击后心脏的情况。

responses.content_en: The finger appears to be healing appropriately with granulation tissue forming. I would recommend keeping the area clean and dry and dressing with a non-adhesive dressing. ￼
responses.content_zh: 手指似乎在正常愈合中，肉芽组织正在形成。我建议保持该部位清洁干燥，并用非粘附性包扎物包扎。

query_title_en: Bumped my head just now, as shown in the picture. Will it scar? Will hair not grow in that spot in the future? Thank you!
query_title_zh: 头上碰了下，如图，请问会结疤吗？以后伤口位置会不会不长头发？谢谢…

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if it will scar and if the hair will grow back as it depends on how the body heals.
responses.content_zh: 是否会留下疤痕以及头发是否会重新生长难以确定，这取决于身体的愈合情况。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully evaluate the wound in the attached picture however there does appear to be a laceration.  There likely will be some scarring which may impact some hair growth although given the apparent size of the injury impact will likely be minimal. Would recommend continued wound care including cleaning the wound gently 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 在附加的图片中很难完全评估伤口，但似乎有一个裂口。可能会出现一些瘢痕，可能影响一些毛发生长，尽管考虑到伤口的尺寸，影响可能会非常小。建议继续伤口护理，包括每天1到3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗伤口。如果破伤风接种过期，应更新。

responses.content_en: The area may scar slightly, however once the wound heals hair will continue to grow in that area in the future. I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine if your tetanus is not up-to-date. Keep the area clean and dry as it continues to heal. If the wound is deep, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person for a few sutures as the scalp tends to bleed more than other areas.
responses.content_zh: 该部位可能会有轻微的疤痕形成。但一旦伤口愈合，以后毛发将可以在那部位继续生长。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。在愈合的过程中，保持该区域清洁干燥。因为头皮比其他部位更容易出血，如果伤口很深，我建议你亲自去看医生缝合几针。

query_title_en: After removing the stitches, the wound has expanded and turned red for a month and a half. What should I do? Is this hyperplasia?
query_title_zh: 拆线后一个半月伤口扩大发红,怎么办?是增生吗?
query_content_en: I had mole removal surgery, and after stitching, there was only one line. However, after the stitches were removed, the wound gradually felt like it was getting larger. It's been over a month since the stitches were removed, as shown in the picture. Is this hyperplasia? There's no protrusion. How should I treat it???
query_content_zh: 做了祛痣手术，缝合后也就一条，但拆线后伤口慢慢的就感觉越来越大的样子了，现在距离拆线一个多月了，如图，请问是增生吗？没有突出，应该怎么处理？？？

responses.content_en: The scar is remodelling and will continue to do so for 1.5 years. Over theis time the scar will soften and fade.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕正在重塑，这个过程将持续约1.5年。在此期间，疤痕会逐渐软化和淡化。

query_content_en: A Border Collie, not yet three months old, has already received two vaccinations. While playing, it accidentally bit my hand a little. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine? The wound is shown in the picture. Please provide professional advice.
query_content_zh: 三个月没到的边牧，打了两针疫苗了，玩我手不小心被咬到了一点点，我要去打狂犬疫苗吗？伤口如图请专业的讲解下

responses.content_en: No rabies vaccine necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: An elder accidently injured their hand. What should be done for treatment? Is the tetanus shot needed. Image shown.
query_title_zh: 老人不小心弄伤手了要怎么处理好，要不要打破伤风，如图？
query_content_en: Image attached.
query_content_zh: 如图

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with a dry dressing. Tetanus shot needed if injured with rusty object.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。如果是被生锈的物体弄伤，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: How should I treat a cut two days after the injury? As shown in the picture, it seems to have some pus.
query_title_zh: 请问割伤2天后的伤口怎么处理，如图，好像有点浓

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily. Cover with a dry bandage. It may take 2-4 weeks to heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并用干燥的绷带覆盖。伤口可能需要2-4周才能愈合。

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be secondarily infected.  Drainage appears to be serous in nature.  If the cut is over 2 days old, would not recommend suture repair.  It appears to be on an elbow which will likely have delayed healing given range of motion.  Would recommend topical antibiotic ointment, nonadherent dressing with dressing changes daily.  May clean the wound 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有二次感染。排出的液体呈浆液性。如果切口超过2天，则不建议缝合修复。伤口似乎在肘部，延迟愈合可能是活动范围造成的。建议涂抹局部抗生素软膏，使用不粘贴敷料，每天更换敷料。可以每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口1到3次。如果破伤风接种过期，则应更新。

responses.content_en: I would recommend washing the area with warm soapy water and not vigorously cleaning the area. I would avoid any strong cleaners like alcohol or hydrogen peroxide to keep the area clean. I would recommend soaking the area in warm soapy water several times a day and dressing the wound with xeroform dressing and bacitracin ointment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水清洗该部位，不要用力清洗。我会避免使用酒精或二氧化氢等强效清洁剂来清洁伤口部位。我建议每天将该部位浸泡在温肥皂水中数次，并用XEROFORM和杆菌肽软膏包扎伤口。

query_content_en: I was just licked by a few-month-old dog on my wound, as shown in the picture. Is there any issue? Please respond!! The surface of the wound is slightly coagulated and not bleeding, but it still hurts. Do I need to apply some alcohol? I washed my hands but didn’t use soap, and I applied some Betadine.
query_content_zh: 刚刚被一只几个月大的狗舔了我的伤口如图，有没有事？求回答！！伤口表面有点凝固了没有流血，但是还是很疼，用不用涂点酒精？我我去洗手过但是没有用肥皂但涂过吉尔典

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water and cover with a dry dressing. It will take 2-46 weeks for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要2-46周才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Wash the wound with warm soapy, water, you can also apply Betadine. If your wound was licked by a dog, you may benefit from antibiotics prevent further infection. ￼
responses.content_zh: 用温肥皂水清洗伤口，也可以涂上Betadine。如果你的伤口被狗舔过，使用抗生素对你有帮助，它可以防止受到感染。

query_content_en: Scratched by a cat, as shown in the picture. Should I go to the hospital for this? This situation shouldn't be too troublesome, right?
query_content_zh: 被猫抓了一道痕，如图，这种情况需不需要就医如图，需不需要就医这种情况应该不会太麻烦吧？

responses.content_en: This is a superficial wound. No need for hospital evaluation or rabies shot. Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 这是表浅伤口，无需去医院检查或注射狂犬疫苗。每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用干燥的绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Need to ensure rabies status of cat.  If cat is not vaccinated and can be observed for any behavioral changes, you likely do not need rabies series.  If vaccination status is unknown of the cat and the cat cannot be observed then would recommend discussing with medical provider as to utility of rabies vaccination series.  You should update tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Otherwise local wound care with simple topical antibiotic ointment is appropriate.
responses.content_zh: 需要确认猫的狂犬病状态。如果猫没有接种疫苗并且可以观察其行为变化，你可能不需要狂犬病疫苗。如果猫的疫苗接种状态未知且无法观察，则建议与医生讨论狂犬病疫苗系列的必要性。如果破伤风接种过期，你应更新。否则，可以进行局部伤口护理，简单地使用局部抗生素软膏是适当的。

responses.content_en: If the wound continues to heal appropriately, you may not need to be seen by a physician in person for this, as long as you know that the cat is up-to-date on its rabies vaccine and/or the cat does not show any signs of rabies. If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口继续愈合，和你知道猫接种了有效的狂犬症疫苗、或猫没有出现任何狂犬症迹象，你可能不需要亲自去看医生。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: My finger was scratched by an embroidery needle, causing a bit of bleeding. The needle had a bit of rust, and the wound is 1-2 mm long. Do I need a tetanus shot? The wound is shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 手指被绣花针划了一下，出了点血，针有一点锈，伤口1～2毫米，需要打破伤风吗？伤口如图

responses.content_en: You should get a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years given the type of injury.
responses.content_zh: 基于伤口类型，如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: I was scratched by a cat, causing a bit of bleeding, as shown in the picture. Is it serious? Do I need to get a shot?
query_title_zh: 被猫抓到有点血流出，如图，要不要紧？要不要去打针？

responses.content_en: I recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care to receive a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since your last one. Continue woud care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，我建议您前往最近的急诊中心接种破伤风疫苗。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be secondarily infected.  If cat is known to the you and can be observed for any behavioral changes or vaccination status is known, unlikely to need rabies series.  If vaccination status is unknown or cannot be observed, would recommend discussion with medical provider as to utility of rabies series.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 似乎没有二次感染。如果猫是你认识的并且可以观察行为变化，或确认疫苗接种状态，则不太可能需要狂犬病疫苗。如果疫苗接种状态未知或无法观察，建议与医生讨论狂犬病疫苗系列的必要性。如果破伤风接种过期，应该更新。

responses.content_en: I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccination if your tetanus is not up-to-date. Otherwise I would keep the area clean and dry. If it is continuing to bleed I would apply a dressing to it to prevent any interference with the healing.
responses.content_zh: 如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。否则，我会保持该部位清洁干燥。若它继续流血，我会敷上包扎物，以防止对愈合造成任何干扰。

query_title_en: Question, my finger was burned by boiling water. Now there is some white spotting, what should I do? Image attached. Thanks!
query_title_zh: 请教高手，手指被开水烫伤，出现白斑，该怎么办？如图，非常感谢

responses.content_en: The white area is likely due to the overlying skin starting to slough off. Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic cream and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 白色区域可能是表层皮肤开始脱落所致。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

query_title_en: I don't know what bit me, but there are two bumps.
query_title_zh: 不知道被什么咬了，伤口是两个连在一起包
query_content_en: Last night, while sleeping at home, I was bitten by something (I live in Chongqing, China, so it's not something like a black widow). There are two bumps, close together, about 0.5 cm apart. They are swollen larger than a mosquito bite and are oozing a clear liquid that seems like saline. I have three such wounds, and I'm not sure what bit me. My friends say it might be a spider bite. What could have bitten me, and how should I treat it? The wounds are shown in the picture.
query_content_zh: 我晚上在家睡觉不知道被什么咬了，（我家住中国重庆，不要整些什么黑寡妇），有两个包，而且是挨着的，中间有0.5厘米的间隔，肿得比蚊子咬的大些，而且还流些貌似是生理盐水的液体。我这样的伤口有3个，不知道是什么咬的，还咬得这么艺术，两个包。。。朋友说是蜘蛛咬的。。请问是什么咬的啊？该怎么处理呢？伤口如图

responses.content_en: It is difficult to determine what type of insect caused this. If the bites are itching you can take an antihistamine medication. Otherwise clean with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 很难确定是哪种昆虫引起的。如果被咬的地方很痒，您可以服用抗组胺药物。否则，用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be infected at this time.  Would recommend warm soapy soaks three times a day and topical antibiotic with clean dry dressing.  If there is concern for bat or mammal bite would recommend rabies prophylaxis
responses.content_zh: 目前似乎没有感染。建议每天三次热肥皂水浸泡，并使用局部抗生素加干燥的敷料。如果担心是蝙蝠或哺乳动物咬伤，建议接种狂犬病预防。

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear to be infected at this time, I would keep the area dry and clean with a non-adherent dressing. Depending on what you were bitten by, you may need rabies vaccine, depends on the area. ￼
responses.content_zh: 覌时伤口似乎没有感染，我会用非粘附性的包扎物包好、并保持该部位干燥清洁。具体情况取决于你被什么动物咬了、和被咬地区，你可能需要注射狂犬症疫苗，

query_title_en: I have a question. I had a large surface scarpe wound, and the scar was formed. In this case, was it infected underneath the scar? If it is infected, will it affect the bone?
query_title_zh: 请问大面积擦伤后，伤口结痂，这种情况里面是感染了吗，如果感染了，会伤到骨头吗？

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if there is an infection. If you are concerned about a bone infection, I would recommend that you go to the hospital for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 是否有感染很难确定。如果您担心骨骼感染，我建议您去医院进行进一步评估。

query_title_en: Will I get tetanus?
query_title_zh: 我会得破伤风吗？
query_content_en: As shown in the picture... I know the wound is small and shallow, but I don't know how it happened, which makes me uneasy (very anxious). Maybe my anxiety tendency is severe... The main point is, I don't know what caused it.
query_content_zh: 如图……我知道伤口很小而且很浅 但是我不知道是怎么弄的总是不怎么安心（十分焦虑）也许我的焦虑倾向严重……重点是 我不知道是什么东西弄去的

responses.content_en: Tetanus shot not needed.
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: Should I get a tetanus shot for this scratch? I was wearing socks when I got scratched, and the wound seems quite deep, as shown in the picture. Should I get vaccinated? Could someone who understands medicine advise?
query_content_zh: 求教被划伤需要打破伤风吗？当时穿着袜子被划伤的，伤口应该比较深，如图，不知道需不需要打，求懂医的人指点

responses.content_en: Recommend tetanus shot if cut with rusty object.
responses.content_zh: 如果是被生锈的物体割伤，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: On friday, I accidently scrape my feet, wound as shown in the image. Are there any restriction? Are there anything I should not eat?  Are there any ways for it to recover quicker? The wound seems to have a large piece of tissue missing.
query_title_zh: 星期五不小心把脚刮伤了，伤口如图，要戒口吗？不能吃什麼？有什麼办法可以早点好？伤口好像没了一大块肉

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water and cover with a dry dressing. It will take 4-6 weeks for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要4-6周才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: This should heal on its own, there are no restrictions however, I would recommend reducing friction to the area. To reduce likelihood of scarring, I would recommend avoiding sunlight and applying SPF as needed. ￼￼
responses.content_zh: 这伤口会自行愈合；没有饮食上或活动的限制。我建议减少对该部位的摩擦。为了减少疤痕的增生，我建议避免阳光照射，并按需要涂抹防晒霜

query_title_en: A wound on my calf.
query_title_zh: 小腿伤口
query_content_en: A few days ago, I fell and hit my leg, resulting in a wound. Now, the wound looks like this (as shown in the picture). My family says it's fine, but it feels tight and painful when I walk, and I can't straighten my leg. How is the wound now? Is it infected?
query_content_zh: 前两天跌倒，前面被撞出一个伤口，现在伤口如图，家人说没问题，但我走起路来感觉又绷又疼，腿也无法伸直，请问现在伤口到底怎么样了，有没有发炎？

responses.content_en: The wound appears infected. Recommend evaluation for cleaning wound and antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来感染了。建议进行评估，清理伤口并使用抗生素。

query_title_en: After having a corn removed, a hard, white lump appeared near the wound, unlike a corn, but it hurts when I walk. What should I do?
query_title_zh: 做了鸡眼手术后，伤口附近出现出现如图硬硬的白色硬块，不像鸡眼，但走路会疼。我该怎么办？

responses.content_en: This may be hypertrophic skin after the surgery or a plantar wart. Recommend evaluation by dermatology.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是手术后的增生性皮肤或跖疣。建议去皮肤科进行评估。

query_title_en: My foot was scraped by a rusty steel bar, as shown in the picture. The wound is about 1mm deep. Should I get a tetanus shot?
query_title_zh: 脚被生锈的钢筋剐破了，如图，伤口深度大概1mm左右，要不要打破伤风？

responses.content_en: Tetanus short recommended
responses.content_zh: 建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: I scraped from riding the bike, as shown in the picture. Is the wound infected? How should I treat it?
query_title_zh: 骑自行车擦伤了，具体如图所示。伤口有没有发炎呢？应该如何处理比较好
query_content_en: There are some medications at home: Yunnan Baiyao powder, alcohol, iodine tincture, merbromin, hydrogen peroxide, cefradine capsules
query_content_zh: 家里有些药：云南白药粉，酒精，碘酒，红汞，双氧水，头孢拉定胶囊

responses.content_en: The wound is not infected and is healing. Continue to clean with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口没有感染，正在愈合。继续用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

responses.content_en: Gently clean with warm soapy water three times a day.  Avoid iodine or hydrogen peroxide to open skin. Use topical antibiotic ointment and non-adherent dressing.  Update tetanus if not up to date
responses.content_zh: 每天用温肥皂水轻柔清洁三次。避免在口子上使用碘或过氧化氢。使用局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴敷料。如果破伤风接种过期，应更新疫苗。

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear to be infected at this time, I would recommend washing it with warm soapy soaks and keeping the area clean. I would dress it with a xeroform dressing and apply bacitracin ointment.
responses.content_zh: 覌时伤口似乎没有感染， 我建议用温肥皂水清洗和保持该部位清洁。我会使用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM包扎好。

query_title_en: Cut by a knife on the finger. It hasn't been bleeding for the third day. As shown in the picture, should I continue to bandage it with gauze or leave it open?
query_title_zh: 被刀划的手指伤口，已经第3天不流血了。如图，是应该继续用纱布包扎还是敞着？

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water and cover with a dry dressing. It will take 2-46 weeks for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要2-46周才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: You can keep it bandaged to prevent friction and to prevent yourself from bending your finger, as bending your finger may open the wound open.
responses.content_zh: 你可以把它包扎起来，以防止摩擦，和防止自己弯曲手指。弯曲手指可能令伤口裂开。

query_title_en: The hospital diagnosed the wound as 3.5 cm. The current state of the wound is as shown in the picture. After more than seven months, can this wound be evaluated to a certain grade?
query_title_zh: 医院诊断证明伤口3.5厘米，现在伤口这个如图下所示 目前七个多月 能评上等级吗？
query_content_en: Are the personnel in the appraisal department hospital employees or from another institution?
query_content_zh: 鉴定科室人是医院内部人员还是别的编制人员

responses.content_en: The scar may take 1-1.5 years to remodel. If cosemesis is still a concern seek evaluation with plastic surgery for possible scar revision.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕可能需要1到1.5年时间重塑。如果仍然担忧美容效果，建议咨询整形外科医生，考虑可能的疤痕修复手术。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be healing appropriately, has some granulation tissue over the area. I would recommend cleaning the area with warmy soapy water. If the sutures have not been removed yet I would make sure to have them removed.
responses.content_zh: 这个伤口有一些肉芽组织，似乎在正常愈合中。我建议用温肥皂水清洁这部位。如果缝合线还没有拆除，要把它清除去。

query_title_en: Is it okay not to get a shot after being bitten by a dog? (as shown in the picture)
query_title_zh: 被狗狗咬了不打针行吗 如图

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: I previously got burned by a motorcycle exhaust pipe. The treatment went well, and there were no other issues. Today, the wound feels numb and itchy, which seems like a sign of healing (as shown in Picture 1). However, after swimming for about 5 minutes, the wound split open again (as shown in Picture 2). I have applied an Iodophor-like medication. How should I handle this? Is it serious? I need urgent advice as I am traveling in Vietnam and it's not very convenient here.
query_content_zh: 之前被摩托车排气管烫伤 处理得还可以 没有别的啥 今天伤口麻痒 感觉要好了（如图一）。  后被诱惑游泳5min左右 伤口崩裂…如图二 已涂类似碘伏的药物。请问后续如何处理 ？？？会不会严重！！！ 在线等 急！！！（在越南旅游不太方便😭）

responses.content_en: Keep wound clean and dry with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. There is a blister around the wound that may drain. If pus leaks out or redness spreads, seek evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 保持伤口清洁干燥，用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。伤口周围有水泡，可能会破裂。如果有脓液流出或红肿扩散，请及时就医。

responses.content_en: Avoid iodine to open skin.  Does not appear infected but would recommend topical antibiotic ointment and non-adherent dressing.  Avoid submerging the wound while healing.
responses.content_zh: 避免在口子上上使用碘。似乎没有感染，但建议使用局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴敷料。在愈合期间避免浸泡伤口。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing appropriately, make sure to apply bacitracin ointment with a zero form dressing to this area to promote when healing and prevent infection. It may continue to drain.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合中。需要在这个部位涂上杆菌肽软膏、和用XEROFORM包扎料包好，以助长愈合并预防感染。伤口可能继续有流液现象。

query_content_en: I was scratched by a rusted metal when wiping glass. As shown in the photo. Is this alright? Waiting online.
query_content_zh: 刚刚擦玻璃碰到了生锈的铁，被划伤了，如图有没有事啊？在线等如图

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage. Recommend tetanus shot if you have not had one in the past 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并涂抹抗生素软膏。用干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。如果您在过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，建议接种。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be laceration that is amenable to suture repair.  Would recommend cleaning gently with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily, applying topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.  Would recommend updating tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎不是可以缝合修复的裂口。建议每天轻柔地用温肥皂水清洗1到3次，涂抹局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴的敷料。如果破伤风疫苗过期，建议更新。

responses.content_en: The wound itself appears to be fairly superficial, it will heal well. If your tetanus is not up-to-date,  I would strongly recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看来相当浅，会愈合得很好。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: As the image showned, the edge of the skin was scraped, blood appeared, but the wound was not deep. I have already painted betadine, is the tetanus shot needed?
query_title_zh: 被如图所示的边边刮破了一层皮，见血了，但是伤口并不深，已经涂了络合碘，请问需要打破伤风吗？

responses.content_en: Tetanus shot may be necessary if the metal door frame had rust on it.
responses.content_zh: 如果金属门框有锈迹，可能需要接种破伤风疫苗。

responses.content_en: If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 如果你接种的破伤风疫苗已逾期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: My calf bone was injured on the side as showned in the image, how should I treat it? The bone likely is not fractured yet.
query_title_zh: 小腿骨一侧如图受伤，怎么处理？腿骨应该没骨折
query_content_en: The superficial later has some tissue scraped out, and the skin has seirous bruising. Currently, the leg is swollen.
query_content_zh: 浅层有少量肉被刮掉，皮肤挫伤严重，目前腿肿胀

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并涂抹抗生素软膏。用干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。

responses.content_en: Appears to be superficial wound with some violation of the dermis.  Does not appear to be secondarily infected.  Likely underlying hematoma.  Would recommend local wound care including updating tetanus shot if not updated, cleaning 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water, applying topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 似乎是表浅伤口伴随真皮层伤到了。似乎没有二次感染。可能有潜在的血肿。建议进行局部伤口护理，包括如果过期则更新破伤风疫苗，每天用温肥皂水清洗1到3次，涂抹局部抗生素软膏并使用不粘贴敷料。避免使用任何干燥剂，如酒精、过氧化氢或碘。

responses.content_en: This appears to be bruising from an injury to your calf, which does not specifically need treatment but warrants further evaluation for underlying injury (i.e. fracture). I would recommend you get an x-ray of the area to evaluate further given the swelling and bruising.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是小腿受伤造成的瘀伤，不需要特别治疗，但需要对潜在损伤（即骨折）进行进一步评估。因为伤口有肿胀和瘀伤，我建议你对受伤部位进行X光检查以进一步评估。

query_content_en: A week ago, my finger was pricked by a key near the joint below my right middle finger. Why does everything above the wound still feel numb and have no sensation when touched? The wound has mostly healed, but the numbness persists. What's going on? Will it get better? I would appreciate input from professionals or anyone who has experienced this. I'm really worried! (As shown in the picture, the wound is small but was caused by the key teeth. The area above the wound marked with a white line feels numb and swollen when touched. I can move my finger normally, and pressing hard returns normal blood flow. However, it feels numb to the touch.)
query_content_zh: 我的手指一周前，被钥匙扎伤，右手中指下方关节内侧！为什么伤口以上到现在都是木木的，摸上去没有感觉！现在伤口基本愈合但是感觉还是木木的！这是怎么回事呀？会好吗？麻烦请专业的医生或者同样经历的朋友帮我回答！心里好害怕！（如图所示，伤口不大，被钥匙齿扎进去了，伤口以上画白线区域内木木的，用手触摸感觉木木的胀胀的。可以正常屈伸，使劲按压后可以正常回血！就是摸起来木木的！）

responses.content_en: The nerves of the finger run along both sides of the finger. The trauma may have bruised the nerve resulting in numbness. This generally improves with time.
responses.content_zh: 神经沿着手指两侧分布。创伤可能导致神经挫伤，进而引起麻木。这种情况通常会随着时间改善。

query_content_en: My index finger was injured a year ago, and there is a hard nodule at the wound healed site. It does not hurt. As shown on the imgae. I did laser afterward, and a year later, the nodule has grown back, and the size is the same. It always grow back whenever I tried to remvoe it. Can I ask what is it?
query_content_zh: 一年前食指受伤，伤口愈合后有个硬结，不痛。如图。后面做了激光，一年后硬结又长出来了，还是同样大小，割了又长割了又长。求问这是什么

responses.content_en: This may be excess skin or tissue at the site of injury.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是伤口部位的多余皮肤或组织。

responses.content_en: Appears to be dyshidrotic eczema or possible herpetic whitlow.  Would recommend viral testing for HSV.  If negative for viral infection would recommend keeping moisturized or using mild topical steroid ointment.
responses.content_zh: 似乎是掌部湿疹或可能是疱疹状趾炎。建议进行HSV的病毒检测。如果病毒感染结果为阴性，建议保持滋润或使用温和的局部类固醇软膏。

responses.content_en: Well, this may be a simple fluid collection that repeatedly returns, it's possible that this may be from the herpes virus, given that it keeps returning. I would recommend being a valuated by a physician in person for further treatment and management. ￼
responses.content_zh: 这可能是一个不停复发的液体沉积情况。考虑到它反复发生，这可能来自疱疹病毒。我建议你去看医生，让他亲自评估，以进行进一步的治理。

query_content_en: My wound scab got accidentally knocked off after it had healed. See picture.
query_content_zh: 我的伤口结痂之后被不小心碰掉了如图

responses.content_en: Perform wound care and clean with soap and water daily. The wound is not infected.
responses.content_zh: 每天进行伤口护理，用肥皂和水清洗。伤口没有感染。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be infected.  Will heal with local wound care.  Clean with warm soapy water three times a day and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。局部伤口护理会愈合的。每日用温肥皂水清洗三次，并使用局部抗生素和不粘贴敷料。

responses.content_en: This appears to be a well-healing noninfected scab wound, in which the scab has come off. This will heal well, just make sure to keep the area clean and avoid removing the scabs in the future to allow for proper healing.
responses.content_zh: 似乎是一个末受感染、但已愈合得相当好的有痂伤口；其中的痂已脱落。只要确保伤口保持清诘、和以后避免把痂摘除以容许正常愈合、这会愈合得很好。

query_title_en: While removing tiles, I was scratched by a tile (the wound is shown in the picture, taken 3 hours after the injury). Will this lead to tetanus? Is iodine disinfection still effective after 3 hours?
query_title_zh: 卸瓷砖时，被瓷砖划伤（伤口如图，图中伤口为3小时之后的）会感染破伤风吗，3小时之后碘伏消毒还有用吗？

responses.content_en: No need for tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: It's been more than ten days since the burn. I need to go out. Can I wear socks now? The situation is as shown in the picture
query_title_zh: 烫伤十几天了，有事要出门，可以穿袜子了吗，情况如图

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. It may be more comfortable to wear socks when the wound is completely healed.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口完全愈合后，穿袜子可能会更舒适。

query_content_en: What kind of medication should be applied for abrasions from a fall while cycling? Can red medicine (Mercurochrome) be used? Will it cause pain?
query_content_zh: 骑车跌倒擦伤要擦什么药？可以擦红药水吗？会不会咬到伤口很疼如图的擦伤要嚓什么药？擦红药水会不会很疼

responses.content_en: Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_content_en: I woke up the day before yesterday morning with my nail missing a piece and a wound underneath, as shown in the picture. I wiped it with alcohol and kept it bandaged with a Band-Aid yesterday. What's going on, and how should I treat it?
query_content_zh: 前天早上起来就这个样子指甲缺了一块下面肉也有伤口如图。。我用酒精擦了一下昨天一只用邦迪包着。请问这是怎么回事应该怎么处理

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily. Cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

responses.content_en: Unable to get of recommendation for care as little clinical context.  Need more information to evaluate for any signs of infection or additional injury.
responses.content_zh: 由于缺乏临床医疗资料，无法提供护理建议。需要更多有关感染的情况和受伤的资料。

query_title_en: My own Golden Retriever scratched my skin and broke it, as shown in the picture. I treated the wound with iodine. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine?
query_title_zh: 被自己家金毛抓破点皮，如图。用碘伏处理过伤口，需要打狂犬疫苗吗？

responses.content_en: No rabies vaccine necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: My finger was scratched by the metal handle of an umbrella. The wound isn't large or deep, as shown in the picture. There's a scratch on the side of the middle and ring fingers of my left hand, and the outer skin of the ring finger has been scraped off. There was a little bleeding. However, it happened in the morning while I was in class and the nursing room was closed, so I only squeezed out some blood and didn't clean it, just used a band-aid. I cleaned it later in the afternoon at home and then disinfected it with povidone-iodine. Since I waited a while and there seems to be rust on the umbrella handle, I'm worried about infection. Also, can I use a band-aid in a situation like mine? Please help me, thank you!
query_content_zh: 手指被铁的雨伞柄刮伤，伤口不大不深，如图，左手中指和无名指的指甲侧面各有一道，无名指的被挂掉了外面的皮，食指的也不太深。    流了一点血。但是当时是上午还在上课，医务室也没开门，所以只挤了一些血出来，也没有清洗，用了创可贴。    等下午回家后才清洗，然后用络合碘消毒。    因为拖的时间比较长而且伞柄上好像有锈，所以担心会不会感染?  还有，像我这样可以用创可贴吗?  请大家帮帮我，谢谢！

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_content_en: I want to consult a doctor. I had the stitches below my knee removed the night before last, and the recovery status of the wound is as shown in the picture. When can I go swimming? It's urgent because I am a swimming coach and need to get back to the work next month. Can I go into the water now?
query_content_zh: 我想请教一下医生，我膝盖下部前天晚上拆的线，伤口恢复状况如图。想问一下我大概什么时候可以下水游泳呢很急，因为是游泳教练，下个月得下水，想问下我现在可不可以下水了？

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. Clean with soap and water daily. Wait until wound if fully covered with skin before swimming.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。每天用肥皂和水清洗。等到伤口完全被皮肤覆盖后再游泳。

query_content_en: Today, while bathing my cat, I got scratched by him. The wound is as shown in the picture. I vaccinated him about a year ago (it's been almost a year, just a month or two short. Also not sure if the vaccine was legitimate). I have two questions: first, am I at risk of getting rabies? Second, does the cat need to get vaccinated again? Please provide accurate answers. Thank you!
query_content_zh: 今天给猫洗澡的时候被他抓了，伤口如图。大概一年前给他打过疫苗（没到一年，差一两个月。另外不知道打）今天给猫洗澡的时候被他抓了，伤口如图。大概一年前给他打过疫苗（没到一年，差一两个月。另外不知道打的疫苗是否正宗）。问题有两个：一个是我会不会得狂犬病？一个是猫是否又要注射疫苗？回答要求准确，谢谢！

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_content_en: I had a burn from the day before yesterday afternoon. Now there is blister. I popped the blister this morning, as shown in the image. I spray the wound with polito now, is the wound inflamed or infected? The wound dose not hurt (minor pain when you press on it). The surrounding is slightly red
