query_content_zh: 前天中午到现在烫伤的，起水泡了，今天早上水泡被弄破了（如图）现在在涂破立妥，伤口是否炎症感染？？伤口不痛（按一下周围有一点点疼） 周围轻微泛红

responses.content_en: The redness around the wound is inflammation from the prior burn. The wound does not appear to be infected.
responses.content_zh: 伤口周围的红肿是先前烧伤引起的炎症，伤口看起来没有感染。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing well on his own, if the skin opens again, I would recommend dressing the wound with bacitracin ointment and xeroform dressing. ￼
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎自行愈合良好，如果皮肤再次裂开，我建议用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM包扎伤口。

query_content_en: Fell off an electric bike accidentally, and a small piece of flesh came off my chin. The wound is as shown in the picture. Approximately how long will it take to scab over? How long until it fully heals? Will it leave a scar? Could any experts tell me?
query_content_zh: 骑电车不小心摔倒下巴掉了一小块肉，伤口如图，请问这样子大概多久能结痂？多久才能完全愈合？会不会留疤？有什么注意事项？？求大神(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)(┯_┯)

responses.content_en: The wound will scab within a week and take up to two months to completely heal. The scar will continue to remodel for a year and soften/fade over time.
responses.content_zh: 伤口将在一周内结痂，可能需要长达两个月才能完全愈合。疤痕将在一年内继续重塑，并随着时间逐渐软化和淡化。

query_content_en: Three days ago, I was scratched by a dog, as shown in the picture. I received the first dose of the vaccine. Today, the wound hurts a bit when touched. I also have a runny nose and a sensation of something in my throat. Could this be rabies?
query_content_zh: 大前天被狗抓了一下如图。打过疫苗了（第一次打）。到今天用手摸伤口有点疼。不摸不疼。还有点流鼻子。嗓子感觉有异物感。是不是狂犬病

responses.content_en: It is unlikely to be rabies given you have received the first dose of the vaccine. If you are concerned seek evaluation in ER.
responses.content_zh: 由于您已经接种了第一剂狂犬疫苗，感染狂犬病的可能性不大。如果您仍然担心，请去急诊室评估。

responses.content_en: Unable to make recommendation based on the clinical context provided.  Although you have mentioned receiving the first dose of the vaccine, it is unclear if you received the immunoglobulin or the vaccine.  Also unclear as to the clinical context of the dog if this was an animal that had not been vaccinated to rabies or if it could be observed.  However, based on the your description of symptoms, low suspicion for rabies although if there is clinical concern, you should be evaluated by a medical provider
responses.content_zh: 从己有的临床医学资料，未能提供建议。虽然你接种了第一剂疫苗，但尚不清楚你是接种了免疫球蛋白还是疫苗。亦不清楚这狗是否己接种狂犬症疫苗、或是可以接受覌察。从描述的症状，染上狂犬症的概率相当低。有顾虑的话，可以找医生评估。

query_title_en: I was scratched by an iron screw. The wound is not deep and looks like this (as shown in the picture). The screw head is flat, and I don't know if it was rusty. Could I get tetanus?
query_title_zh: 被铁螺丝划伤了，不深，大概这样（如图），螺丝头是平的，不知道生锈没，会得破伤风吗？

responses.content_en: There is a possibility of getting tetanus. I would recommend that you get the vaccine if it has been over 5 years since your last one.
responses.content_zh: 有可能感染破伤风。如果您上次接种疫苗已经超过5年，我建议您接种破伤风疫苗。

responses.content_en: If tetanus is not up to date would recommend updating tetanus. Otherwise local wound care is sufficient.
responses.content_zh: 如果破伤风接种过期，建议更新破伤风疫苗。否则，局部伤口护理足够。

responses.content_en: If you have not received the tetanus vaccine in the last five years, I would recommend being seen by a physician to receive the tetanus vaccine. ￼
responses.content_zh: 如果你在过去五年里没有接种过破伤风疫苗，我建议你去看医生以接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: There's a white scab formed over the wound, what should I do?
query_title_zh: 伤口上面结了一层白色的痂，怎么办
query_content_en: As shown in the picture, I fell off my motorcycle the night before yesterday. I treated it briefly and yesterday afternoon went to the hospital where they prescribed medication to apply (growth factors), along with oral antibiotics. Now the wound looks like this, what‘s going on?
query_content_zh: 如图，前天晚上骑摩托车摔了，简单处理了下昨天下午去医院开了点药擦(生长因子)﻿，还有口服抗炎药，现在这个伤口就变成这样了，怎么回事

responses.content_en: The white crust around the edge of the wound may be the ointment applied at the hospital. The wound is healing appropriately. Clean with water and soap daily
responses.content_zh: 伤口边缘的白色硬痂可能是医院涂抹的药膏残留。伤口正在正常愈合。每天用肥皂和水清洗。

responses.content_en: Unclear as to what the topical medication was however white crusting may be secondary to the topical medication.  Would recommend continued use of topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  Wound does not appear to be secondarily infected as of now.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Recommend gentle cleaning with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily and changing nonadherent dressing daily.
responses.content_zh: 不清楚局部药物是什么，但白色结痂可能是由于局部药物引起的。建议继续使用局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴敷料。伤口似乎目前没有二次感染。如果破伤风疫苗接种过期，则应更新。建议每天用温肥皂水轻柔清洗1到3次，并每天更换不粘贴敷料。

responses.content_en: This appears to be granulation tissue and the scab appears to be forming at this time. If the redness around the wound continues to spread past the current boundaries, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person. At this time, continue with the oral antibiotics and soak the area and warm soapy water.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是肉芽组织，现在似乎正在结痂。如果伤口周围的红肿继续蔓延到目前的范围之外，我建议你亲自去看医生。你现在可以继续服用口服抗生素并用温肥皂水浸泡该部位。

query_title_en: A dog bit me, the skin isn't broken, but there are blood marks as shown in the picture. It has been disinfected. Should I get a rabies vaccine?
query_title_zh: 被狗狗咬了皮没破，但是有血痕，如图，已消毒，要去打狂犬病疫苗吗？

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬病疫苗。

query_content_en: Last night, I was bitten by my friend's Poodle. The dog has been vaccinated. The wound is as shown in the picture. Because I was drinking at the time, I forgot whether there was any bleeding. It seems like there was no bleeding from the wound. Should I be okay without getting vaccinated?
query_content_zh: 昨晚被朋友家的贵宾狗咬了，狗有打疫苗伤口如图，因为当时喝酒了，忘记了有没流血，伤口来看好像没流血，我应该可以不打疫苗吧

responses.content_en: No need for rabies vaccine given animal is vaccinated.
responses.content_zh: 由于动物已接种疫苗，不需要狂犬疫苗。

responses.content_en: You probably don't need a rabies vaccine if your friends dog has been vaccinated. However, if you were bitten, you would likely benefit from some antibiotics given this was a bite from a dog.
responses.content_zh: 如果你朋友的狗已经接种了狂犬症疫苗，你便可能不需接种。然而，如果你被咬了，尤其这是狗咬，服用一些抗生素可能对你有帮助。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, this wound extends to the heel. Is there a tendon involved? Sometimes it feels like something is being pulled, and it's quite painful. There's some swelling too. The other foot seems to have the same structure.
query_title_zh: 如图，这个伤口到脚跟那有筋吗。有时感觉有条拉着，很痛？会有点肿，看另一只脚好像有。

responses.content_en: The scar tissue and swelling may be afffecting the muscle function. If there is decrease in function in muscles in the lower leg or foot the tendon may be involved. MRI would be necessary to assess for tendon integrity.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕组织和肿胀可能影响肌肉功能。如果小腿或脚的肌肉功能下降，可能涉及到肌腱问题。需要进行MRI检查以评估肌腱的完整性。

query_title_en: Does it look like a dog scratch in the image.
query_title_zh: 如图像不像被狗狗抓了的痕迹？
query_content_en: What does a dog scratch look like on an image. Does image 1 seem like a dog scratch? Picture 2,3,4 is taken on the feet this morning, unclear if the dog has scratch the kid. But there were marks, and the one on the hand seemed to be from scratch on the mat, but I am not sure what has happened. Can someone take a look for me?
query_content_zh: 被狗狗抓了的图片是什么样子的  图一像像狗抓的吗  图二三四是脚上的今早不确定是不是狗狗抓了小孩  但是有痕迹  手上的像凉席刮得  但又不确定到底是什么样的   大家帮我参考一下

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_content_en: This afternoon at 1pm, I was scratched by my cat as shown in the image. It was not bleeding, and I cleansed the wound with soap immediatly. It have been more than an hour, the wound does not appear to have any abnormalities as shown in the photo. The wound is not that big, but for the purpose of cleansing, I peeled off some of the usperficial layer of the wound. Is it necessary to get shots? Are there anything to consider? The cat is only few month old, as shown in the image. It typically eats sausage, egg yolk and etc, and the cat has not been injured or bitten by other cats or dogs. PS., the wound is only the small dot at the finger tip, one of the image have a large wound at the finger top because I scartched myself with a nail. I have disinfected with iodine, please dont mistaken this as the cat scratch.
query_content_zh: 我今天下午一点左右，被养的小猫爪子挂了一下，如图，没出血，立即用肥皂清洗了伤口，一个多小时了，伤口处也没什么异常，如图，其实伤口没这么大，是为了清洗，把口表面一些皮撕掉了，请问有必要打针或者有什么需要注意的吗？猫咪是几个月的那种，如图，平时吃火腿肠鸡蛋黄之类，猫咪也没受过伤或者被别的猫狗咬过。PS伤口就只有指尖那个小点，其中有张图指头中间那一个大口子是前天晚上被钉子刮的，上午碘酒消过毒的，不要误以为是猫挠的。

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you get a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since your last one. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, pain, warmth, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 如果你上次接种破伤风疫苗已经有5年了，我建议你再接种一次。如果出现发烧、寒战、恶心、呕吐、疼痛、发热、红肿、出血或脓样分泌物等症状，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: There is a red dot on a few of my finger, which seems like there is a needle size wound at the skin. Can someone help me to take a look? Image as shown.
query_title_zh: 有几个手指上有一个红点，看着就像肉在皮内有一个针头一样大小的伤口，请各位帮我看一下，如图

responses.content_en: They may be blood vessels called capillaries under the skin. No concerns at this time.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是皮肤下的毛细血管。目前无需担心。

query_title_en: As shown in the image, is the wound result of a dog bite?
query_title_zh: 如图伤口是被狗咬到了吗？

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if this is from a bite as it depends on how you sustained the injury.
responses.content_zh: 是否由咬伤引起很难判断，这取决于您受伤的方式。

responses.content_en: Possibly from dog bite given appearance of puncture wounds.  If vaccination status of dog is unknown, would recommend rabies series.  Local wound care is sufficient.
responses.content_zh: 根据伤口外观，可能是狗咬造成的穿透伤。如果狗的疫苗接种状态未知，建议接种狂犬病疫苗。局部伤口护理就行了。

responses.content_en: Based on the given image, it is difficult to say, whether this was caused by a dog bite. The supposed to be a mildly penetrating wound, keep the area clean and dry as it heals.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像，很难确定这是否是由狗咬伤引起的。应该是轻度穿透性伤口，在愈合过程中保持该部位清洁干燥。

query_title_en: Why doesn't my thumb injury bleed but not hurt (as shown in the picture)?
query_title_zh: 为什么我大拇指受伤流血却不会痛（如图）？

responses.content_en: This is a superficial wound. There will be minimal bleeding and pain.
responses.content_zh: 这是表浅伤口，出血和疼痛会很轻微。

query_title_en: Could a wound like this (as shown in the picture) be caused by a dog bite?
query_title_zh: 这样子的伤口会不会是被狗咬成这样的？
query_content_en: First of all, to those who mindlessly push for vaccinations, I won’t be accepting those answers, thank you. Whether to get vaccinated is my own decision, so read the question carefully. The dog is still alive but has only been around for three days. Specific situation: three days ago in the afternoon, I was petting a stray dog at school when another stray dog (which has been around our school for a long time, an adult) bit my calf. It didn’t hurt and I felt nothing, so I think it didn't use any force. In the evening while washing my feet, I found four scabbed spots on my leg (as shown in the picture). Could it be from the dog bite? (I doubt a dog's teeth would cause such small spots.) Previously, I went to a Sichuan pepper forest and suspect it might be from the pepper plant thorns. The four spots are in a neat line... It shouldn't be from the dog, right? Please help identify.
query_content_zh: 【先说明，某些无脑推销打疫苗的亲，回答了我也不给采纳的谢谢【打不打是我自己的事，看清楚问题【狗现在还活着，不过也只有三天时间具体情况：三天前的下午，在学校摸一只流浪狗的时候被另外一条流浪狗（在我们学校流浪很久了，成年的）咬了一下小腿，不痛，没什么感觉，我感觉可能它压根没用力。晚上洗脚的时候，发现腿上四个点，而且已经结痂了。。。如图，会是被狗咬的吗？（感觉狗的牙齿应该不会造成那么小的点吧）之前去过花椒林，我自己怀疑是不是被花椒苗的刺给扎的。四个点很整齐的一排啊...应该不是狗吧，求鉴定。。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be from a dog bite.
responses.content_zh: 看起来不像是狗咬的伤口。

query_title_en: I fell from biking yesterday, and my leg was injured. As shown in the image, I did some basic cleansing, what should I do afterward.
query_title_zh: 昨天骑自行车摔了，腿摔坏了，如图，进行了简单清理，之后怎么办

responses.content_en: Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: I was scratched by a cat, and the wound looks like this. It didn't bleed (as shown in the picture).
query_title_zh: 被猫抓伤了 伤口如图没有出血
query_content_en: This wound was caused by a scratch from my cat one month ago.
query_content_zh: 家里的猫，一个月

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_title_en: Does this wound need a tetanus shot, as shown in the picture?
query_title_zh: 这个伤口需要打破伤风针吗，如图所示

responses.content_en: You should get a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, I hurt my knee while running a little over two months ago, and the scab eventually fell off. But now it looks like this, with a layer of skin and flesh underneath.
query_title_zh: 如图，我这膝盖差不多两个多月前跑步时磕坏了，然后也定嘎吱掉了。可是随后就成这样了，一层皮底下有肉?
query_content_en: What’s going on? It's been like this for more than half a month.
query_content_zh: 怎么回事儿，差不多半个多月了就这样。

responses.content_en: The wound is healed but the scar is raised, leading to a keloid. I would recommend that you see a Dermatology or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss possible treatment.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经愈合，但疤痕隆起，形成了瘢痕疙瘩。我建议您去看皮肤科或整形外科专家，讨论可能的治疗方案。

responses.content_en: This is a healing scar with some mild tissue hypertrophy.  This will likely be chronic or very slow healing given its location.  Would need scar revision for cosmetic reasons only.
responses.content_zh: 这是一个愈合的瘢痕，伴随有轻微的组织增生。由于位置原因，这可能变成慢性伤口或非常缓慢愈合。如果有美容需要，那便需要疤痕修复手术。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be healing well, Given the location and constant movement to the area of this area may take some additional time to heal. There may be some scarring to the area. ￼
responses.content_zh: 这个伤口似乎愈合得很好。考虑到伤口的位置、和在有关部位不能固定，伤口可能需要一些额外的时间才能愈合。该处可能有一些疤痕形成。

query_title_en: How should I treat the wound, as it has some dirt in it?
query_title_zh: 求伤口处理，有脏东西
query_content_en: Today, I was scratched by the foot pedal of an electric scooter, which lifted a large piece of skin and caused a bit of bleeding. Afterward, I disinfected it with hydrogen peroxide and iodine, but the lifted skin has already healed, with black-gray dust from the scrape trapped inside. It's now healed with the dust inside, and I can't open it up. Is this a problem? As shown in the picture, there's a gray streak.
query_content_zh: 病情描述(发病时间、主要症状等)：今天出去被电瓶车的踏脚划伤了脚，掀起了一大快皮 出了一点血 回来后用双氧水和碘酒消毒了，但是 被掀起的皮已经愈合了，皮里都是划破时染上的黑灰色的灰尘，就这样愈合在脚上了，也翻不开来，这样有关系么？如图 灰色的一条

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healed and is not infected. The debris may cause pigmentation of the scar.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来已经愈合且没有感染。残留物可能会导致疤痕的色素沉着。

responses.content_en: If you cleaned area with hydrogen peroxide and iodine after the injury, this black/gray coloration may be due to the skin healing rather than dust being stuck inside. I would recommend not interfering with the healing and simply monitor for worse and signs of infection, including increased redness to the area, pus draining from the wound, etc.
responses.content_zh: 如果你在受伤后用二氧化氢和碘清洁了伤口，这些黑色/灰色物质可能是皮肤愈合后的产物，而不是粘附在里面的灰尘。我建议不要干扰伤口自然愈合，只需覌察有没有恶化和受到感染的迹象，这包括该部位加剧发红、伤口脓液流出等。

query_title_en: As shown in the image, I just got bitten by my 1 year old Chiwawa (scratched by the teeth when at play). Will I get rabies? Do I need the rabies vaccine?
query_title_zh: 如图：刚刚被自己家养的1岁吉娃娃犬咬伤（打闹的时候被牙齿划到） 会不会得狂犬病？需要打狂犬病针？
query_content_en: Patient information: female. Note: When I purchased the dog, the dog was vaccinated with rabies.
query_content_zh: 患者信息：女补充：我家狗狗买来的时候打过狂犬病预防针

responses.content_en: No rabies shot necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: Regarding wound inquiry.
query_title_zh: 有关伤口问题
query_content_en: Regarding a wound inquiry: my heel got scraped by a cart, resulting in a cut about 3 cm long, as shown in the picture. At first, I thought it was just a scrape, but now the wound has sunken in. What’s going on? Does this need stitches? Will it heal flat afterwards?
query_content_zh: 有关伤口问题脚后跟被推车蹭可以下，大概3公分长的口子，如图，一开始以为是破皮，现在伤口凹下去了，怎么回事？这个需要缝针么？之后会长平么？

responses.content_en: No stitches are necessary. The wound will take 4-6 weeks to heal and will flatten over time.
responses.content_zh: 不需要缝合。伤口可能需要4-6周才能愈合，并会随着时间逐渐变平。

query_title_en: After a dog bite, besides the rabies vaccine, is the rabies antiserum needed?
query_title_zh: 被狗咬伤除了注射狂犬疫苗还需要注册抗狂犬病血清吗？
query_content_en: Patient information: female, 54 years old, Fujian, Xiamen. Illness description (onset of illness, main symptoms): In the morning, my mother was bitten by a small dog on the anterior side of foot joint. The image shows the specific condition. (there seems to have some bruising inside). After being bitten, we went to the hospital immediatly and cleased the wound, and received the first rabies shot. Is the rabies antiserum shot also needed? What kind of help needed: What should we take consideration for the next few days? For example, any living or diet considerations?
query_content_zh: 患者信息：女 54岁 福建 厦门 病情描述(发病时间、主要症状等)：早上我妈被一只小狗咬伤了脚的关节内侧，具体伤情如图（实际里面似乎还有瘀青），被咬伤后马上去了医院处理了伤口并注射了第一支狂犬疫苗，请问还需要注射抗狂犬病血清吗？想得到怎样的帮助：请问最近几天要注意什么？比如说生活起居和饮食方面？

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily. Consider antibiotics for animal bites. Follow hospital instructions regarding rabies vaccination schedule.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口。动物咬伤时可考虑使用抗生素。遵循医院狂犬疫苗接种时间表的指示。

query_title_en: I got a blister from exercising a couple of days ago, as shown in the picture. Can I take a shower or exercise? How can I make it heal faster?
query_title_zh: 我前两天运动时脚磨破了皮，如图，请问能洗澡运动吗？怎么消下去？

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with dry dressing. You can exercise and shower as normal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用干燥敷料覆盖。您可以正常运动和洗澡。

query_title_en: My finger was bitten by a cat, and the wound is as shown in the picture. It has been bleeding slightly, but the cat café owner said the cat is vaccinated, so there's no need to worry. Should I get vaccinated?
query_title_zh: 手指被猫咪咬伤了，大小如图，一直少量出血，但是猫咖店家说猫咪打了疫苗不用担心。我应该去打疫苗吗

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care as you may also need antibiotics to prevent infection and get a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years given the type of injury.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心，因为您可能需要抗生素来预防感染，如果您的破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，也建议接种破伤风疫苗，鉴于伤口类型。

query_content_en: When I was 18, I had a car accident that left me with a scar, as shown in the picture. I have a tendency to form scars. If I get plastic surgery, will it leave no marks and make my skin look like it did before?
query_content_zh: 我18岁出了车祸，破了相，后来如图，有了个肉蕾，我是疤痕体质，如果整形，会不留痕迹和以前皮肤一样平吗？

responses.content_en: You can consult a plastic surgeon for scar revision. If you are prone to developing keloid scars there is no guarantee that the skin will leave no marks.
responses.content_zh: 您可以咨询整形外科医生进行疤痕修复。如果您容易形成瘢痕疙瘩，无法保证皮肤不会留下痕迹。

query_title_en: Do I need a shot for a dog scratch? The wound size is shown in the picture. Please let an expert take a look.
query_title_zh: 被狗抓伤要打针吗？有图，伤口大小如图。请专家看看

responses.content_en: No rabies shot necessary.
responses.content_zh: 不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: I was bitten by a dog as shown in the image. Besides the vaccine, do I need to get the human rabies immune globulin shot?
query_title_zh: 被狗咬了伤口如图，请问除了打疫苗针，还有必要打蛋白针吗

responses.content_en: No rabies vaccine is needed at this time unless the dog has rabies. I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care as you may need a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years as well as possible antibiotics given the bite.
responses.content_zh: 目前不需要注射狂犬疫苗，除非该狗有狂犬病。我建议您前往最近的急诊中心，因为如果您的破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，您可能需要接种破伤风疫苗，并可能需要抗生素治疗咬伤。

responses.content_en: If dog bite and unknown vaccination status would recommend rabies series.  Keeping the wound clean with warm soapy soaks and a clean dressing is sufficient for wound care
responses.content_zh: 如果是狗咬伤且疫苗接种状态未知，建议接种狂犬病疫苗。保持伤口清洁，伤口护理方面用温肥皂水浸泡和干净的敷料保持清洁就足够了

responses.content_en: Depending on where you live and on whether the dog has been vaccinated for rabies, you may need the  rabies immunoglobulin shot. You may also need antibiotics to prevent infection.  Make sure to keep the area clean and dry.
responses.content_zh: 根据你住的地方和狗是否接种了狂犬症疫苗，你可能需要接种狂犬症免疫球蛋白。你可能还需要抗生素来预防感染。确保该部位保持清洁干燥。

query_title_en: After popping a burn blister, I applied a moist burn ointment. A few days later, the wound became purulent. I treated the surface, but what should I do next? (as shown in the pict
query_title_zh: 烫伤水泡挑了 用湿润烧伤膏 几天后 伤口化脓把表面的处理了 现在应该怎么办 如图

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. It will take 1-2 months for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要1-2个月才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing with granulation tissue.  If this was related to a burn, there does not appear to be evidence of secondary infection.  Difficult to tell where it is located on the body.  Please avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  You may apply topical antibiotic ointment and a nonadherent dressing to the wound and change it daily.  For cleaning of the wound, when doing dressing changes, please use warm soapy water to gently cleanse the wound.
responses.content_zh: 伤口有肉芽组织，似乎正在愈合。如果是烧伤的话，似乎没有继发感染的迹象。很难知道身体上是什么东西。避免使用酒精、二氧化氢、或碘等干燥剂。可以用外敷抗生素和非粘附性包扎物包好。包扎要每天更换。每天更换包扎时可用温和肥皂水轻洗伤口。

query_title_en: How to handle self-harm wounds?
query_title_zh: 自残的伤口要怎么处理？
query_content_en: If my parents find out, things will get worse. I don't have anyone reliable nearby, so I had to seek help online. It's not a threat... Last night, I cut myself with a utility knife. I cleaned it with alcohol and applied several band-aids. Before sleeping, I noticed blood seeping out, so I replaced the band-aids. Due to insufficient preparation during the band-aid change, it bled for quite a while. Today, I woke up and it looks like the picture. My left hand feels slightly uncomfortable. I want to know if I need stitches. Can I stitch it myself, or should I go to which department in the hospital? Female, 15 years old.
query_content_zh: 如果被爸妈知道事情会更严重，身边也没有可靠的人，只好网上求助了，并不是恐吓……昨天晚上用美工刀割了一个口子，用乙醇消毒液涂了一下就贴了几张创口贴，睡前看到血渗出来了重新贴了几张新的创口贴，换创口贴的过程因为准备不够充足流血流了好一会儿，今天醒来大概是如图的样子，左手也稍稍有点不太舒服，想知道需不需要缝针，可以自己缝吗，或者去医院该去哪门门诊？女，15岁。

responses.content_en: I would not recommend that you stitch this yourself. If it is still bleeding or you have numbness and tingling in your arm or hand, I would recommend that you go to the hospital for further evaluatoin and to obtain stitches. If the bleeding has stopped, perform local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with bandages.
responses.content_zh: 我不建议您自行缝合。如果仍然在出血或您的手臂或手有麻木和刺痛感，我建议您去医院进行进一步检查并进行缝合。如果出血已经停止，进行局部伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Unable to see extent of wound.  Given bleeding would likely need stiches but need to see how much tissue damage is present.  Needs to be gently  cleaned with warm soapy water with clean dressing.
responses.content_zh: 无法看出伤口的程度。考虑到出血，可能需要缝合，但需要查看损伤的组织程度。需要用温肥皂水轻柔清洁，使用干净的敷料。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say how deep the incision is based on the given image, I would recommend being seen by a physician for further evaluation and washout to determine whether you need proper dressings or sutures.  I would also recommend seeking any mental health resources you have given the concern for self-harm, which can be provided at the hospital.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难确定伤口有多深。我建议你去看医生做进一步评估和冲洗，以确定你是否只需要把伤口包扎好、或需要缝针愈合。由於你有自残的忧虑，我还建议你去寻求有关心理健康的资源，这些资源在医院可以提供。

query_title_en: Can anyone advise on how to treat this wound? I applied a bandage during the day, and when I removed it after finishing work at midnight, it looked like this.
query_title_zh: 大家帮我看一下这样的伤口还能怎么处理呢？白天的时候贴了止血贴，十二点下班后揭开就成了这个样子的了？
query_content_en: Is it okay to apply red medicine and anti-inflammatory powder on the wound? The wound is still oozing fluid and sticking to my pants. There's also a smell.
query_content_zh: 现在涂上了红药和消炎粉墨行吧？还会流液体粘在裤子上喔？还有一股味道？

responses.content_en: Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: Will wound like this be infected with tetanus?
query_title_zh: 请问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？
query_content_en: Will wound like this be infected with tetanus? It was injured by an iron sheet, and a layer of skin was scraped off, bleeding. The diameter is 5mm, treated with hydrogen peroxide for three times, and it had been 24 hours. Image as shown.
query_content_zh: 请问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？被铁皮划破，掉了一层皮，出血，直径5mm，用双氧水处理了3次，已过24小时。如图所示！！！

responses.content_en: If the metal had rust on it recommend a tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 如果金属上有锈迹，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: For wounds like this, will it be infected with tetanus
query_title_zh: 问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？如图！
query_content_en: Patient information: Male 20 years old. Illness description (onset of illness, main symptoms): Will wound like this get infected with tetanus? It was lacerated by an iron board. A layer of skin was removed, and bleeding. The diameter is 5mm. Treated with hydrogen peroxide for three times. It has passed 24 hours. What kind of help wanted: Will wound like this get infected with tetanus? How should I treat it? Past treatment and if there is past allergery or hereditery illness: None.
query_content_zh: 患者信息：男 20岁 病情描述(发病时间、主要症状等)：问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？被铁皮划破，掉了一层皮，出血，直径5mm，用双氧水处理了3次，已过24小时。想得到怎样的帮助：问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？如何处理？曾经治疗情况及是否有过敏、遗传病史：无

responses.content_en: I recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as you may need a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since your last one as well as to evaluate if there is an infection given the redness and swelling surrounding the wound.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心进行进一步评估，因为如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，可能需要接种破伤风疫苗，如果伤口周围红肿, 需检查是否有感染迹象。

responses.content_en: Appears to be healing with granulation.  Does not have significant signs of secondary infection.  Avoid using any drying agents such as hydrogen peroxide, alcohol, or iodine as this will delay healing.  Instead, use emollients or topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.  If tetanus is not up-to-date, tetanus should be updated.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正在愈合，并有肉芽组织。目前没有明显的二次感染迹象。避免使用任何干燥剂，如过氧化氢、酒精或碘，这会延迟愈合。相反，可以使用润肤剂或局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴敷料。如果破伤风疫苗接种过期，则应更新。

responses.content_en: If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting the tetanus vaccine. I would avoid using hydrogen peroxide as that further prevent healing and damage the skin. I would recommend washing the area with warm soapy water and applying a dressing to the area.
responses.content_zh: 如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。 我会避免使用二氧化氢，因为这会进一步阻碍愈合和损害皮肤。我建议用温肥皂水清洗该部位，并在该处涂抹包扎物料。

query_title_en: There is a wound on the palm of my hand that won't heal.
query_title_zh: 手心有一伤口不能愈合。
query_content_en: Patient Information: Male, 32 years old, Shijiazhuang, Hebei. Condition description (time of onset, main symptoms, etc.): There has been a wound on my palm for about two years, and I don't know how it happened. The wound doesn't hurt or itch. Usually, I don't notice it, but it turns white and swells when exposed to water. What is causing this problem, and how should it be treated? Previous treatments and any history of allergies or hereditary diseases: None. (as shown in the picture)
query_content_zh: 患者信息：男 32岁 河北 石家庄 病情描述(发病时间、主要症状等)：大约两年了，手心上有一伤口，不知道是如何产生的。伤口不疼不痒，平时没有注意，着水后周围皮肤发白胀大。想得到怎样的帮助：请问这是什么问题，是什么原因造成的，应当如何治疗？曾经治疗情况及是否有过敏、遗传病史：无如图

responses.content_en: There may be a foreign body in the wound that prevents it from healing. Recommend consulting a physician for examination.
responses.content_zh: 伤口内可能有异物，导致愈合受阻。建议咨询医生进行检查。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, I fell off my bike. The previous wound didn't break the skin but it's bleeding. How should I handle it?
query_title_zh: 如图，骑自行车摔倒，以前的伤口没破皮但是出血了，怎么处理

responses.content_en: Wash with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: How to treat a cut wound from eye glasses. Wound is shown in image attached
query_title_zh: 眼镜划伤的伤口如何处理 伤口如图
query_content_en: as shown in the image
query_content_zh: 如图

responses.content_en: Recommend Urgent Care evaluation for stitches since it is over a joint and can continue to bleed with movement
responses.content_zh: 建议去急诊中心评估是否需要缝合，因为伤口位于关节处，移动时可能会持续出血。

query_title_en: This morning, I was scraped by rusty iron, resulting in the wound shown in the picture. Do I need a tetanus shot?
query_title_zh: 今天早上被带锈的铁皮刮了一下，伤口如图，请问这样的伤口要打破伤风吗？

responses.content_en: If the wound was caused by a rusty nail tetanus shot would be recommended.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口是由生锈的钉子造成的，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

responses.content_en: If your tetanus is not up to date I would recommend getting a tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 如果你接种的破伤风疫苗已逾期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: The ankle was previously scraped and hasn't healed until now, as shown in the picture. The area around it still feels hard internally. Can anyone advise?
query_title_zh: 脚踝处原来擦伤，至今未能痊愈，如图，周围还内部还很硬，请教各位！
query_content_en: Additional pictures: None!
query_content_zh: 补充图片 没有！

responses.content_en: The surrouding tissue can be hard due to the healing process but should flatten over time. Consult a doctor if you develop fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, bleeding, redness, warmth, pain or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 由于愈合过程，周围组织可能变硬，但应随时间过去逐渐平坦。如果出现发热、发冷、恶心、呕吐、出血、红肿、发热、疼痛或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

query_title_en: It's been over ten days since the burn. Can I wear socks now? The situation is as shown in the picture
query_title_zh: 烫伤十几天了，有事要出门，可以穿袜子了吗？情况如图

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. Open toed shoes may be more comfortable until the wound is completely healed.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。穿露趾鞋可能会更舒适，直到伤口完全愈合。

query_title_en: While cooking, my arm was burned by oil, forming a blister that later broke. Can applying erythromycin ointment prevent infection? The wound is shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 做饭时胳膊被油烫伤，起泡后皮破了，请问抹红霉素药膏能防止 感染吗？伤口如图所示

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. It will take 1-2 months for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要1-2个月才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Blistering suggest a partial-thickness wound.  To promote healing and reduce the risk of infection, recommend applying a topical antibiotic ointment and covering with a nonadherent dressing.  Dressing may be changed daily.  During dressing changes, clean the wound gently with warm soapy water.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 起了水泡表明伤口部分已增厚。建议涂上外敷抗生素药膏并用非粘附性包扎物包好。这样可以促进愈合和减低感染的风险。每曰更換包扎。更換时用温和肥皂水轻洗。如果破伤风注射有效期己过，需要重新注射破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: How can I prevent a scar from forming after a fall? I fell while walking my dog today, resulting in the wound shown in the picture. Because it's on my hand, I'm quite concerned.
query_title_zh: 摔倒了怎么不会留疤 我今天遛狗的时候摔了一下，然后如图了。。。因为是手 我比较在意。。。
query_content_en: Patient Information: Female. How can I prevent a scar after a fall? I fell while walking my dog today, resulting in the wound shown in the picture. Because it's on my hand, I'm quite concerned. Will it leave a scar?
query_content_zh: 患者信息：女 摔倒了怎么不会留疤   我今天遛狗的时候摔了一下，然后如图了。。。因为是手  我比较在意。。。就是这样了。。。会不会落疤啊、、、、

responses.content_en: The scar will continue to remodel for a year and soften/fade over time. You cannot control whether a hypertrophic scar forms.
responses.content_zh: 疤痕将在一年内继续重塑，并随着时间逐渐软化和淡化。您无法控制是否会形成增生性疤痕。

query_title_en: My friend's leg is bruised from a dog bite through clothing. What should we do?
query_title_zh: 我朋友的腿被狗咬紫了，隔着衣服，怎么办？
query_content_en: My friend's leg is bruised from a dog bite through clothing. What should we do? Does my friend need to get vaccinated? (As shown in the picture):
query_content_zh:
我朋友的腿被狗咬紫了，隔着衣服，怎么办？

要不要打疫苗？？？

症状如图：

responses.content_en: The trauma di dnot break the skin. A rabies shot is unecessary.
responses.content_zh: 创伤没有破皮，不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

responses.content_en: I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine if your tetanus is not up to date. If this was a dog bite your friend would benefit from a course of augmentin antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 如果你接种的破伤风疫苗已逾期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。如果这是狗咬伤，注射增强型抗生素可能对你的朋友有帮助。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, my knee was injured from a fall and I've been changing the dressing for 5 days. I applied ointment. Do I still need to wrap it with gauze? If I don't, how can I cover it with a blanket while sleeping without disturbing the wound?
query_title_zh: 如图，膝盖摔伤换药5天了，擦了药，还需要用纱布包扎吗？不包扎的话睡觉怎么盖被子呢...会弄到伤口吧

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. It will take 1-2 months for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要1-2个月才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing with granulation tissue without secondary signs of infection.  To promote wound healing and minimize scarring, recommend using a topical antibiotic ointment as well as covering with a nonadherent dressing and changing the dressing once a day.  During dressing changes, please gently clean the wound with warm soapy water.
responses.content_zh: 伤口有肉芽组织，似乎正在愈合，并无继发感染迹象。建议使用外敷抗生素药膏和非粘附性包扎物包扎伤口，每日更换一次，可以促进愈合和减少结痂。更換包扎时，可用温暖肥皂水清洗。

query_title_en: The wound has become like this (as shown in the picture), how should I treat it? Please advise.
query_title_zh: 伤口变成这样（如图）该怎么处理？求解答

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。

query_title_en: I have a burn on the back of my hand. Do I need to go to the hospital? The wound is shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 手背烫伤了 需要去医院吗 如图
query_content_en: got burned the night before last, and I've been applying burn ointment these past two days.
query_content_zh: 前天晚上被烫的 这两天都有涂烫伤药

responses.content_en: Keep clean daily with soap and water. If the blister pops keep covered with dry bandage. No hospital evaluation necessary.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洁。如果水泡破了，继续用干燥的绷带覆盖。无需去医院评估。

query_title_en: My nail was pricked by a saw blade. After bandaging it, a week later I noticed the wound is still open.
query_title_zh: 手指尖指甲边让锯齿扎伤了，包扎完，过了一个星期了，发现伤口是分开的
query_content_en: As shown in the picture, will it heal properly? It won't keep splitting like this, right? At the time, the wound didn't seem big, so it wasn't stitched. It was caused by a saw blade prick. I've had a tetanus shot.
query_content_zh: 如图所示 可以长好么 不会这样一直裂着吧 当时看伤口不大也没有缝 是让锯齿的倒刺扎进去扎伤的 打过破伤风

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibitoic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage. It may take 2-4 weeks to heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并涂抹抗生素软膏。用干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。伤口可能需要2-4周才能愈合。

responses.content_en: Do soapy soaks and warm soapy water 3 times a day.  Apply topical antibiotic ointment and use nonadherent dressing.  Monitor for any signs of infection such as swelling, redness, or significant purulent drainage.
responses.content_zh: 每天用温肥皂水浸泡3次。涂抹局部抗生素软膏并使用不粘贴敷料。留意是否有感染迹象，如肿胀、红肿或明显的脓性分泌物。

responses.content_en: This wound will heal properly if you keep the area clean and protect it appropriately. I would wash the finger with warm soapy soaks and wrap the finger with a dressing to prevent any further opening of the wound. ￼
responses.content_zh: 如果你保持伤口部位清洁、并有适当保护，这个伤口会正常愈合。我会用温热的肥皂水浸泡手指，并用包扎物包裹手指，以防止伤口进一步裂开。

query_content_en: As shown in the picture, my thumb pad was cut and required 4 stitches. The stitches were removed after 14 days of injury, during which I continuously bandaged it and changed dressings. The wound did not turn red during dressing changes but there is swelling. Now my thumb cannot bend. Is there a problem?
query_content_zh: 如图 我大拇指肚位置被割伤，缝了4针，受伤14天拆的线，期间一直在包扎，也换过药，换药时伤口不红，但有水肿，现在大拇指不能弯曲，请问有事吗？

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear infected. It may take 1-2 months until wound is fully healed.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。伤口可能需要1-2个月才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully evaluate given the 1 included picture however there does appear to be significant scarring.  If the original injury was overlying the joint and significant scar has developed there may be contractures of the skin limiting the range of motion.  If there is swelling, there would be additional concern for possible infection.  Would need to know if there was any redness, drainage, or systemic signs of infection.  However, if you cannot bend your thumb and there is swelling, you should be evaluated promptly.
responses.content_zh: 从单一图片上情况很难衡量。似乎没有严重结痂现象。如果最初的损伤覆盖了关节，并形成了明显的疤痕，则可能会出现皮肤挛缩，限制了运动范围。如果有肿胀现象，可能有感染的顾虑。需要知悉有没有发红、流液、或系统胜的感染。如果末能弯曲姆指、和有肿胀时，应即时衡量情况。

query_title_en: As shown in the image, what is happening to my feet? It hurts so bad, what should I do? Anything that can cure this?
query_title_zh: 如图，我的脚是怎么回事？？太痛苦了，该怎么？用什么可以治好？
query_content_en: The texture often crack open
query_content_zh: 那些纹路经常会裂开，，

responses.content_en: The dryness of skin is leading to the skin opening up and causing pain. I would recommend that you consult a doctor as you would need a strong steroid cream to help this heal. In the meantime, try to apply moisturizing cream as often as possible.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤干燥导致了开裂和出血。您可以涂抹类固醇软膏，然后涂上一层厚厚的保湿霜。伤口愈合后，应继续每天使用保湿霜。您可以服用止痛药来缓解疼痛。

responses.content_en: Given scaling, likely fungal infection.  Can try antifungal medication but likely needs long term wound care to properly heal.
responses.content_zh: 因为有到鳞屑，可能是真菌感染。可以尝试抗真菌药物，但可能需要长期的伤口护理以正确愈合。

responses.content_en: This is likely a superficial wound to the foot, either from friction for from a fungal infection.  Would recommend keeping the area clean and dry to prevent infection,  it will take some time to heal. you can also try topical antifungal treatment.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是脚部的浅表伤口，可能是摩擦造成的、或是真菌感染造成的。建议保持该部位清洁干燥，以防止感染，这伤口需要一些时间才能愈合。你也可以尝试涂用抗真菌药膏治疗。

query_title_en: Seeking for advice! Six months ago, I got a piece of skin on my shoulder scraped off while working at a construction site. I assumed the wound would heal on its own. As a result, after the wound healed, it swelled up (as shown in the picture).
query_title_zh: 求救，本人半年前在工地做事肩膀被磨破了一块皮，自认为伤口会愈合结果伤口愈合之后肿起来了（如图）
query_content_en: Help needed! Six months ago, I got a piece of skin on my shoulder scraped off while working at a construction site. I assumed the wound would heal on its own and didn't take care of it. As a result, after the wound healed, it swelled up (as shown in the picture) and hasn't subsided. When I press it, it still hurts. I'm asking for help and suggestions from everyone. Thank you very much!
query_content_zh: 求救，本人半年前在工地做事肩膀被磨破了一块皮，于是我自认为伤口会愈合，没有去管它，结果伤口愈合之后肿起来了（如图），一直消不下来，用手摁一下还会疼，求助各位大爷给小弟帮帮忙提点建议，万分感谢

responses.content_en: This is a keloid scar. Recommend evaluation by dermatology.
responses.content_zh: 这是瘢痕疙瘩。建议去皮肤科进行评估。

query_title_en: Has this wound (as shown in the picture) healed? Why or why not?
query_title_zh: 这伤口（如图）痊愈了没？为什么？

responses.content_en: There may be  foreign material in the center of the wound delaying wound healing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口中央可能有异物，导致伤口愈合延迟。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be ulceration versus vesicular nature on palmar surface.  If it is vesicular possibly dyshidrotic eczema versus herpes simplex virus.  Would recommend follow-up with primary care doctor for viral testing.  Otherwise local wound care with moisturizing agents and topical antibiotics with nonadherent dressing.  If there are other lesions to palms/soles, would recommend further evaluation by primary care doctor for other infectious etiology.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是腱疽性溃疡或水泡状。若为水泡，可能是湿疹或单纯疱疹病毒。建议与初级保健医生跟进进行病毒检测。否则继续局部伤口护理，使用保湿剂和局部抗生素，并使用不粘贴敷料。如果手掌/脚底有其他损伤，建议由初级保健医生进一步评估其他感染病因。

responses.content_en: The wound is currently healing, there is some mild redness to the area that may take some more time to heal. I would recommend keeping the area clean and dry while continues to heal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口目前正在愈合。在那里有一些轻微的发红，可能需要更多时间才能愈好。在愈合的期间，我建议你保持伤口部位清洁干燥。

query_title_en: Is this what a minor wound looks like after being bitten or scratched by a dog, as shown in the picture?
query_title_zh: 被狗咬伤或抓伤轻微伤口形状图是不是这个样子的啊如图所是

responses.content_en: Cannot determine mechanism of injury from photo.
responses.content_zh: 无法从照片中确定受伤的机制

query_content_en: I injured my knee by falling, as shown in the picture. Is it serious? How should I treat it? Disinfecting it isn't too painful, is it?
query_content_zh: 膝盖摔伤，如图，严重吗？？？请问怎么处理？ 消毒什么的不是很痛？？？

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily. If it is difficult to bear weight on that leg consider Xray to rule out fracture.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。如果腿部难承重，建议进行X光检查以排除骨折可能。

query_title_en: I was injured 2 cm above my knee by a horizontal blow from a iron sheet. The skin wound has healed, but the area is still numb, and I can't walk normally.
query_title_zh: 膝盖上面两厘米的地方被贴片横向砸伤，皮外伤好了，伤口处还是麻木，腿不能正常走路
query_content_en: The wound, as shown in the picture, is now surrounded by yellowish numb areas. I can't squat properly, and my leg can only bend to the extent shown in the picture. The doctor said to wait until the swelling goes down to reassess and mentioned that a local nerve might be damaged. Can someone with knowledge tell if this is serious? Will it affect my ability to walk normally? I am very worried! Thank you.
query_content_zh: 伤口如图所示，现在伤口周围发黄的地方都是麻木的，我现在腿不能正常下蹲，腿现在只能收缩到如图这种程度。医生说等消肿后再看看，说可能是局部神经断掉了。 求懂的人指点啊，这个有没有大碍 啊？会不会影响我正常的走路。甚是担心啊！谢谢

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation in ER. If there is numbness and loss of function in the leg there may be a nerve injury or a possible fracture.
responses.content_zh: 建议去急诊室进行评估。如果腿部有麻木和功能丧失，可能是神经损伤或可能的骨折。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully appreciate wound and extent of injury on the included picture.  Based on the clinical complaint, would recommend further evaluation for underlying soft tissue injury, tendon injury, or fracture.
responses.content_zh: 从图片上很难衡量伤口的范围和受伤的程度。从你的描述来看，建议进一步评核下层软组织受损、肌腱受损、或骨折的情况。

query_content_en: Urgent! I'm in the 9th grade and really busy with schoolwork! Two weeks ago, I discovered my toenail had pierced into the flesh, so I cut it. I didn't expect it to leave a wound. Now it's pus-filled, and after searching online, I think it's paronychia. I don't know what to do. Can any experts please give me advice? My situation is in the picture. I'd prefer to handle it myself. I think doing surgery wouldn't be too painful for me, but I'm worried it might take too much time, especially since it's 9th grade. Right now, I'm leaning towards incision and drainage, but I'm not sure of the details. Thank you!
query_content_zh: 急！！本人初三学业很紧！两周前发现脚指甲扎到肉里去了就把它剪了，没想到伤口已经留下来了。现在化了脓百度了一下知道是甲沟炎，不知道该怎么办，请各位大神支个招。情况如图。最好自己解决，手术的话痛没什么，就怕耽误太多时间毕竟是初三。目前比较倾向切开引流，不知道详细情况。谢谢！(ಥ_ಥ)

responses.content_en: If there is pus, it does need an incision and drainage but I would recommend having a doctor perform this as you may also need antibiotics for the infection.
responses.content_zh: 如果有脓液，确实需要进行切开引流，但我建议由医生进行此操作，因为您可能还需要抗生素来治疗感染。

responses.content_en: If fluid is present, will likely need incision and drainage. Can try warm soapy soaks which might soften the nail and allow for spontaneous drainage
responses.content_zh: 如果有液体存在，可能需要切开和引流。可以尝试温肥皂水浸泡，这可能会软化指甲并允许自发排出。

responses.content_en: You are correct, this is likely paronychia. You likely would not require surgery however I would recommend being seen by a physician for an incision and drainage performed by them,  as they can perform this procedure sterilely and help with pain control. You can also try warm compresses to help with the drainage.
responses.content_zh: 你是对的，这可能是甲沟炎。你可能不需要手术，但我建议由医生进行伤口切口和引流，因为他们可以无菌地进行手术和帮助控制疼痛。你也可以尝试热敷来帮助引流。

query_title_en: I was bitten by a cat raised by a relative in the village. The wound looks like the one in the picture. I washed it with soap and water. Do I need an injection? The wound hurts a little.
query_title_zh: 被村里亲戚养的猫咬到了，伤口如图，用肥皂水洗过了，请问需要打针吗，伤口有点小疼

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, it's urgent. How should I treat this type of wound?
query_title_zh: 如图，急，这种伤口如何处理。
query_content_en: I cut myself with a kitchen knife while cutting meat. It hurts a little.
query_content_zh: 切肉的时候被菜刀切爆了，有一点点疼。

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并涂抹抗生素软膏。用干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。

responses.content_en: Given the bleeding, there is likely some injury to the nailbed underneath the fingernail.  There does not appear to be any subungual hematoma that would require trephination.  Local wound care including warm soapy soaks in warm soapy water 1-3 times a day is likely appropriate.  If significant bruising under the fingernail develops, may require trephination.
responses.content_zh: 鉴于出血，可能指甲床下有一些伤害。似乎没有需要穿刺的指甲血肿。局部伤口护理包括每周1到3次用温肥皂水浸泡是合适的。如果指甲下出现明显淤血，可能需要穿刺。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided as to whether the knife has cut through the underlying skin under the nail. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine the depth of this injury if bruising under the nail develops. I would recommend soaking your finger in soapy water a few times a day while it continues to heal.
responses.content_zh: 根据所提供的图像，很难说这刀伤是否已穿过了指甲下的下层皮肤。如果指甲下出现瘀伤，我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定损伤的深度。在伤口愈合期間，我建议每天用肥皂水浸泡几次。

query_title_en: Upon waking up, I saw a several wounds at this side of the shoulder, whys is it there? It has not heal for a few days.
query_title_zh: 一觉醒来，肩膀这边有了几道伤口，是为什么，好几天也没见好。
query_content_en: As shown in image.
query_content_zh: 如图

responses.content_en: These appear to be stretch marks not wounds.
responses.content_zh: 这些看起来是妊娠纹，而不是伤口。

responses.content_en: These appear to be newly formed stretch marks, may be from growth. It may form scars.
responses.content_zh: 这些似乎是新形成的伸展疤纹；可能来自身体增长。它可能会形成疤痕。

query_title_en: Right big toe as shown in the picture. The area on the right side has been hurting continuously, for no apparent reason. Seeking advice.
query_title_zh: 右脚大拇指如图。右边的位置一直在疼，不知道什么原因，求大神

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as you have an infection called a paronychia and need to have the pus drained from the site.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你去最近的紧急护理中心进行进一步检查，因为你患了一种叫做甲沟炎的感染，可能需要从感染部位引流脓液。

responses.content_en: It appears to be paronychia of your big toe. You may benefit from an incision and drainage of the toe. Should soak your toe and warm soapy water to help with softening the skin and draining the pus. ￼
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是在大脚趾上的甲沟炎。在脚趾上进行切口和引流会对你有帮助。应该浸泡脚趾、用温肥皂水来帮助软化皮肤、和排出脓液。

query_content_en: A year ago, my classmate used a pencil sharpener's knife, and cut at my joint area of the left ring finger. Now the wound is healed, but you can still see there is some black area inside the tissue (as shown in the image). Will it be alright? What should I do?
query_content_zh: 一年前同学用削铅笔的刀割了我的左手无名指的关节处，现在伤口愈合了，可是还是可以亲眼看见肉里有一道黑色的东西（如图）。这会不会有事啊？我还怎么办？

responses.content_en: This may be hyperpigmentation of the scar. There is nothing to do at this time.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是疤痕的色素沉着。目前无需处理。

responses.content_en: Pigmentation underneath the skin is likely subdermal and related to some scarring or possible reaction to foreign body from the initial wound.  As long as it is not painful and range of motion is preserved, this is likely only cosmetic.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤下的色素可能是真皮下的，与一些瘢痕或对最初伤口异物的反应有关。只要不疼痛且活动范围保持正常，这很可能就只是一个美观问题。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided, I would recommend being a valuated by a physician in person to determine whether there is an underlying foreign body with your finger. It does not appear to be infected at this time, as long as you are able to, range your finger without difficulty, this appears to have healed well. ￼
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难确定情况。我建议由医生来做评估，以确定你的手指是否有外物侵进。现在如果你能毫无困难地活动你的手指，它似乎没有受到感染。它似乎已经愈合得很好了。

query_content_en: My middle finger was cut by a rusted stainless steel sheet, as shown in the image. It is about finger size deep, do I need to get the tetanus shot? Can I just disinfect it with iodine?
query_content_zh: 中指被生锈的不锈钢片划伤。如图。深的话手指一共也就那么点深。需要打破伤风吗。自己拿碘酒消毒下可以吗。

responses.content_en: Tetanus shot recommended
responses.content_zh: 建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: I was scratched by a cat through thick jeans, leaving a blood mark as shown in the picture. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine?
query_title_zh: 被猫隔着厚牛仔裤抓了一下，留下一道血痕，伤口如图，请问需要接种狂犬疫苗吗

responses.content_en: No need for rabies vaccine in this situation.
responses.content_zh: 在这种情况下不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

responses.content_en: If vaccination status of cat unknown and cannot be quarantined, while risk is low, depending on the area, would recommend vaccination.  Otherwise, local wound care with topical antibiotic and dressing is sufficient
responses.content_zh: 如果猫的疫苗接种状态未知且无法隔离，虽然风险较低，具体取决于地区，建议接种疫苗。否则，局部伤口护理，使用局部抗生素和敷料是就行了。

responses.content_en: You should not need to get a rabies vaccine for a cat scratch as the risk of transmission of rabies from a scratch is very low however, if you live in an area with high instance, I would consider it. However, I would continue to keep an eye on the area as you may need antibiotics for the cat scratch if it becomes infected. I would dress the wound with antibiotic ointment. ￼
responses.content_zh: 你应该不需要为猫抓伤接种狂犬症疫苗，因为从抓伤传播狂犬症的风险非常低。当然，如果你居住在一个狂犬症发病率很高的也区，我会另作考虑。虽然如此，我会继续观察伤口部位；如果伤口己受感染，你可能需要抗生素来治疗。我会用抗生素软膏包扎伤口。

query_title_en: I cut my finger while chopping vegetables, as shown in the picture. Do I need to go to the clinic for bandaging and disinfection, or can I handle it myself?
query_title_zh: 切菜切到手指了 伤口如图 需要去诊所包扎消毒吗 还是自己随便弄弄

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: Do I need to get vaccinated immediately for a minor cat scratch?
query_title_zh: 被猫轻微抓伤需要立即接种疫苗吗
query_content_en: I live in a rural area and have a good relationship with the neighbor's cat. It usually comes over when I call. I was likely scratched while playing with it, and the scratch doesn't seem intentional. The wound is very small, as shown in the picture; the red spot on my middle finger is the healed scar. Do I need to get vaccinated immediately, or can I wait and observe for ten days? The scratch bled a little, and the wound is barely visible in the picture. I was scratched three hours ago this evening.
query_content_zh: 家住农村，邻居家的家猫，和我关系不错，一叫就过来，应该是逗着玩的时候被抓伤（不像是故意），很小的伤口，如图，中指中间那一小块的红就是伤口愈合的痕迹，需要立即接种吗，还是不打观察十日？是流了一点点血的，伤口如图，可能看不出来，今晚三个小时前被抓的

responses.content_en: I recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care to receive a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since your last one. Continue woud care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，我建议您前往最近的急诊中心接种破伤风疫苗。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be secondarily infected.  If cat is known to the you and can be observed for any behavioral changes or vaccination status is known, unlikely to need rabies series.  If vaccination status is unknown or cannot be observed, would recommend discussion with medical provider as to utility of rabies series.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Poor picture quality making interpretation difficult.
responses.content_zh: 似乎没有二次感染。如果猫是你认识的并且可以观察行为变化，或确认疫苗接种状态，则不太可能需要狂犬病疫苗。如果疫苗接种状态未知或无法观察，建议与医生讨论狂犬病疫苗系列的必要性。如果破伤风接种过期，应该更新。图像质量较差，导致解释困难

responses.content_en: You should be able to wait and observe for a few days, if the cat is familiar and has not shown any signs of rabies and you know that the cat has been vaccinated with the rabies vaccine. If you were tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend receiving the tetanus vaccine. Otherwise, this wound should heal well on its own.
responses.content_zh: 如果你可以联系到这只猫、它没有任何狂犬症的迹象、和它已经接种了狂犬症疫苗，你应该可以观察多几天。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。否则，这个伤口应该会自行愈合。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, finger scratched by a cat. Will it swell into a large lump after the wound heals?
query_title_zh: 如图，手指被猫抓伤，伤口愈合后肿大包？
query_content_en: A few months ago, my index finger was scratched by a stray cat, breaking the skin and causing a little bleeding. It healed naturally but then formed a swollen lump. I used a needle to puncture it and squeezed out pus, after which the lump flattened. However, it swelled up again shortly after. Now, months later, when I tried using a needle again, nothing came out.
query_content_zh: 几个月前，我的食指被一只流浪猫抓到，破了皮，流了一点点血，自然愈合后，肿了包，我用针扎，挤出了脓，包包扁了，不久后有肿了。几个月后，就是现在，我再用针扎，结果啥也没挤出来。

responses.content_en: The wound appears infected. Seek evaluation in ER to drain abscess and antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来有感染。建议去急诊室进行评估，排脓并接受抗生素治疗。

responses.content_en: I would recommend soaking the area and warm soapy water several times a day to soften the skin and encourage drainage from the wound and help with healing. I would also recommend being seen in person for the incision and drainage as it can be done steriley in the hospital.
responses.content_zh: 我建议浸泡该部位；每天多次用温肥皂水软化皮肤，以促进伤口引流，帮助愈合。我还建议你亲自去医院，进行伤口切口和引流。这些医疗程序可以在医院里无菌地进行。

query_content_en: I urgently need help. I accidentally got scratched by a nail. The wound is not deep, and I've applied red medicine, as shown in the picture. Should I get a tetanus shot? I asked someone, and they said it costs several hundred yuan per shot. I’m a worker and can't afford it. For such a shallow wound, is it okay not to get a tetanus shot?
query_content_zh: 急需求救，我刚才手不小心被铁钉划伤了，伤口不深，现在涂了红药水，如图，这种情况要不要打破伤风啊，刚才问了别人说要好几百一针，我打工的没钱，这么浅的伤口不打破伤风应该没事吧？

responses.content_en: You should get a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years given the type of injury.
responses.content_zh: 有鉴于伤口类型，如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: I was scratched by my cat at home, which is about four months old. The wound is shown in the picture. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine?
query_content_zh: 被家里养的猫抓伤了，猫应该有4个月了，伤口如图，需不需要打狂犬疫苗

responses.content_en: Rabies vaccine not necessary
responses.content_zh: 不需要接种狂犬疫苗。

query_title_en: I was bitten on the arm by my own cat, leaving a deep bite mark, as shown in the picture. What should I do? I am 15 years old.
query_title_zh: 我被自己加养的猫咬了胳膊，留下一个大牙印，如图，我会怎么样？我15岁

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with a dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

query_title_en: Can this wound be washed with water now?
query_title_zh: 这种伤口可以洗澡了吗？
query_content_en: As shown in the picture
query_content_zh: 如图所示

responses.content_en: Ok to clean with soap and water daily
responses.content_zh: 可以每天用肥皂和水清洗。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be a healing/scabbed over wound.  No overt signs of secondary infection.  Would recommend gentle cleaning daily with warm soapy water and avoiding any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine. You may use moisturizing agents to soften the skin and help with scar minimization.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正在愈合/结痂。没有明显的继发感染。建议每曰用温暖的肥皂水清洗伤口。避免用酒精、二氧化氢、或碘等干燥剂。你可以用润肤膏来保持皮肤柔软，并可帮助减少疤痕。

query_content_en: How to prevent small wound from inflammation? I scratched my palm yesterday when riding my bike, and I disinfected it with medcation upon returning, and did some basic wrapping. This morning, I saw blood when I open the wrapping gauze, which means it continued to bleed after wrapping. The hand looks like this on the image. Question, will it become inflamed? How should I prevent it?
query_content_zh: 怎么防止小伤口发严？ 昨天骑车擦破了手掌，回来就涂了下消毒药水，进行了简单的包扎，今天早上起来打开一看那个包扎的纱布有血，说明包了后还有流血，现在手是这样的（如图）请问，会不会发炎啊？怎么防止啊？

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. It will take 1-2 months for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要1-2个月才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Multiple soft tissue wounds with some exposed subcutaneous fat without overt signs of secondary infection.  To minimize risk of infection, please clean the wound with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  For local wound care, you may use a topical antibiotic ointment and keep the wound covered with a nonadherent dressing.  Please change the dressing daily.  Tetanus shot should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 多处软组织伤口，部分皮下脂肪外露，无明显继发感染迹象。用温和的肥皂水每日清洗１－３次可以减低感染的风险。避免使用酒精、二氧化氢、或碘等干燥剂。伤口部位的护理：可以用外敷抗生素和非粘附性包扎物包好。包扎伤口要每天更换。如果破伤风注射有效期己过，亦要重新注射破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: Do I need a rabies shot? I've had a kitten for over three months, and today while I was surfing the internet, it suddenly jumped over and scratched me with its teeth, as shown in the picture. I used soap to wash it, and there is a slight skin break but no bleeding. Should I get a rabies shot for this?
query_content_zh: 需要打狂犬吗？养了三个多月的小猫，今天我在上网的时候它突然跳过来，用牙齿划了一道痕，如图，我用肥皂洗了一下，有一点点破皮，没出血，请问这样需要打狂犬吗？

responses.content_en: No need for rabies shot. Continue wound care with washing with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 无需注射狂犬疫苗。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: If the kitten is domesticated and does not go outside and can be quarantined and monitored for abnormal behavior over the next 2 weeks, unlikely to need rabies vaccination.  Monitor for signs of infection.  Update tetanus shot if not updated.  If the you own this cat, cat should have vaccinations updated or record of vaccinations.
responses.content_zh: 如果小猫是家养且不在外面活动，并且可以在接下来的两周内进行隔离和观察异常行为，那么很可能不需要接种狂犬病疫苗。观察感染迹象。如果过期则更新破伤风疫苗。如果你是猫的主人，则应更新猫的疫苗接种记录。

responses.content_en: The likelihood of transmission of rabies via a cat scratch is low as long as you know that the cat is up-to-date on its rabies vaccine and/or the cat does not show any signs of rabies. I would wash the area as you did and keep it clean and dry. If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 只要你知道猫接种了有效的狂犬症疫苗、和/或猫没有表现出任何狂犬症迹象，受到猫抓损导致狂犬症的可能性就很低。你要像以前一样清洗伤口部位，保持干净干燥。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: My hand got burned by steam, as shown in the picture. Will it leave a scar?
query_title_zh: 我的手被蒸汽烫伤了(如图)，请问这样会留疤吗？
query_content_en: It's been two months already.
query_content_zh: 已经有两个月了。

responses.content_en: The scar will continue to remodel over 1-1.5 years and soften over time. The scar will likely remain but will be less apparent
responses.content_zh: 疤痕将在1到1.5年内继续重塑，并随着时间的推移逐渐软化。疤痕可能会保留，但会变得不太明显。

responses.content_en: In regards to the clinical question, as this was a burn injury, there will likely be some scarring present.  There does not appear to be any evidence of secondary infection.  To minimize scarring, avoid UV exposure, use SPF containing lotion when out in the sun, and use scar minimization cream such as Mederma.  If there are continued cosmetic concerns, will likely need scar revision.
responses.content_zh: 有关临床的医学问题，因为这是烧伤，很可能会有疤痕出现。这里似乎没有继发感染的迹象。避免暴露在紫外光下、在室外有阳光的地方使用防晒系数SPF的护肤霜、用类似Mederma等减低疤痕涂膏、可以减少疤痕生长。如果有颜容上的考虑，那便需要进行疤痕修复手术。

query_content_en: I scraped my leg on a rusty railing while playing football at 5 PM, resulting in a wound that bled. I applied iodine when I got home at 7:30 PM, as shown in the picture. Should I get a tetanus shot in this situation?
query_content_zh: 下午五点踢球钻栏杆，被栏杆划破腿，掉了层皮，出血了，栏杆上全是锈，七点半到家抹了碘酒，如图，这种情况用打破伤风吗

responses.content_en: Recommend tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 建议接种破伤风疫苗。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be a superficial abrasion/laceration.  Would recommend doing local wound care including avoiding drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine as these should not be used on open skin.  Instead, use a topical antibiotic ointment and cover with a nonadherent dressing.  Tetanus shot should be updated if it is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是表面擦伤/撕裂。建议采用伤口部位护理。避免用酒精、二氧化氢、或碘等干燥剂；这些干燥剂不能用在外露的皮肤上。可用外敷抗生素药膏和非粘附性包扎物包好。如果破伤风注射有效期己过，亦要重新注射破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: Hello everyone: Last month, I accidentally cut myself with a wire, causing a lot of bleeding, with a wound of average length. It looked like the picture. Initially, the wound was flat, but now it is swollen. What could this be? Will it get worse? Please advise.
query_content_zh: 大家好: 上个月我不小心被铁丝割了一点，出血多，一条的伤口长度一般。至今就出现如图这样，以前伤口没有什么 就平着，现在却肿起来了，请问这是怎么回事？ 会不会更严重？           希望大家采纳。

responses.content_en: This is a hypertrophic scar. It will continue to fade and flatten for 1.5 years.
responses.content_zh: 这是增生性疤痕。它将在1.5年内继续淡化并变平。

query_title_en: I woke up with a wound on my hand after sleeping. I don't know how it happened. Could it be from something biting me, like a rat? The wound looks like this (as shown in the picture).
query_title_zh: 晚上睡一觉手上多了个伤口，不知道怎么搞的，会不会是给什么东西咬的呢？比如老鼠之类的？伤口如图
query_content_en: I'm worried it might be a rat bite. Should I get vaccinated or something?
query_content_zh: 担心会不会是老鼠之类的咬的，要不要去打疫苗什么的

responses.content_en: Your finger could have been injured by accidently hitting something in your sleep. If there are rodents in your living area and a bite is a possiblility seek evaluation in ER.
responses.content_zh: 您的手指可能是在睡觉时不小心撞到某物而受伤。如果您的居住环境中有啮齿动物，且有被咬的可能性，建议去急诊室评估。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully assess the wound given the unclear clinical history.  If there is concern for mammal bite, you should discuss with your primary care physician or another medical provider as to the utility of rabies postexposure prophylaxis.  No overt evidence of secondary infection at this time.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 因为病历不明、很难衡量伤口情况。如果牵涉到被动物啃咬，你应与保健医生或医护人员讨论狂犬症暴露后的预防措施。现在没有明显的继发感染。如果破伤风注射有效期己过，需要重新注射破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: I was burned by an overheated handle of a cooking spoon as shown in the image. What is happening now. The wound was treated by Long Hu Jie burn remedy soluation, dead skin removed, and a band-ait was applied for a night. The wound is oozing watery drainage, and now it seemed worsened. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 被温度过高的铁柄炒菜用铲子，烫伤，如图，是怎么了，伤口用虎龙街烫伤药水处理过，去过死皮贴了一晚上创口贴，伤口在不停冒出水，现在似乎恶化了，该怎么办

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water and cover with a dry dressing. It will take 4-6 weeks for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要4-6周才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Based on the image, it is unclear whether the wound is infected. There is pus like drainage from the wound, I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water. It may require incision and drainage. However, if the wound is oozing watery discharge, as you say, you can continue to let normal progression of the healing. ￼
responses.content_zh: 根据图像，尚不清楚伤口是否已受感染。伤口有脓液样分泌物，我建议用温肥皂水浸泡伤口。可能需要切开伤囗和引流。如果伤口像你说的那样渗出水样分泌物，你可以继续让愈合正常进行。

query_title_en: My knee injury seems to be scabbing over. It feels hot and a bit painful. Is this normal? The wound surface has dried, as shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 膝盖摔伤好像在结痂了，有灼热感，有点痛正常吗，伤口表面已经干燥了，如图

responses.content_en: Clean with soap and water daily and cover with dry dressing. It will take 2-4 months for the wound to completely heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口可能需要2-4个月才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Relatively large soft tissue injury that may violate the dermis however difficult to appreciate from the single picture.  Would recommend thorough wound cleaning and irrigation and dressing with topical antibiotic ointment, nonadherent dressing and changing dressing daily.  During dressing changes, please gently clean the wound with warm soapy water.  Would recommend evaluation by primary care doctor given the size of the wound.  Tetanus shot should be updated if it is not up-to-date.  No overt signs of secondary infection.
responses.content_zh: 相对较大的软组织受损，可能己影响到真皮层。从单一图片很难衡量实际情况。建议把伤口彻底清洁洗涤、涂上外敷用抗生素药膏和用非粘附性包扎物包好。每天更换包扎一次，更換时用温暖的肥皂水轻洗。鉴于伤口相当大，建议到保健医生处进行评估。如果破伤风注射有效期己过，亦要重新注射破伤风疫苗。未能发现明显的继发感染。

query_content_en: My foot was injured and needed eight stitches. Because of pus, the stitches at the front were removed, leaving a hole as shown in the picture. It has been ten days and still hasn't scabbed over. Can you tell if it's healing, and how can it heal faster?
query_content_zh: 脚碰破了 缝了八针 因为有脓 把前面线拆了 这地方是个洞 如图 十天了 还是没有结疤 能不能看出来在愈合 怎么能愈合快一点

responses.content_en: The tissue will heal from the bottom up and skin will eventually grow over it. Continue to clean daily with soap and water. It may take 2 months to heal.
responses.content_zh: 组织会从底部开始愈合，最终皮肤会长出来。继续每天用肥皂和水清洗。愈合可能需要2个月时间。

query_title_en: [Urgent] How should I scientifically care for a scratch on my face so it heals quickly? (Picture attached)
query_title_zh: 【紧急】脸上被指甲划到后,该如何科学保养会很快好?(附图)
query_content_en: Yesterday at noon, while playing basketball, my face was accidentally scratched by a classmate's fingernail, causing a small wound about the size of a pinky nail (as shown in the picture). At home, I disinfected the wound with some alcohol and have not let it touch water since then to prevent infection. Now the wound has scabbed over (as shown in the picture). I want to ask how to care for it scientifically so that it heals quickly and the scar fades as much as possible. What should I do daily, and what is the timeline? Could you please outline the steps for me to follow? Also, can the scabbed area touch water now (like when washing my face)? Thanks in advance for your help. Additionally, how can I deal with acne marks? I have some noticeable acne marks on both sides of my face. What are the best ways to remove them? If there are effective medications, please recommend them. However, I hope they will fade on their own quickly. Thank you all!
query_content_zh: 昨天中午打球的时候,脸部不小心被同学的指甲给刮到,流了一点血,伤口大概小拇指指甲那么大...(如图)  中午回家后,我找了点酒把伤口消了毒,然后持续到现在,我伤口那个部位还没有碰过水,我是怕伤口感染...现在伤口起疤了!(如图)  我想问各位,如何科学护理好才能使其快速的恢复?且伤疤尽可能地淡化,平时需要做哪些工作?大概需要哪些时间,方便的话,可以说说步骤...我参考下...伤口现在起了点疤,可以碰水了吧?(比如伤口部分洗脸时,碰到等)好了,在此感谢大家了...顺便问题下...痘印怎么处理...我脸部两边都有一些痘印,比较明显..所以想问一下,如何去除...如果有好的药物的话,不妨推荐下...但我还是希望它自己很快能够淡化...谢谢大家~

responses.content_en: The wound is healed and you can wash your face with water. You can apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage daily. Avoid direct sunlight when outdoors by wearing a hat and sunscreen.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经愈合，您可以用水洗脸。可以每天涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。外出时避免阳光直射，戴帽子并使用防晒霜。

responses.content_en: Regarding the scab, clean the area gently with warm soapy water three times a day.  Avoid UV exposure to prevent scar formation.  Avoid drying agents like alcohol and hydrogen peroxide.  May apply topical antibiotic ointment as needed while healing.  Do not pick at scab as this will cause scarring,
responses.content_zh: 关于结痂，轻柔地用热肥皂水每天清洁三次。避免紫外线暴露以防止瘢痕形成。避免使用如酒精和过氧化氢等干燥剂。愈合期间可以根据需要涂抹局部抗生素软膏。不要挑结痂，这会造成瘢痕。

responses.content_en: In order to promote healing and prevent scarring, I would avoid vigorously washing or scraping at the wound. I would recommend avoiding sun exposure when possible, wearing sunscreen to prevent further scarring. The scabbed area can't touch water now, but again do not vigorously wipe the area. With regards to the acne marks, once the wound is healed, I would recommend using topical treatments like benzoyl peroxide or topical retinoids to help prevent further acne and reduce scarring.
responses.content_zh: 为了助长愈合和防止疤痕，我会避免用力清洗或刮擦伤口。我建议尽可能避免阳光照射，涂用防晒霜以防止疤痕进一步增长。结痂部份现在不能接触水，亦不要用力擦拭该处。关于痤疮斑点；一旦伤口愈合，我建议使用过氧化苯甲酰或维甲酸等外用治疗方法，以帮助预防痤疮生长和减少结疤。

query_content_en: The surgical wound has become purulent. What caused this, and how should it be treated? The surgery was 10 days ago, as shown in the picture.
query_content_zh: 手术刀口化脓，什么原因，怎么治疗？如图手术后已经10天了

responses.content_en: The infection was likely caused by bacteria from the skin or from within. I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation as this may need to be drained and antibiotics given.
responses.content_zh: 感染可能是由皮肤上的细菌或内部细菌引起的。我建议您去最近的医院进行进一步评估，因为可能需要接受引流与抗生素治疗。

query_title_en: Do I need to get a tetanus shot after being scratched by a nail?
query_title_zh: 被钉子划破需要打破伤风吗？
query_content_en: As shown in the picture, the wound doesn't seem very deep but is not superficial either. If a vaccine is not needed, how should I treat it? Should I rinse it with water? Personally, I feel the wound looks relatively clean.
query_content_zh: 如图，感觉不是很深，但也不算表皮了。如果不需要打，该怎么处理，用水冲吗。个人感觉伤口也还算干净

responses.content_en: If the nail had rust on it recommend tetanus shot.
responses.content_zh: 如果钉子上有锈迹，建议接种破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: What should I do with the wound in its current state? After it got infected and suppurated before, the doctor treated it and applied Mupirocin ointment (a topical antibiotic), making it a bright pink color. After I treated it at home, it looks as shown in the picture. How should I handle the wound now?
query_content_zh: 伤口现在这种情况应该怎么办?之前感染化脓后，医生处理后，用莫匹罗星软膏（局部外用抗生素）涂抹，呈鲜粉红色。后来自己在家处理后，呈现如图所示，现在应如何处理伤口总会呢?

responses.content_en: The wound has healed and infection is resolved. The skin will return to its original color in 1-1.5 years as the scar softens.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经愈合，感染已消退。随着疤痕逐渐软化，皮肤将在1-1.5年内恢复到原来的颜色。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing well with granulation tissue and some mild scarring developing.  Does not appear to have any open skin and can likely stop antibiotic ointment.  For scar care, avoid UV exposure, use scar cream such as Mederma.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合良好，具有肉芽组织，并开始出现一些轻微的瘢痕。皮肤似乎没有口子，可以停止使用抗生素软膏。对于瘢痕护理，避免暴露于紫外线，使用去疤痕膏如Mederma。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing appropriately, I would continue applying mupirocin to the area. I would avoid sunlight to prevent further scarring.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合中，我会继续在该部位应用莫匹罗星药膏。我会避免阳光照射，以防止疤痕进一步的生长。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, I got an abrasion and applied red medicine. Now, the area around the wound has turned black. Should I be worried?
query_title_zh: 如图，擦伤了涂了红药水之后变成这样了，伤口周围有一圈黑色的，有没有事的？

responses.content_en: Clean daily with soap and water. The wound does not appear infected.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗。伤口看起来没有感染。

query_content_en: Can I take a bath if my foot is burned? (as shown in the picture, it's been two days)
query_content_zh: 脚被烫伤可以洗澡吗？如图两天了

responses.content_en: It is OK to clean the wound with soap and water during a bath.
responses.content_zh: 在洗澡时可以用肥皂和水清洗伤口。

responses.content_en: Burn appears to be partial superficial thickness with some blistering.  Would recommend gentle wound care including gentle washing with warm soapy water 3 times daily and applying topical antibiotic with nonadherent dressing, changing the dressing daily.  Avoid submerging the area for extended period of times.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, iodine, or hydrogen peroxide.  Update tetanus if not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 烧伤似乎是在部分浅层厚度，并伴有一些水泡。建议温和的伤口护理，包括每天3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗，并涂抹局部抗生素和不粘贴敷料，每天更换敷料。避免长时间浸泡该区域。避免使用任何干燥剂，如酒精、碘或过氧化氢。如果破伤风接种过期，则应更新。

responses.content_en: You can take a bath, however I would recommend avoiding scraping or vigorously cleaning the area. Once you were done taking a shower, I would recommend soaking the area in warm soapy water and dressing the area with xero form and bacitracin ointment. If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 你可以洗澡，但我建议你避免刮擦或用力清洗伤口部位。洗完澡后，我建议你把该部位浸泡在温肥皂水中，并用XEROFORM和杆菌肽软膏涂敷在伤口处。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。

query_content_en: In the morning, my thumb was cut by an iron buckle, and it bled a lot. At the time, I thought the wound was not deep, so I simply disinfected it and bandaged it. In the afternoon, it looked like this. Should I get stitches and a tetanus shot? Will it heal without deforming?
query_content_zh: 早上大指拇被铁扣板割了个口子，流了很多血，当时觉得伤口也不深，就简单消了下毒包了下，下午成这样了，请问下这种需不需要缝合和打破伤风，会不会长变形？

responses.content_en: Recommend evaluation for stitches.
responses.content_zh: 建议进行评估，可能需要缝合。
